This was my second pair of crocs after I hadn't worn my first pair in a number of years. I am loving the new color choices and am just as obsessed this time around as the first. They're my house shoe! I regularly wear them around the house and put them on to take the dogs out, take the trash out, sweep the sidewalk - you know, quick little chores where you just want a nice slip-on shoe. I do also occasionally go out in public with them, like to the grocery store or to grab a quick bite to eat. My friends hate them but they're coming into fashion now and it's just about dang time.

A person can never have too many crocs. Outdoor crocs, indoor crocs, slipper crocs, pool crocs, dog walking crocs, crocs for your dad, crocs for your cat, crocs for your neighbor with questionable morals.I've bought six pairs now. I need more.

These are the best shoes you have ever put on.  They are great for every day us.  Perfect for water actives and travel.  They are endorsed by World's Strongest Man Eddie Hall.  Let the Haters Hate! If you ani't CROCING your NOT ROCKING.

I never bought Crocs before. These seem to work OK, so far. My only criticism is I wish they would come in half sizes. I originally bought size 11 which was too tight. I then bought size 12 which was a little too loose but more comfortable than the 11's. An 11 1/2 would probably be just right but that does not seem to be an option.

review_title: Overall comfortable but could be better for long walks
review_text: For the most part the Crocs are very comfortable and durable. My only issue with them is when I take long walks (2+ miles) and the balls of my feet started to hurt (I travel this route frequently and my feet are fine in my other shoes). I'm not sure if its the grooves on the insole or something else causing the problem.

Bought a pair in 2017 as size 12, bought a pair in mid 2020, not run a size too large. My size now is 11 Men‚Äôs, and the old pair are 12. My old ones say made in Mexico, the 2020 pair is made in China. Be aware your normal size may run too big on these new ones.

My husband picked up gardening and bought a pair of these for the kid to help him. I then decided to get myself a pair too. We all have pretty wide feet and these are incredibly comfortable. Somehow they don't pinch or slip. Also with the summer heat - the design really helps keep your feet cool and being non-porous - are great for doing things where your feet may get wet or muddy (like gardening).

I have worn Crocs for over 10 years and as my aging feet have gotten tired of uncomfortable shoes the Crocs have been a blessing.  I do make sure I check the tread because it does wear down and can be an issue on slippery surfaces.  I have also gotten Crocs for my sister who has Parkinson Disease and it has increased the surface area of her step to make walking easier.  I will definitely continue to order Crocs as needed.

I love crocs! They are so comfortable! This is my first time buying a pair of crocs on amazon and the shoes fit me well but I noticed that one size is wider than the other pair and that disappointed me a lot! Not sure if that‚Äôs how crocs are supposed to be made but please AMAZON, check on the shoes carefully! And to answer why I didn‚Äôt return it was because I wore it the first day it was delivered to me and didn‚Äôt really paid much attention to it till the next day and it was kinda dirty already. I also just ordered another pair after realizing the other pair was wider than the other so I hope it‚Äôs not the same problem as my first one.

I have huge and wide size 13 feet and these fit perfectly. Plus they have a good arch support. And I can choose slip on in the house or use the back strap for driving. They are washable too, which means they are not stinky and don't get ruined right away. I am glad to have made this purchase.

review_title: Durable and comfortable LOVE THESE THINGS
review_text: I've had these crocs for 2 years now and I still wear them around when running errands etc.  it may not be the most glamorous thing but it sure is comfortable.  These crocs are so durable.  If I had a pair of regular flip flops, I would be on at least my 5th or 6th pair. This crocs have paid for themselves many times over.  I've worn them walking over rocks, stones, in showers, in the house, to the store, camping EVERYTHING.  I loved these things so much I bought a pair for my husband in the REALTREE camouflage and he now likes his. (Plus his old flip flops where there is material really starts to stink when he's walking around so crocs don't smell) Hint hint ladies, buy these for your husbands as well! :)
I resisted Crocs for the longest. But I've pretty much worn them 24/7 throughout this quarantine..now they're all I want to wear! They're just so darn functional!

Bought these to be supportive house shoes as the majority of my home is hard/tile floors and mylegs get achy! Love how supportive they are and my legs and hips do not hurt after being in my feet a lot. Highly recommended!

review_title: THE footwear for painfully wide feet
review_text: XXX wide feet, widened even more by bunions, RA and three bone-fusing surgeries.  I've been paying big $$$ for Drew shoes and orthotics and lost the ability to walk barefoot at all.  Wearing there the last three weeks I have increased my activity, lowered my pain and foot cramps, and felt my toes spread to their natural width and length.  I also have high arches, and tend to develop bone spurs on the top of the midfoot (Danskos HURT!), but my feet still feel great in these crocs.  Only the classics fit this well.  Buying 3 more.

This was my boyfriends first pair and he absolutely loves them. It‚Äôs all he‚Äôs been wearing since they arrived! We will definitely be ordering another pair for him soon and I‚Äôll be ordering a pair for myself as well. So comfortable, easy on the knees and very versatile.

These are the only shoes I can wear, my feet are ruined from 50 years of bartending, waitressing and retail work on my feet up to 60 hours a week.  I wear them with socks and they are more comfortable than my slippers used to be.

review_title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned.
review_text: I have been a fan of Crocs for a very long time. While they are not the most attractive shoe ever, you just can't beat the comfort. I have some issues with foot pain, and my Crocs are the only shoe I have found that completely alleviate the pain. I have tried quite a few of the styles over the years, but this was the first time I have tried the clogs. They are a little snug around the tops of my feet because of my extremely high arches, but I got used to it pretty fast. I wear these almost constantly and i am very happy with them.

review_title: Perfect fit on my big 15 D feet!
review_text: Don't know where they are made but they are made properly as a size 15 D.  I had to return a set of sandals marketed from Great Britain that were way too narrow.  It is a pleasure to get shoes that were made to the proper size, as per the way they are labeled.  These shoes are very comfortable and I am very pleased.  I had a hard time finding Crocs in my size.  They aren't sold in the regular shoe stores and many online shoe stores have a very limited selection of 15 D shoes, as well.  Now if they will just be strong and hold up for a while.  I'll update if they self destruct to early in life.

review_title: Crocs naysayers are so silly.  Crocs are awesome.
review_text: You don't wear Crocs for a fashion statement.  Well, maybe in some places, but not most places.  They're the flip-flops of the regular shoe community.  So easy to slip on.  So easy to wash off.  When my kids were little, they were "big kid" shoes they could put on themselves.  Now all of my big kids have a pair right outside the backdoor.  Slip them on to do everything year round (we live in Arizona.)  So far nobody has ever accidentally stepped in dog poo, but it could happen and if it did - easily washable.  They wore these shoes at at sleepaway camp for everything from showers to fishing to hiking.  They're durable.  Over the last 6+ years we've owned MANY pairs of Crocs brand originals and think they're all fantastic.

Who doesn‚Äôt love some crocadillies?  They‚Äôre the comfiest around.  I love the versatility.  You can likely run a marathon or wrestle a gator in these lady killers.  You‚Äôre liable to find some night time company if you rock the crocs.

Perfect fit. I bought them as the only pair of shoes to wear on my island vacation. They went on the airplane, to the beach, and sight seeing. They went with my shorts, swimsuit, jeans, and sun dress. My never hurt and I was comfortable the whole time. Best of all I didn't have to take up precious space in my carry on bag with another pair of shoes.

review_title: The Most Comfortable Ugly I've Ever Own!!!!!
review_text: Yeah, the world has a love/hate relationship w/ Crocs. Yeah, they're ugly. Yeah... I've NEVER wanted to own a pair. But I caved... AND I DON'T REGRET IT!!! These are the MOST COMFORTABLE things I have EVER put on my feet. It's like walking on marshmallows.Please Note: I have wide, flat feet. So, I can NEVER find a pair of comfy shoes wide enough. And I've never had to worry about arch support (because I have none). So, these shoes are actually a GOD-SEND to my Fred Flintstone.I am DEFINITELY buying more.

these are typical crocks.  comfy n sturdy n looks exactly like the pic.  color too.  great price for crocks best 1 we could find. my sons size 10.5/11 n fits perfect.  hes 16 n hard in everything n these are still months later like neewww.  will def buy again.

My boyfriend never had a pair of crocs before and he had just recently broke a pair of flip flops that he wore all the time. He was sad that he didn‚Äôt have any quick slip on shoes that he could wear anywhere so for his birthday I bought him a pair of green crocs and he LOVES them. He wears them all the time even to work now lol.

Yay ! Thank you !!!!‚Äô15 years wearing CROCS and NO foot pain That‚Äôs why I have so many I began working in Healthcare over 41 years Got heel spurs since 1978A total knee replacement I stand all day at my pt job No big deal, it comes with the territory

Crocs are the best but dont wear in the rain or water. That should be a caution label on the package. Or a sticker on the shoe. Not everyine has common sense. They are so comfortable want to wear all of the time.

review_title: New to Croc's trying them out at physical therapist's urging.
review_text: I am new to Crocs. Couldn't get the color I wanted and had to send the 1st pair back as they were way too large. Doing this at the urging of physical therapist. They seem very comfortable but I will see how they last. so far so good and they feel comfortable. Still debating getting another pair at just one size smaller.

review_title: Very comfy if you go one size up
review_text: I decided to go up 1 size, I usually wear size 8 but got the 9 and its a good thing i did because it would have been too close of a fit if I got my actual size. The 9 I got Is very comfy. So i would recommend going up 1 size. To be  honest it about a half size bigger than my foot with the strap up. But when I ise the strap it feel perfect.

I only wear Crocs. This is my 5th pair in about seven years! I use them in ways they were never intended. I ran a 5k in these, hiked up Mt. Washburn, cleared heavily wooded land, etc. I am not exaggerating. I always wear Crocs. They are tough, fit comfortably, are completely waterproof, reasonably priced and look great. I get a new pair about every 14 months. That's pretty long if its the only shoe you ever wear, like I do! Love them!

Very happy with this purchase. These are the crafts that I have always known over the years. And some outlet stores, they no longer sell this version. I‚Äôm happy to find and have the Crocs that I have always known and loved.

I've never had a pair of Crocks before, with that said i was very impressed with the comfort and arch support in these shoes. I wish i had tried them a couple summers ago! Quality seems decent under normal daily use, will buy again when i need a new pair!

I got these crocs for work because I clean pools and spas in the family business so I need non slip waterproof shoes...I'd love to have a pair in every color...only my second pair ever..I'm 49 and dont know why I waited so long to get them...I even wear them around the house..but I have another pair for that!!

I wear this model of slippers for years. I wear it everyday, usually after 2 years the bottom smoothed out and become slippery, then I bought a new pair with different color. I like the light sky blue color.

review_title: Comfortable Shoes!  And cute, and a GREAT purple color
review_text: I am thrilled with these bright purple shoes.  They are super cute, and so comfortable.  I can feel the little bumps inside the shoe, and I like it!  These feel so good I don't want  to take them off.  They may be my new favorite shoes!

review_title: Comfortable and easy to put on
review_text: They are super comfortable I would give them five stars but I don‚Äôt really like the way crocs look so much but that‚Äôs just my opinion of them but they are super easy to put on and super super comfortable I would definitely buy again!

I‚Äôm very happy with this purchase. I love crocs and needed to change out my very well loved pair. This pair wasn‚Äôt exactly like my original pair I had. This one is a little bit more boxy toed. Over I love them and plan on getting more colors

What are the holes in Crocs for? They are there to let your dignity out.  Jokes aside, these are surprisingly warm and comfortable. I use them essentially as outdoor slippers - trips to the freezer in the garage, taking the trash out, things like that. I also use them as camp shoes, and they are a nice change after a long day in hunting boots.

review_title: This pair was actually true to size
review_text: I ordered a few different pairs and each time the sizing was different, even when it came from the same country!  However, this pair happened to be made in China and was comfortable and was "not too big or too small, it was just right!".

review_title: Perfect for gardening. Lightweight, vented, spacious toe.
review_text: These are just the best. I bought them for gardening. I have too many other cute sandals to ever wear these out, but you could, many people do. For gardening they are perfect. Wide toe box, secure heel strap, vented, lightweight. I bought my normal size. Even though I have skinny feet these fit fine.

review_title: Order 1-2 sizes smaller depending on whether you wear socks or not
review_text: These shoes are huge for their size.  We ordered 10s at first and they were gigantic and had to be returned.  Downsized to 9s and they are still at least 1 size too long, and kinda loose height and width wise.  If you plan to wear without socks the. Order 2 sizes smaller unless you have a really wide, thick foot.  Upsides are that they are lightweight and comfortable if you order the right size

They're ugly, so freaking ugly but I love them. Crocs are just so comfortable, perfect for running out real quick. I wore them to church and got some looks so that might be a bad idea, but for going to get the mail or a quick errand, perfect.

review_title: High toe box and just a smedge wider, just as I need it to be.
review_text: Looks like original Crocs, very happy with the fit.  I've been to Crocs stores and if I remember correctly, Crocs makes 3 or 4 different width sizes and toe box sizes.  Could not find a style with the same fit.  Would have purchased different styles if they fit.

review_title: Fits fine w/o Sports mode, W/ Sports mode its a little tight
review_text: This is my first pair of Crocs and I wear a size w8.5. I got the size m6/w8. When I'm not in sports mode (w/o the strap in the back of my foot), they fit fine and there's some wiggle room, just right! However, when I'm in sports mode (w/ the straps in the back), they fit kind of tight and my big toe rubs against the front.I was debating on whether or not on getting a size m7/w9 too. But I found that when trying it on, it was too big, so I stuck w/ the size m6/w8.

review_title: These may be fake - but  pretty comfortable anyway
review_text: It says made in Vietnam but I thought Crocs were made in the US.  They are much shinier and slicker than my other ones (that were getting worn out on the bottom).  but they fit well and are comfortable, so I kept them.  They are very slick with bare feet, but I usually wear socks anyway.  Also, they did not hand deliver it.  Why do they say that?  Delivery people should not lie.

I ordered an 8.Last years pair were more..."roomy."This pair my toes touch the top inside.I dont mind it, I guess I was just used to a little bit more room.  I love this white color..their super cute. ü•∞

YES! Yup, uh-huh, yes sir, you bet, yeah, right on... word!!! üëäI wear a 12 & bought a 12 in ‚ÄúChocolate‚Äù, I wear them everywhere.  Summer, winter... doesn‚Äôt matter. It‚Äôs  all about the socks! Love these kix! üëç

I love these and wear them a lot. They have the typical Croc roomy fit which feels almost like you're barefoot.  You think that they would come off your foot when you walk but they don't.  They feel sort of gel-like on your feet with their cushiony rubber. I really like the option of using the heel strap or flipping it up so you can slip in and out of them easily, like slippers.  You get used to their quirky appearance, if not, get one of the more traditional looking models. I have three different styles which I wear exclusively as casual shoes.

review_title: 2 nd pair as husband wore out first pair
review_text: My husband had never worn crocs.  Now he loves them.  Glad they are comfortable and easy to slip on.  He wanted a shoe he could go outside in the wet grass and then be able to rinse them off when back inside the house.Perfect choice.

My daughter wears these Crocs to/from the softball field. Easy to slip on/off over her socks or even bare feet. Don't have to worry about them getting wet or dirty because they dry quickly and are easy to clean by running them under the garden hose. (These match perfectly with her uniforms which are "Carolina Blue" & white/black.)

My husband has recently been suffering from gout.  His regular shoes are very uncomfortable.  I suggested that he try these.  He was originally resistant.  Finally, he was desperate so I ordered these.  He wears them all the time and loves them.  So glad I was able to convince him to try them!

I love crocs! The only weird part was it was open, but luckily nothing missing. I forgot how weird new ones feel at first but break in sooo nicely and they're so comfy. I put a pic of my current crocs with the new ones. So cute and love, I got a pair of tyedye ones  for my mom.
Someone gave me a 1 pair. I noticed my feet weren‚Äôt hurting like they normally do. I liked them so much, I bought 2 more.

I use these to mainly travel to and from my basement. My previous slippers did not have heel support; on more than one occasion I was afraid that I was going to fall down the stairs. These crocs fit perfect, are more comfortable than I expected, and do not slip at all!

My diabetic feet are painful and I needed something cushy to wear around the house.  These are nice!  I wear them with my bamboo socks and they have helped with easing the agony.  Not sure I would wear without my socks.

I've been wearing Crocs for many years and have tried several styles.  The Classic is still my favorite for comfort.  Some styles used to come in a Wide, and don't any more, but this one fit fine anyway, and I have a wide instep.

I like these shoes, got these for myself and a black pair for my husband. For both of us they are a bit large so I would say go down about half a size. We like wearing them after a shower at the gym (where flip flops for the shower) to air out or feet. Sometimes we where them at home however, they attract dog hair like nobody's business. There are people who have videos and instructions on how to remove pet hair from your carpet with these things. So on carpet and wood floor they are great for them but that is not my purpose.They feel great so I will keep wearing them.

review_title: Never knew what I was missing
review_text: Omg I never knew I needed crocs til I got crocs. These are perfect for everyday use!

My first Crocs! I have never worn Crocs because I thought they were the ugliest shoes ever. I still think that, lol.But...I needed shoes I could garden in, shoes that I could clean by washing in the sink when I finished my gardening chores. You can't do that with any other shoe. They're so cheap. And so squishy comfortable.The fit is spot on for me. I wear size nine in most shoes and the Croc 9 is perfect in length. The toe box is super tall and wide, but this doesn't affect comfort or size.Good heavens they're ugly though.

review_title: Still Hope Out There For Those Purchasing Crocs
review_text: Love Crocs, these are great! They're comfy af (as stated in another review), but I would like to add that you can still get booty while owning Crocs. I'm happily married and my wife actually suggested these to me, but I wouldn't dare wear them WHILE getting booty... she doesn't like it when I track dirt in the house.

I got these on sale which was a great value. I bought these for a girlfriend in her favorite color (very pretty color choices!) and she loved them. They are a little uncomfortable to stand/walk in all day long, though

Amazing slippers! Also can be shoes of course. These were a gift for my husband and he LOVES them. He has a terrible time with foot pain and trying to get comfortable in other casual shoes; these did the trick. We plan to order more.

They are very light weight and comfortable. They fit perhaps a half size large as they have no in between or half sizes; however, there is plenty of room for wearing socks with them. I am happy with them.

review_title: Don't ever leave in direct sun exposure, they will deform and no longer fit properly.
review_text: I have owned more pairs than I can recall. Great shoe for some uses. Easy on/off in bare feet or socks. Horrible for water use, very unstable. Left in direct sunlight, they will deform and become unwearable. I'll buy another pair.

Not true to size. I've been wearing Crocs for somewhere around 20 years. I love them. I don't know why these weren't the same as the others I bought. Because the other ones we're true to size and they were Croc brand

if your a size 9 for men and you want a perfect fit order 10m 12w.9 for me is a little to tight and no room,a 10m is perfect.i love crocs,i need to ware something on my feet for around the house I could not find anything for this need,crocs is the perfect find,i ware these all day and night for home use.i will buy again in the future,for the value and how well they make these you cannot fail.plese crocs keep making these shoes.thanks.

I am so happy to find a cute pair of Crocs that will go with my jeans and any top I might wear with them. What I am most excited about, is these crocs fit my feet very well. In the last year or two I've had problems with the new sizing for Crocs (purchased directly) and have had to return or giveaway or not wear four pairs. So I took a chance on ordering  this pair  and I was thrilled that they fit and they look really cute. I normally wear a size woman's nine which is what I ordered.  I am so pleased that I am going to order another pair just like them so I expect to be set for a number of years! One additional note, I have diabetic nerve damage and Crocs are the most comfortable shoes for my feet, in addition they keep my feet protected and provide additional stability for walking.  I couldn't be more pleased to have found this new design and one that fits so perfectly.
Love these crocs! Super comfy for work. I‚Äôm on my feet all day and these are great! Color is great too!

My daughter & grandajghters have worn these for "years", but I was reluctant because of the ribbing on the inside and I thought they were plastic-----WELL, let me say I was so wrong.  These are the most comfortable shoes I have worn, except for my berkies ( but they take time to start fitting  right ). But these fit immediately AND my daughter said that she throws hers in  with clothes in the washer.  How nice ! I love these and they arrived on time.  So, what's not to like ?

I have hammertoe on my right foot and have difficulty finding a comfortable pair of closed toe shoes. I stand on my feet for long hours as well so even wider toebox shoes chafe my toe and cause a lot of pain. To make it easy on myself I just stuck with one pair of walking shoes and never tried another one. Through the recommendation of a friend who has multiple foot issues I decided to give crocs a try.  I couldnt be more glad that I bought these shoes. The size is perfect and i wear them and work in my studio for hours standing without ever being reminded of my pain. These shoes are extremely comfortable and I wear them all the time.

My son has worn the same pair of Crocs forever. He wanted another pair because of how easy they are to get on and with baseball he needs something to wear to the field before putting on his spikes. These work so well and he has been super happy since getting his new pair!

review_title: Most comfortable Croc!  There is a BIG difference!
review_text: I love the Cayman croc.  They look the same as the regular croc but are much softer and comfortable.  The difference is amazing!  Of course, they still don't last more than a few months before the soles are smooth and slippery.  But they are so comfortable to wear!  At least until you slip and fall and break your body!  If the soles lasted longer, I would give them 10 stars!

I live in my crocks, even in winter inside the house. I put my warm aloe infused ankle socks under them in winter. They are more supportive than bedroom slippers which I used to wear around the house all the time. I love finding them on sale, especially finding my new pink crocs for approximately $10 on amazon!!!

I don‚Äôt know why I waited so many years to buy my first pair of crocs! My 1 year old granddaughter has a pair so I bought a matching pair.I love these crocs! I have a very wide foot, and this is the first pair of shoes I‚Äôve ever owned that have plenty of room in the toe box.

I love the Crocs, I use them to cut the grass, they are comfortable, and can get as dirty as you need to get and just wash and rinse them off.  A great project shoe to wear when you need something that won't get ruined by mud, water, or getting dirty.  Everyone needs to own a pair of Crocs.

review_title: Perfect for injury and wood floors
review_text: It was suggested that I try Crocs after falling and injuring my ankle. Regular shoes hurt because of where they hit in the back of my ankle so I ordered some to give them a try. I ordered a size 8 and they fit well.  Arch support is there and they are open in the back so I actually walk more comfortably with them on.  I have also discovered that they are very comfortable on wood floors.  I have only worn them inside partly because because it's winter but really because they are kind of ugly. Think I'll keep them as "inside shoes".

My daughter loves these! We got a bright yellow which is her favorite color and I live that there are so many colors to choose from. She feels very comfortable in them and wears them everywhere. The only problem is that she occasionally tries to run in them and often trips. They are just not made for running.

this is a comfortable footwear.I bought it slightly bigger for a better comfort wearing by 1 size number and it is just nice when I tried out.If buying maybe can consider 0.5 to 1 size bigger if you are looking for a wider design.there is sufficient space for the toes to wriggle and it feels good when wearing the crocs slipper as it does not make the foot painWill consider getting another pair when the croc clog is worn out from the usage.

I find Crocs clogs so comfortable for anytime when I'm doing a lot of walking.  The only complaint I've had with Crocs is the inconsistency of the sizing.  This time, I was lucky and chose a size larger - thanks to those who reviewed this shoe.  They for perfectly.  I like to wear these with socks for the cold Arizona winters and these will be great.  (I normally wear a size 7.5 shoe and chose the size 8.....a size 7 would've been too small)  I have about 15 pairs of Crocs.....and 4 are the clogs of different. colors.

Absolutely love crocs ! Especially the bright coloured ones.They are very durable, comfortable, I often stick them in the washing machine, colours never fade.Excellent for running around the house and going to the supermarket

Ordered these for my husband. He loves them. He wears them outside while doing yard work as they can get dirty and are waterproof so he just washes them off. This is his second pair and as he has large feet his size is sometimes hard to find.

Always wider in front which is great for my feet. Since I expected and needed that, they were perfect. Good quality and very comfortable. They don't last me as long as I would like because I wear them a lot but cute shoes and great for gardening or slipping on for running errands and such. Bright colors makes them fun to wear.

I got my son a pair of toddler crocs for summer... my husband and I were instantly jealous when I saw how comfortable they were. We knew we had to buy a few pairs. Love them! So easy to slip on and clean. I am now a believer!

This is my first pair of Crocs as I've avoided wearing them for a long time. I finally caved and what a fool I was for not getting a pair sooner! They are great to wear around the house, I've only worn them outside for short periods. I highly recommend these shoes. I ordered my normal size 10 and they fit wonderfully. Very comfortable too!

review_title: A bit small for my toes, but otherwise perfect!
review_text: I really wanted crocs for the longest time, I bought these and love to wear them whenever I'm too lazy to put on sneakers or if I'm just going to grab the mail. I ordered a women's size 9 shoe and it fits relatively well, the only issue is that my toes feel like they're squished against the shoe. Other than that, great product!Ignore the haters, croc's are amazing and you should wear what you love :)

First time I‚Äôve ever bought the name brand and maybe they are worth while.  These are the third pair of this style I‚Äôve tried this year and at last  I‚Äôm happy with them.Took one star off because they will shrink if left in the car in the sunlight.

Everyone in my family has been telling me to get a pair of Crocs, so I finally found them on Amazon at the best price and ordered them. Right out of the package, they fit perfect and are so comfortable I almost want to sleep with them on. But I take them off at night and place them right next to my bed so they are ready to go in the morning.

review_title: In the larger sizes, go one size down
review_text: I got these for my boyfriend and he wears a size 12 shoe, I had to exchange them for a size 11  because the 12 crocs were Way too big. The 11s fit perfect, he has a wide foot so they were perfect for him. I think crocs run wide.

I love my crocks, they are so comfortable, I wear them all the time around the house and even out and about when I run my errands, I may get a black pair so I can match everything. I now have the light blue pair.

review_title: Crocs Footwear Is Definitely Not A Crock
review_text: I should have bought a pair of these 10 years ago.  Most comfortable footwear ever.  Perfect if you work in a hospital or hospital like environment. Or, just banging around the house.  Very lightweight, super comfortable & very well made.

review_title: Comfortable, washable, great summer and gardening shoes, Run large.
review_text: Is quite comfortable once I was able to get the right size.  They run big.  I wear them in the summer with shorts and sundresses.  Also, I wear them in the garden because I don‚Äôt have to wear special gardening shoes since they are washable.
These are my first ever pair of crocs. Great arch support, great fit. I would recommend buying a size larger. They don't run big, I just like a big fit. I look forward to buying other colors.

My nephew asked for theses for a Christmas gift.  He was confused by the sizing and what he readin the reviews.  I ordered two sizes to be sure one fit him.  We chose the smaller size and that was a little bigbut he kept those. They are comfortable, durable shoes.

honestly, i never thought i‚Äôd wear a pair of crocs in my entire life. i got tired of having to wash my piggy slippers every time i went out to smoke, but i‚Äôm in love! i wear them out every time now! i got some cool charms for them too!

review_title: Great product, it's a shame I waited so long to purchase
review_text: The price was great, fit is spot on and they're very comfortable. Just wish I would have made the leap sooner. Problem is they never have my size to try on in store so it was always discouraging to purchase.

review_title: Not quite the same as older crocs
review_text: These just aren't quite the same as the Crocs I've been wearing for years. The material is a bit "harder" and does not have the softness that I'm used to. And the size is slightly smaller. With this pair, I can wear them with the strap moved forward but if I put the strap around my foot, then my toe touches the front of the shoe. In all my other crocs, I've had a comfortably loose fit even when using the strap.My street shoes size is a women's 10. In crocs I wear a Men's 9/Women's 11. I've always worn this size in Crocs, and that's the size these are (I double-checked the sole to make sure).I kept these and am wearing them without the strap but just wanted to let others know that they seem to be making them smaller than they used to.

review_title: Great buy! They get used by a rough 11 year old
review_text: What a great buy for my little guy! They are durable and live up to there durability. Water, mud, running, jumping.... they have been through it all and are still in great condition. Will definitely buy again when his feet grow out of these

I love these! I have wide feet and they fit well. Crocs didnt have the color I wanted so I got them here. Dont be concerned with the little bumps on the inside, they wear down quickly or wear socks but your gonna love them....

I like them there comfortable, I was pissed at the shipping needed them yesterday for an outfit didn't come till today at noon that made me very mad other than that I love them will get some more maybe somewhere else with reliable shipping

I‚Äôm a consistent 9.5 in women‚Äôs. The 10s were enormous on me. So I went with 9. They are clearly too small. I got to wear in a rocky lake so I would rather not have them big and risk falling off. Disappointed in the sizing

review_title: Khaki fits perfectly and Navy is enormous
review_text: These are great and so comfortable.  I wear them to walk the dog through the wet grass and I don't slip and my feet stay dry.  I purchased the khaki and they fit perfectly (I wear a 7.5 or 8 shoe and bought the crocs in an 8).I purchased the same crocs in a size 8 in navy and they are enormous.  Can't imagine why there is such a difference between the two colors.  The navy will be returned.

review_title: My fianc√© finally gave into these and he's loves them
review_text: Title says it all. He got the perfect size. Hes a size 9.5 and so he got a 9 in men. He loves them so much. He has really bad and plantar fasciitis and he says they feel incredible. His feet sweat a lot too but with these he said he barely cracked a sweat. Awesome shoes! I love them and he does too. #CrocGang

review_title: Why did I ever stop wearing Crocs?
review_text: I bought these for yard work, wearing around the house. My goodness, I have missed Crocs so much. I haven't had a pair in maybe 10 years, but I won't be without a pair again. I bought my regular size that I would normally wear.

review_title: New ones are just like old ones
review_text: Needed presentable replacement for very old dark blue, paint-splattered Crocs. The last in new pair, or whatever you call it, is same as in old pair. I‚Äôve bought other Crocs (different clog styles) over the years and they‚Äôve all been made with different lasts ‚Äîas a result, I have a collection of Crocs that don‚Äôt be fit very well. So I‚Äôve just gone back to the original...

review_title: Great shoes but not left/right consistent
review_text: The curve of the Croc at the instep strap connection was narrower than the right Croc, which results in slight rubbing against my left foot where there's clearance on the right foot. Not a huge deal since I am using these as house shoes and mostly with socks. I would have returned them if I were using as outdoor errand shoes.

review_title: Crocs have a proven track record
review_text: You either love ‚Äòem or you don‚Äôt. Very durable and fun to wear year round (except on rainy days). This is my second pair.  The first pair lasted almost 8 years till the back strap broke.

I knew what size to order because I bought a pair locally, so the ones from amazon fit perfectly. My old ones looked too shabby to wear away from home. I wish you had BEIGE/TAN in my size...UPDATE APRIL 13, 2014:  I just read comments about "made in Mexico" and "made in China" ... interesting. My regular shoe size is 10.5, but the Crocs I bought recently and fit me perfectly are 'women's size 9'.  I just looked at the local-store-Croc and the amazon-crocs -- both were made in Mexico -- I guess 'that's a good thing.'  I looked at my very old & shabby Crocs and they say "BOULDER,COLORADO" and "[...]." I don't know what this means....

review_title: Order down if you‚Äôre a half size!
review_text: I love Crocs, but they do tend to be a little on the larger side. These were for my boyfriend and he‚Äôs a half size, so I ordered up to make sure they fit. They‚Äôre very big, almost to the point of sliding off his feet. I definitely should have ordered down. They‚Äôre flexible enough that that could have worked.

I love my crocs! I wear them everywhere on dry days and even in the shower. I bought one pair in yellow and they were so comfortable I bought another in brown to wear out. The brown ones were different sizing than the yellow ones since the yellow beach ones were size 8-9 and the brown ones size Women's 8M. Both fit fine but the brown ones fit best with thin socks if I wear socks.I have diabetes and liver cirrhosis, both of which cause problems with legs and feet, so I need shoes that are very comfortable and not too tight. Crocs really are perfect. I thought the little bumps in the bottom inside would bother me in bare feet but they don't. They are roomy enough that if my feet swell a bit they still fit. They sort of stick to the soles of my feet (even with socks) so there's no rubbing against my sensitive skin.They are also great in the shower. I don't have to worry about slipping, especially when I use hair conditioner or body wash that is slippery, and I can wash my crocs at the same time I wash me. Fantastic!

I originally bought these so that I didn't have to put on socks and shoes just to check the mail (rocky driveway). I had no idea that I would love them as much as I do.Pros:- incredibly comfortable, I could wear them all day- my feet are wide, and they still fit perfectly- there is almost nothing you can do to mess them up, just wash the rubberCons:- when using the heel strap, it is very difficult for me to remove the shoes. I know that this is a feature, as that is the literal purpose of the strap, but sometimes it feels like a bug.These are the most versatile slip-on shoes I've ever owned.

I have bought a couple of these crocs and love them. However the last ones I bought were the color ‚Äòpepper‚Äô which appear on the picture as black, however they are actually red. I don‚Äôt mind them being red but please be aware if you‚Äôre planning on purchasing the ‚Äòpepper‚Äô ones.

review_title: Great, comfortable shoes for the money!
review_text: These clogs are homely, but suit my big even more homely feet just fine. Great for schlupping around the house, etc., w/o having to don socks & shoes. I've never liked clogs before because they don't stay on my feet well, the back straps on these keep them well in place. Very comfortable to walk in, I regret it's taken me so long to discover this inexpensive, durable, comfortable footwear. Likely will order another pair just to keep one in the house, another in our travel trailer.

My husband loves these shoes. He has a very hard time finding shoes that he finds comfortable, because his feet aren't standard size and they tend to swell. These are comfortable and he has been wearing them constantly. He also likes that they slip on and off so easily.

review_title: I used to be a hater ...
review_text: For the longest time, I used to make fun of Crocs. Not sure why. Maybe it was my immaturity at the time. But something finally snapped and I decided to give them a try because of the sale Amazon had on them.Now, I‚Äôm a convert. If given the choice an option, I end up wearing Crocs. Yeah, they‚Äôre not the best looking shoes but I stopped caring about looks. I want comfort and Crocs give the comfort I need.

i used to not think crocs were cute, but i decided to give them a shot. best choice EVER!! they‚Äôre literally so comfortable and I got jibbitz to decorate them (some are still coming) but they‚Äôre so cute!!! I am a women‚Äôs size 6, so that‚Äôs what i ordered and they fit SO PERFECTLY. the white is such a nice white color too!! totally recommend!edit: it is now over 3 months later and i‚Äôm still wearing them!!2nd edit: about 7/8 months- still wear them a lot!! would def recommend!!

The shoes fit me fine,  it was my legs, I have osteoarthritis in both of my legs. And my  therapist told me to get them, but they only made my muscle in my legs hurt more.  So, I turned it into a win instead of a loss, my granddaughter wanted them for her birthday,  And she e my size, so I gave them to her, and she is happy and so am I.

review_title: Pugly. Worth every penny so far. But im only 6 hours into owning them. =)
review_text: My husband got me tie dye socks, so i got these crocks ;) no shame theyre dope. Theyre loose, as i expected. I believe i ordered a size 10, as im typically 9-10. I have wide feet. Theyre so comfy. 4 months after pregnancy none of my shoes fit.

My husband SWORE he would NEVER wear crocs until I bought him a pair. He loves these things now! He has a narrow foot so we did need to go down in size as opposed to a regular pair of shoes for him but other than that, these are great! He loves them!

These were perfect! I love crocs, always have. Very vibrant color, comfortable, and versatile. I work in a pharmacy so they‚Äôre a good all day shoe for me. They‚Äôre also great to leave by the door when you‚Äôre running out to get the mail or walk the dog real quick

review_title: Great but get a smaller size
review_text: Buy a size smaller than your sneakers. At first I bought my running shoe size and felt it was just too big. Returned and ordered a smaller size. Fits great. Too me years to take the leap but they're comfortable and multi functional.

It's about the ease of donning & doffing and general comfort. It's not about any aesthetic appeal, which it is perhaps not particularly high on. I found my first pair (of the original Crocs--new in box) while dumpster diving several years ago. I brought them home to show my wife just how absurd a pair of shoes can look. For a lark, I tried them on and--what do you know? Those goofy-looking shoes were extremely comfortable! I have worn them near daily ever since. Interestingly, after they started getting popular and appearing on lots of other people's feet, they stopped looking quite so goofy.As much as I like them, they are problematic for some occasions. Little rocks and dirt sometimes get in through the holes; when the soles get worn smooth from use they are extremely slippery on wet sidewalks; goathead stickers and glass can easily pierce through the soft sole and into your previously happy foot; Bare feet can sweat in the summer and slide around a bit; I wear them so much that I get tan spots through the holes, leaving my feet polka-dotted when I remove my shoes.Overall though, for the reasons of ease and comfort, I love 'em.

review_title: These are so comfortable. I said that they do not have good ...
review_text: These are so comfortable.  I said that they do not have good arch support, but I have an extremely high arch and I don't feel it if it's there.  The shoes are contured and someone with a lesser arch may feel the support.  I can wear them all day w/ or w/out socks.  They are also extremely light-weight and that is a bonus!  I have now purchased a pair for my husband which he loves and wears all day too.  I have also purchased two more as gifts... want to share the comfort!  I definitely recommend and they do not run in 1/2 sized... I am at least an 8.5 and usually a 9 and the 8 fits me perfectly.  Hope this helps.

Bought these for my son. The orange is bright! He loves them. They fit as expected. Crocs tend to be a little wide and have lots of room for the toes. Now that he‚Äôs in adult men‚Äôs sizes, I can order him his true shoe size and they fit.
I love crocs . I normally wear 8.5-9. This 9 was much too big the 8 fits fine even with winter socks. These seem lighter weight than my previous 2 pairs. Comfy for bunions or other foot issues.

review_title: So happy!! The best price on the color/size I wanted!!
review_text: Love my Crocs!! Wanted Navy for a while but didn‚Äôt want to pay a full retail price. Thanks for the great pricing. It also delivered so much earlier than the first estimated delivery date. It was unexpected and made me a happy customer!

I purchase the white pair for my daughter and the khaki pair for my husband. They both loved these crocks! I had to go up a 1/2 size because they don‚Äôt come in half sizes. But, they fit as expected. Worth the money!

I stayed away from CROCS for over a decade just because of the stigma. But one of the gifts of middle age is you stop giving a shuck about what people think. Now I wish I could go back in time and tell my younger self just how unbelievably comfortable these things are! After I bought these I was so impressed I went out and bought three more pair of different styles. I‚Äôm a CROCS brand loyalist now!
I thought I would love crocs,  but have found I‚Äôm not a big fan. I personally did not find them comfortable at all. The nubs on the bottom of the shoes hurt to walk on even with socks.

Love these shoes! A friend had told me she bought some off amazon, so I wanted to get myself some! I‚Äôm glad I did, love these shoes. I‚Äôm just now starting my collection, so I know where to get them at now at a better price.

Probably my fault, as my other pair fits perfectly, as I think that one is more like size 8.5 mens. I ordered the new ones in size 9, not remembering that I don't wear socks with Crocs, so the 8.5 would have been perfect. Next time I order them I will remember this! Other than that, my old pair of Crocs (which I still wear) are holding up extremely well and are super-comfortable. I am impressed!

I love these shoes! I haven't worn them for a long period of time yet but they are comfortable. I am normally about a size 5.5 in women's but it didn't come in that size. After reading reviews that said they ran small, I gave the size 6 a try. They would probably be too small if I was actually a 6 but I was hoping they would run small. So far I love them. Although if not wearing socks, my feet do sweat in them and they kind of slip around So socks are a good choice
My husband stated if I buy him crocs to get him a wild color so I got 12W/10M pink lemonade. It was luck that these were the Made in Vietnam crocs that seem to be true to US size.

Bought it for the wife to wear while doing yard work.  She wanted it because it was easy to wear yet provide protection for her toes.  So far she has been very happy with it.  We leave it on the deck so hopeful it lasts.

review_title: He's a good man and helped me during a time of distress ...
review_text: These shoes are made from some strange space age material unknown to mankind before this.  Despite hiking miles upon miles through the Himalayan mountains of Afghanistan for years on end, there is so far no signs of wear.  The tactical nature of the color scheme of this pair in particular will without a doubt protect my feet from being discovered by ISIS-K or the Taliban during my trek through the Afghan arid mountains and beyond. I bought this second pair not to replace my current Crocs but to bless some random Sherpa who needs a solid shoe whom I came across during my travels.  He's a good man and helped me during a time of distress and need, this is the absolute least I could do.

review_title: Bought matching ones for all my friends and it was the best idea ever!
review_text: How can you not love Crocs?! I bought matching pairs for our entire friend group so we could all wear them and match for our adventures over the weekend. We got them in the Grass Green color just to be obnoxious and we got lots of compliments and comments when we were out and about! The green color is very very bright, but it's just what we wanted. This is the second pair of Crocs I own and I with I owned 100 more pairs in every color they make! (I spent way too much money ordering 6 pairs of Grass Green Crocs so.... Crocs if you'd like to sponsor me.... thanks. You won't be let down.)

i wear a womans 11 but ordered it in a 12 b/c the 11 was just a tad too short and maybe if i would of worn them around they might of squished out but i was nervous. They are a nice fit and plenty wide!

I bought these for my husband to use while moving irrigation pipes in tall grass fields.  The seeds don't stick to them like they did to his regular shoes.  They can be washed off easily.  The reason for one less star is that he wears a 9 1/2 shoe and these don't come in half sizes so I ordered a size 10 and they are a little large.  But they still work well and he hasn't had a problem with them falling off.  It would be great if Crocs would make half sizes for all.

I have ordered the Unisex Crocs from Amazon before and this Pepper red one looks just like the tan pair that I have and both were made in Mexico. But this pair is slightly smaller and the arch support does not appear to be the same as in my older pair.  I love the color as it was exactly what I was looking for, but I do think the size it a bit smaller that my old ones.  I can wear these (7w/5m) but would have liked the slightly larger size better.

review_title: Good for old folks and people with Kankles.
review_text: I think they're ugly as sin..but they're good nonslip shoes for the elderly. When I see kids wearing them I cringe. I think to myself that my 90yr old mom wears them in the shower so she doesn't slip....chuckles....

review_title: Comfortable, versatile shoe at great price
review_text: This is a great price for crocs. I bought a pair of these when I didn't have comfortable shoes with me while visiting family and they were so great that when I got home I ordered a pair on Amazon for home. They're a comfortable shoe for taking walks, and when I happened to be without lake shoes one day, I used them in the lake when I was swimming with my toddlers. They were excellent lake shoes.

The packaging was terrible. The shoes arrived in a shipping BAG. I was expecting a BOX. The shoes were deformed upon arrival. I feel the deformation will relax over time and use, but other than that, they're great.

I use these for changing and showering at my workplace locker room.  I like that there are no exposed pores for biological growth.  Only down side is puddling water, which is fixed by raising your toes and dumping out water.

Really glad when crocs came around. On tile a lot in AZ! Not the best for support, But at the end of an 8 hr. day my feet feel best when I am wearing crocs.Be careful when the soles wear down. They get slippery on wet pavement, like a rained upon paved sidewalk.I have to replace mine every 6 months- a year. Of course I am wearing them practically all the time during the day, mostly indoors.Good price for Prime Member. Ordered navy too. Color doesn't matter as much to me, as how my feet feel at the end of the day.However, I do have a pair that is higher end and I use sometimes when going out. Easy to slip in and out of, nice looking, and continued comfort during an evening out. .Been wearing crocs for over 5 years, almost every day.
I love crocs and it‚Äôs perfect. I was hesitant because I like to try them on before buying them but it‚Äôs a perfect fit. I love it and use it all the time. Won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Probably the ugliest shoes I've ever worn but the most comfortable. I was starting to get hip problems walking on my wood floors so I tried to find something I could wear indoors. I got a lot of recommendations for the Crocs, I figured it wouldn't hurt to give them a shot since I'd be wearing them only inside the house. They were so comfortable I've been wearing them outside while walking the dogs and to the grocery store. I definitely wouldn't wear them for anything besides that though lol.

review_title: They're perfect for what I needed them for.
review_text: These work for exactly what I needed! I bought them for a camping trip and loved the fact that I could just rinse them off when they got dirty! I've worn them since around the house when I just wanted to throw something on.  I even wore them to the movies...not exactly the most stylish shoes, but they're comfortable!

I bought these for my daughter who wears a size 8 and they are a little big and floppy. She‚Äôs still wearing them but she loves them so she‚Äôs keeping them I just wish I‚Äôd a gotten a size 7 instead of 8 because those would have fit so much better

I have a different pair from the classic Crocs and they are really comfortable these ones have little bumps in the sole so if you're not used to them they can be uncomfortable if you have sensitive feet. I love the color was true to the picture. Definitely worth the money.

My husband, who's been wearing crocs for years, loves this shoe; he especially likes the little nubs/ridges on the inside of the shoe sole, which keep his feet from slipping around when wet. Previous designs haven't always had that feature.

review_title: Bought as a gift for a friend
review_text: My friend has very large, wide feet for a women. She had purchased a pair of knockoffs at a discount store, same size, and had to return them because her toes bumped/rubbed the front of the shoe. This was not noticed at the store, but she gave them a good workout on carpeting (to protect the shoes in case she did have to return them) at home and found them to be uncomfortable. She gave the Crocs the same workout and was delighted by the fit and comfort. And as a bonus her favorite color is blue. And the knockoffs only came in black. So I gave a great gift, my friend has happy feet, and we had a great birthday party.  It has been several months since her bithday, she wears them every day after work. Still very happy with the Crocs.

These are the best for wearing around the house and outside.  They are much better than regular house slippers. They have great cushioning for the heel and ball of the foot, as long as you aren't walking on rocks. They arch support is good. These are about my fifth pair, and they usually last me a couple years. I don't know what I would do without them. üòâüëç

For wearing around the house or the campsite. Can't go wrong with these super light, well gripping, comfortable Crocs.  I always avoided Crocs because of the look....but finally gave it a go because of my friends recommendation.  No regrets!

review_title: Fit right and what he wanted
review_text: My partner wanted these to slip on when he goes out of the apartment for brief periods, so wanted something to slip on that was inexpensive. Fit as expected and meets his requirements, he would never wear them out, so not a good person to assess their ‚ÄúCrocness‚Äù/

I wear a women‚Äôs size 9 and that‚Äôs what I ordered. They are true to size. If you‚Äôre between sizes, I‚Äôd go up a size rather than down. The quality is great. I ordered the purple color and they are just like the picture. Super comfortable and easy to slip on and off.

Finally it was the right ones. The ones I received are made in Mexico. I don‚Äôt know if this means anything but just letting y‚Äôall know. The rubber is nice and comfy on my feet and can‚Äôt wait to dip em in the lake.

review_title: Don‚Äôt knock them till you try them!
review_text: I have to say that I‚Äôve knocked Crocs for a very long time but they‚Äôre super comfortable and great for running around town, cleaning, etc. I‚Äôd never wear them to work but that‚Äôs because I‚Äôd be embarrassed, hahaha. They‚Äôre great shoes!

I will give these 5 stars bc they are amazing, but I want give 4.5 bc they do run small BUT ONLY BC the band makes it that way. I've always been a women's 9 in the classic fit, but I guess feet grow. I ordered a 9 and the band makes them too small, should have ordered up one size. If you wear them without the heel band than the fit is no issue.Updated a few minutes later: I actually tried on my 6 year old 9 size pair, and they fit perfectly, band or no band. Hmmm.

I've lost track of how many pairs of Crocs I've bought for my eleven year old daughter over the years. She has wide feet and these fit her very comfortably. The color is cute without being too obnoxiously bright.

Great fit! Originally purchased them for my daughter to after softball games and practice. They are so comfortable she wears them all the time. Feet feel supported and they are the perfect width. 10/10 would recommend.

Crocs are great for those of us with foot issues.  They aren‚Äôt the prettiest but when your feet hurt you don‚Äôt care about fashion. I have owned many pairs of crocs. This style isn‚Äôt my favorite (the Mary Jane style is my favorite) but they serve the purpose. I am on my feet all day. In this style I should have ordered an 8 to have room for thick socks. I am keeping them and will wear thin socks. In the Mary Jane style a 7 is fine. I normally wear a 7-71/2. I recommend them if you are looking for comfort.

review_title: A little big, but great buy
review_text: This was a great deal and cheaper than buying them in store. My first pair of crocs and now I have three, two of which came from amazon. They did seem a little big though, but with the back strap it works fine for me. I usually wear and 11.5 and got these in 11. Still a little big. I wish they had 10.5.

review_title: For me the others fit just a little better. But there is absolutely nothing wrong with this ...
review_text: Ok to be honest I had never worn this type of shoe and was told each style although doesnt look much different they all fit differently. So, I ordered these and another style/comfort. For me the others fit just a little better. But there is absolutely nothing wrong with this style. I loved the color and the fit was good but others just a little better. I would still order these again at some time. Easy return.

I bought these for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them. Very speedy delivery too! They are true to size and very comfortable. He wears them hiking, riding, and even to work when it is too hot for boots. All around great product!

My husband, who swore to never own a pair of crocs, thinks these are the greatest shoe EVER.  He can quickly slip them on to go outside or run a quick errand.  I ordered the khaki so they would go with pretty much anything.  Overall, he loves the comfort and convenience and I cannot imagine this will be his last pair.  He wears a size 13 and they fit true to size.

Having been a Crocs purchaser for the last 10 years, I decided to buy a pair for my mother who is 87 years old. She has short, wide feet, and difficulty walking.  She loves these shoes. They are a great width, and so light weight, they are like walking barefoot.  She asked me to buy her a couple more styles.

I have had a pair of Crocs that have lasted MANY years.  These were purchased as a replacement.  Listed as the same size as my other ones, but these are smaller than my old ones - a bit shorter and quite a bit narrower.  They still fit, but much tighter so I wish I had bought one size larger.  Still a great product, you just may possibly may want to order a 1/2 or 1 size larger.

review_title: Great functional and comfortable shoe for work
review_text: No matter the stigma about Crocs, they don‚Äôt make a more comfortable shoe. As a big man with size 13-14 shoes depending on the brand, these have been great for work. I spend 13 hours, most of them on my feet, as a nurse, and have yet to come home with my ‚Äúdogs barking‚Äù since wearing these. Yes, I‚Äôve gotten a couple jokes about my styling, but I always counter with how comfortable and functional they are. Also, bedside nurses: when you get some body fluids on your Nikes or leather clogs, you probably can‚Äôt just hose them off, eh?

Incredibly comfortable, true to size, and easy to slip into. I use them for when I am working around the house but also will bring them to work in the winter when I remove my boots. I am a nurse but I work in a primary care office so this footwear works well. I love crocs and always will.

review_title: Crocs are back? Maybe they never left. Nice shoes for my kid!
review_text: Fit just right for my 12 y/o daughter. Size 6 seemed to be the same as her Nike shoes. Who knew she‚Äôd want Crocs, I thought there were no longer a thing, guess I‚Äôm wrong. Then she needed to dress them up with shoe jewelry, see photo.üòÇ

review_title: Can't go wrong with Crocs for comfort!!
review_text: I got the chambray color for my son's girlfriend. Added some birthday Jibbitz and she loves them! It's a really nice blue color, still somewhat neutral. She has a few pairs of crocs and I do too. Love crocs!

review_title: Regular Crocs are a very good casual shoe but sizing can be a challenge.
review_text: Although a good shoe, they run large.  In my, case I consistently wear size 12, but with Crocs, I need to order size 11 which is tight but, fortunately, loosens up with time.
Crocs are surprisingly supportive, light  and versatile. I‚Äôve used them for gardening, swimming, backpacking as a spare shoe for the campsite.  These are bright purple, what could be better?

My wife loves her Crocs so I bought a pair for working around the house. They are very well made and purposeful shoes. The only minor grip is they rub the tops of my toes a bit after wearing for awhile.

Never been a fan of crocs but jumped on the wagon when I purchased them for the family. Love the color, they are comfortable. My only issues is that my size is a bit bigger than I would expect so my feet slide a bit.

The minute I got these lime-green Crocs, I put them on and hit the street. I was standing on the corner waiting for the light to change. A woman leaned out of her car window and hollered at me. She said, "Nice Crocs."
LOVE LOVE LOVEMy hubby says they‚Äôre dorky,  but I love them and so do my feet!! Easy to slip on and off. So comfy. Will buy more in different colors. Great for Florida weather.

I love Crocs and had a pair I had worn out so I bought this pair.  When they arrived I couldn't get my foot in them.  After double checking, the old ones were made in Mexico and these are made in Viet Nam.  The return and reorder was seamless, but if I were to order again I would go up 2 sizes instead one 1.  These pair I ended up with seemed a little more narrow but I'm hoping to stretch them out!

review_title: Size/Fit varies on certain colors. Love them.
review_text: I got the colors white, baby pink, and lavender. The white and pink crocs were just right for my foot. I am usually a size women 8.5 but since there is not 8.5 i sized up to a 9 women. The lavender crocs were also a 9 but they were bigger than the other two pairs. I could still wear the lavender ones with the strap pushed to the back. Love them.

Love the color.  I ordered 12, since that is the size I wear in all other brands.  Wore them this morning first time to walk on the beach and they rubbed blisters on my inner ankles.  I should have ordered a size 11.  Luckily, they fit my husband who normally wears a men‚Äôs 12. He‚Äôs happy with new navy Crocs.

If you don't care about what people think about your fashion sense these are the most comfortable shoes to buy ever. plus when they get dirty you can wear them in the shower or wash them in the sink. as you wear them the rubber will wear down and mold to the shape of your foot which only makes them even more comfortable. a pair will provide about 2-3 years of frequent use before the rubber becomes too thin and you step on a thorn that gets stuck in your foot for about a week.

I love this product! I have to change shoes often for school and these make it so much easier to go to school and then just slip them off and put my sneakers on for class. Great time saver in the morning in the fact that I do not have to tie shoes and can simply just slip them on and go!!

Love the color and the shoe is so comfy!  I see myself buying another pair in a different color. I need my knees replaced and they hurt most of the time. The Crocs help with my knee pain. I can do housework and yard work longer without the pain!

I like the fact that this company hasn‚Äôt messed with this original style. It‚Äôs been great from the start and they haven‚Äôt changed a thing. Perfect for just about everything. Hose off and good to go.

review_title: Super comfortable and the color is true!
review_text: My daughter bought these for me as a gift. Intended for outdoor gardening and whatnot in the summer. As soon as I put them on I fell in love with them. I would never have purchased this color for myself. I am so glad she selected it for me because I love the color so much they are fun bright and perfect. I do feel that they are a little pricey but I guess it is expected. I really do like them.
I was amazed by the quality, The price was competitive to similar items and what I would consider affordable, I would definitely re-purchase and recommend to others.

review_title: Perfect for outside & love the COLOR!
review_text: I love my crocs! Such a cute color and perfect for the backyard!! Seriously wear them everyday!

I love these shoes. I wear them as house. Great for working in the kitchen and getting chores done. They are incredibly light weight and comfortable. The back strap keeps them in place but they are still super easy on and off. Highly recommend for house shoes or regular shoes. Maybe just not when you‚Äôre trying to be too stylish üòâ

I got the navy color and I'm so happy I didn't go with the black ones. Great color and quality. Mine are made in Mexico and I'm normally a women's 8-8.5. I got a 9 and I thought the size was a little too big when I first slipped my foot into them but they're perfect. Getting an 8 would have been a mistake. Just enough room with a 9 and stays on your foot with or without sports mode.
Our daughter just started college and has been wanting yellow Crocs for years! She finally treated herself, as she worked her guts out at a fast food job all summer. So proud of her! She LOVES them!

I have always loved crocs but it‚Äôs been years since I ordered myself a pair. Ordered this as a late late Mother‚Äôs Day gift to myself. I most definitely will be ordering myself another pair in the very near future

My daughter wanted a pair of crocs for Christmas. We got these for her and she couldn‚Äôt be happier! The size is accurate (she wears a nine and we ordered her a nine) and she LOVES the color. They were cheaper on Amazon than any of the local shoe stores.

I love these shoes they are so comfortable. Both of my daughters wear them and I finally got some for myself so glad that I did. I wear them especially for my part time job at a grocery store and they give me great support

They're Crocs - what more is there to say? I got these for my son for Christmas, personally I think they are really ugly shoes, but hey, its what he wanted and he likes them. Are they comfy and have good arch support? I seriously doubt it, but like i said....theyre Crocs.

I‚Äôve had several pair of these as probably many of you have and really enjoy them.. I‚Äôve also worn them fishing many times.While fishing, I took them off and they sat in the hot sunshine. When I put them back on I noticed they had shrunk. Yes the rubber shrunk. No my feet did not grow anymore thanks goodness. A 14 is big enough. This is just a precaution for you fisherman. üòÅ

I don‚Äôt care that people think Crocs are ugly. This is my second pair, which I bought because the first pair were practically indestructible as well as being extremely comfortable. The only downside for me is that they can make your feet hot and sweaty if you wear them for too long. You could wear socks with them, but for the love of God, don‚Äôt do that out of the house.

I use my crocs for runs to the mailbox, taking the dog out and taking the trash out. The bottoms have good traction. Very important to stay upright in old age. I wear them all year long. Can put socks on in cooler weather. I even wear them occasionally for working in the yard.  Love my crocs. The size 6/8 fit my 8 1/2 foot perfectly.

Absolutely Love These Crocs.  Wish I had purchased them years ago. They are so comfortable, supportive and easy to clean, just rinse off.  Great for shopping, walking, cleaning, etc.  I highly recommend these.

These are so comfy and perfect for what I was looking for. They are great inside and they are great to slip on to wear outside! I love that they are almost 2 shoes in one with the strap either up or down in the back. I hope they last forever!
He needed something to keep at the door for walking the dog in the morning and at night.  We bought the lined ones for cold weather, but these are handy to slip on and off

When I finally wore out my last pair of Crocs I didn't want the new ones. I liked the slipper feel and the at home pair of shoes I'd come to depend on. So I did what I always do went to online and sure enough found the exact pair I had before. Fit likr a glove, and no doubt will be with me for another 5 years!

review_title: LOVE my crocs for years...don‚Äôt judge
review_text: they‚Äôre great for sports, just running an errand, or to an outdoor pool party. WHATEVER YOU WANT! the colored ones are great and very close to the pictures for anyone wondering (I have friends who ordered colored ones from here) but I personally got black. one thing to be careful about...if you leave them in the sun they might shrink!!!

I live with various pets and can't walk around barefoot, so I bought these to be able to move about without having to put on socks and shoes. They wear comfortably, fit true to size and seem like they'll last me for years.Price is good, so I'd buy another pair or two if I needed to.

They get the job done. Comfortable, slip-on/slip-off. They look like plastic in the picture but the material is more like a stiff foam. My dog loves chewing on them but they're surprisingly resilient to his big sharp teeth. Everyone makes fun of me when I wear them. A+

I always size down with crocs. I normally wear an 11 womens, I purchased a 10 in the classic croc clogs. They fit perfect, even with footie socks. I work in the healthcare field, these offer all day comfort.

review_title: Great lightweight support as a house shoe. Great summer shoe for kids too.
review_text: Great summer shoe for the kids. Too bad our kids‚Äô feet grow so fast, as these are durable. Love a quick wash in the dishwasher gets them clean. For me they offer great lightweight support around the house.

review_title: My daughter absolutely squealed with joy when she opened them up!
review_text: My college daughter asked for ‚Äúthese‚Äù yellow Crocs specifically! She even pointed to which item before I ordered. She must have forgotten about them(or thought I wouldn‚Äôt get them(because they are just not one my own personal favorite styles), buecause she just about squealed when she opened them up! She LO just loves them, and they were a winner in Christmas Day!!!ü§©

I love crocs and wear them on the daily. They work well for my flat feet, theyre nice to wear when going somewhere it might be wet, and they provide just enough support to do the few miles worth of walking I do every day going to and from classes.

review_title: Always buy one size smaller for Crocs range
review_text: If you are buying Crocs always buy a size smaller. For example if your size is UK8 then choose the corresponding size for UK7. My regular size for the shoes and footwear I buy are UK9 and followed the same for Crocs. However it was oversized for me. Hence I bought a size smaller and it fit well. Rest the footwear fits and feels good on feet with its lightweight structure.
These are my favorite shoe. They are comfy cute and last for a long time.

Very comfortable. Some shoes you have to break in but these seem to already have been broken in. Don't worry about blisters either which is something that always happens with new shoes. Not these ones.
Soy 7.5 y los ordene 8 y me quedaron super bien. Me encantan

bought these for my 17 year old daughter who really likes crocs.. she loves them.. so that's what matters!  I think the fit is about right. but it was a little bit different than a different pair of crocs she has.. her black ones that I bought at the store are a womens 8 so I ordered that in the white and they were way to huge.. and bigger than her black ones. so we sent them back and got her the womens size 7 and they fit her perfectly..
I am a long time fan of classic crocs....they are SO comfortable, easy to clean, priced reasonably so one can purchase several pairs in various colors and prints!  I wear them everywhere!!!

review_title: Happy customer! Fun shoes - love them!
review_text: I wear a women's size 11 M and that is what I ordered. They are roomier as stated in the company's description, but, I like it because I can wear socks with them when I need to. With just my bare feet, I feel they are just fine for my needs. So very comfortable! LOVE the purple. Fast delivery - great service!

These shoes are so light weight. They are wonderful. They are comfortable for a 12 hour day. Not too tight. Leaves room for the little bit of swelling at the end of the shift and as song as socks are worn there is no sweat. I would recommend.
Order smaller than you wear normally. I wear a 15w shoe, and my feet were swimming in the size 15 crocs. Could have even tried a size 13 for a real snug fit.

My wife loved the shoes but they were smaller than she thought they would be. She has other shoes the same size that fit her well. Hated to return them. I gave them 5 stars because they were as advertized. Under normal circumstance, she may have been able to "break them in" by wearing for a while. She has sever neuropathy from chemo and the shoes cannot be tight because of the pain. Amazon was great to work with us with the return.
I bought these shoes to be an easy slip-on while I did outside chores.  They are great for that. They are heavy enough that the rocks in the driveway don't bother my feet and they are easy to clean.

Great product! My daughter was so jealous of the black pair that I ordered for myself, she just had to have her own pair. White seems to be the color of choice for her age group (6th grade) and not only does she love them, but now she feels included in some way among her peers. Thank you!!

These run a little big just like Crocs from the store so I ordered accordingly. They fit my daughter perfectly. She wears size 5.5Y or 6Y in Mens and I ordered her a size 5 Mens Crocs and they fit perfectly. Thank you

I am not normally a Crocs fan because there is zero arch support, but I needed a pair to accomodate the compression wraps on my feet, which I had to wear for over a month. I ordered up a couple of sizes, thanks to the handy measurement guide provided. They have worked out fabulously, and the price was just right where I was comfortable, considering I won't be wearing them for long. And surprisingly, I've not had any back issues or a flare in my plantar fasciitis, so mabye the arch support is sufficient enough after all. I'm actually considering ordering a pair of the wooly style for the winter!
Came as described. Great product. Color was ballerina pink and was exactly what was described. Sizing was 6, what is normally worn, and was a true fit. W

review_title: Crocs cost too much but dang they work!
review_text: My kids mock me for wearing them, but I don't care. My last pair lasted 11 years until I made the mistake of leaving them outside on a hot day in the sun. Public Service Announcement: Crocs SHRINK. So you have to replace them. And they are pretty dang expensive, if you ask me. But as long as you don't let them sunbathe they will probably last forever.

review_title: More firm than ones bought in the past.
review_text: Compared them side by side with exact same style I bought two years ago and about the only difference is the new ones are more firm. I had always liked the cushion of crocs in the past. I guess they are trying to make them last even longer.

I would highly recommend getting these Crocs for everyday use. They are comfortable and breathable. My only issue with them was that they rubbed the side of my feet a little raw, but granted I was walking in them for 12 hours a day for work. They work as a great leisure shoe.

review_title: Fit my wide feet and were very comfortable.
review_text: I had always thought Crocs were rather unattractive shoes and didn't understand how and why people would wear them. Then I retired, bought a power washer, and badly needed some outdoor shoes that could handle the water and still give me the traction to push the mower. (I did NOT want to get my nice athletic shoes all wet and green from the grass.) A shoe store associate directed me to the Croc. I knew the Croc was a wider shoe and only came in whole sizes. So I ordered an 8 even though I wear an 8.5. This shoe fit my wide feet perfectly and was very comfortable. I love, love, love that I don't have to worry about getting dirt, water, soap, grass stains, etc. on these shoes because I can just wash them off with the hose. In the meantime, my athletic shoes stay in pristine condition. THEN, I started wearing the Crocs around the house while cleaning and running up and down the stairs doing laundry. I am even considering wearing them when I run to the grocery store or gym!! Another bonus is that these shoes come in a variety of attractive colors,
So comfortable! These crocs are super cute and super fun! They are totally worth it and came quickly. I recommend these!

I have quite recently fallen in love with Crocs. It first began when taking the kids to their swimming class and needed a shoe to wear that was designed to be low maintenance and water-friendly. This is the perfect shoe for any errand, kid‚Äôs class, gardening, you name it.

review_title: GET REAL CROCS-will save you $ in the end!!
