review_text: SOOOO happy I got the real crocs again! This summer I went With a cheap brand for using by pool and hot tub! They were awful! Far too small even tho I sized up and foot bed was slippery! Was holding out hoping to find my old crocs that were at least 10 years old but still wore well! Must have lost in a move or left somewhere! Finally have my comfy crocs again! Headed to my hot tub now! Worth the $$!

Bought 3 pair (2 Lemon and 1 Ballerina Pink) because I LOVE Crocs.  Most comfortable, durable footwear ever!  Bought these colors because for some reason they were on great sales - $15 to $20 off the normal $45 price.  In the past I've only bought Navy and Black and thought I shouldn't buy a product I'm crazy about in colors I normally wouldn't buy -- but I love them.  In my opinion, you can't go wrong with any color.

Sizing is way off on these but I really like the color! Shoe ended up being a half size too small in one color and a half size too big in another color despite ordering the same size in both. Thankfully with crocs i can shrink the too big shoe, but the smaller one will have to be used as a house shoe.

So my dog chewed up my old crocs (they were cheap knock offs anyway) so I decided to go w these bc I liked the color. These are awesome. Fit is good. I wear an 8 and bought an 8...they are a little rough on bare feet, but not unbearable. I'm sure to get many many years out of these...as long as I keep the dog away!!
My hubby wore these in the hospital for comfy shoes when we had our baby girl! The nurses loved them! He still wears them around 4 months later. He seems to love them!

These crocs are perfect for all terrain. They slip on easy and slip off just as easy. Great product for around the house activities. They may feel stiff at first but just like any other shoe they will get less stuff the more you wear.

I wore my last pair of Crocs for about 15 years!  Yes!  That's a really long time.  They finally punctured through the sole when I was stomping around on turf never meant for Crocs.  So finding the very same pair for a mucho cheapo price was just a killa find.  Same Croc, same fit, same ooo-baby-these-are-gonna-last-till-I-croak!  Thank you!  Couldn't be happier.
My son needed shower shoes for college.  Didn't want flip-flops.  He chose these and now wont stop wearing them.  He has had foot pain in past - these don't bother his arches or ankles.

Bought a pink pair for myself, and then my mom and brother wanted some so I bought them some too and we all love our crocs! They're super comfortable, and I love that they're very easy to clean! We went on vacation and these shoes were so convenient to have with us because we were doing many aquatic activities. Fit true to size.

review_title: I Hate Crocs - but my Daughter LOVES this.
review_text: Crocs are some of the stupidest, most ugly looking shoes ever, but my teen daughter loves them. What do you say, if you are interested - they are light, comfortable, easy to wear - but so, so, so ugly. Enjoy!

This was my first pair of Crocs.  I‚Äôve had them for 3 weeks and it‚Äôs been the last thing I‚Äôve worn since I‚Äôve put them on.  I cannot believe how comfortable these things are.  Seriously my new favorite footwear.  I usually wear a 12.5 but got 13 because of my wide feet.  They‚Äôre are true to size and wear a little big but I like that.

Always teased people that wore crocs because...eel they are Crocs ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èAs soon as I put these on, they were SOOO comfortable.I won‚Äôt wear them outside or in public, but they are my new house shoes.

Crocs were deep garnet which is what I expected.  If you wear men's 10-11 tennis shoe you will want to order a 9 men's.  Crocs are durable and comfortable with plenty (too much) room at the toe area.  They are a wide shoe.  Suggest trying on at a brick and mortar before attempting to order online

Bought these for my daughter and she loves them! She says they are comfortable and fit perfect. She wears a 9 in tennis shoes and she ordered the same, so they must fit normally. They also shipped fast which was nice.

Honestly still love these as much as I did when I was a kid. I wear these for gardening, on short walks, long drives, grocery stopping. Even wore them during child birth. Most comfortable multipurpose shoes ever!

My Husband & I both have a pair of these Crocs and they're so versatile and comfortable! We really love them! Ordered a pair for my elderly Mother and she's delighted with them! So easy to wear and they wash up with water! A great gift for anyone!
Feel well-made and strangely comfortable.  Bought for a quick slip-on to fetch mail, take out garbage, run the kids to an appointment.  Appreciate the hinging back-strap.

These are the plainest, most basic, low end Crocs I could find (khaki color). I just needed something to wear around the yard and in the chicken coop. I needed something that water, mud, and chicken poop couldn‚Äôt mess up. These work perfect. Easy on and easy off. Spray them off with a water hose to clean them.
I'm officially part of the Croc craze...aside from the plastic spikes which sometimes acts as micro foot massagers, I'm loving them. Definitely will purchase again.

review_title: living my best life with my crocs
review_text: i used to be a hater and now i am fully converted. there is no place i will go without my crocs. people around you will probably advise against getting them, your friends will threaten to socially outcast you‚Äîbut have no fear, these crocs will win them over too. they're squishy, comfortable, breathable, nonslip, AND you can accessorize them with little rubber charms called jibbitz. live your best life in crocs.
Extremely comfortable and supportive for my foot. I wear them around the house. A thousand times better than regular slippers. They grip the floor. Easy to get on and off. They run a little big.

Well to be honest never got the hype about Crocs. Now I'm obsessed and they are so comfy. I even bought charms for them... you read it right, I even bought charms. A great purchase and well recommended to others.

Everyone wanted to take them from the Birthday guy. He said the fit was great. I thought they would be cheesy, but the only thing cheesy was the pkg. It came in a sucky bag that hangs open, not even resealable, no slide closure, no handles etc & Crocs deserve better. I just ordered generic slippers & they were immaculately bagged ijs.

My husband needed some shoes to slip on when our dog needed to potty or take a stroll in our neighborhood.  It's a task to even find shoes to fit his large feet. I ordered the size he wears and they fit just fine.  Helpful, honest, informed comments are the path to purchases.They are absolutely perfect, not in the beauty sense,  practical was my goal, mission accomplished. It's nice to have his crocs waiting patiently beside mine.

I bought these to relieve sciatica. They are working well and I adore the color!  I have received numerous compliments on them in just about one week of having them. Great purple color!  Love the loose fit, as it does not set off any foot nerve pain.

I'd wanted crocs for over a year now, but thought that the price was a bit high. I kept telling myself that if they go under $35 I'd buy a pair. FINALLY, this specific color went under my price limit and I was able to buy them. I was super happy to finally order them. I also ordered croc charms (I was going all in). Since then I have received multiple compliments for my crocs. I just love theeemmmm. They're super comfortable and wish I could wear them everywhere.

My favorite shoes! I ordered my normal size in shoes (womens size 9) It's a great deal for the quality. I wear them almost daily since I got them a couple of months ago and there's only a little noticable wear and tear. I'm coming back here when this pair wears out.

Need to run to the mailbox?  Have a quick trip to the store for milk you need to make?  Want to social distance on your driveway with other neighbors?  Then these are your shoes!  I vowed I'd never own Crocs, but here we are...

I‚Äôve been avoiding crocs for years because they are so ugly. But we got my teenage son a pair and I tried them on. I was surprised that they fit my wide feet. And we‚Äôre so comfortable. I found a good price on a color I could live with on Amazon. I like these a lot. I see why they are so popular.

review_title: Get Crocs while you still can.  They are awesome!
review_text: Crocs rock!  Get them while you can, as heard they may stop making them.  They are comfortable, durable, and great especially in the summer as I use them A LOT when going to the lake or the beach.  They are also the perfect shoe to wear when flying as they are so easy to take off for airport screening.  Get them now.  :-)

This Christmas I bought pair each for my teen twins. I honestly think they are ugly. But my girls love them. Matched a few outfits to go with these bright ‚Äúbig bird‚Äù shoes. Well they love them. That‚Äôs what matters. The size is perfect.

I just got these, and they were WAY too big! I normally wear a 14 wide, ordered the 14 men's, and they're just gigantic. I can tell they're going to be comfortable when they fit properly though! Exchanging for a smaller size.UPDATE: I got the exchange pair the very next day! Size 13, and they fit great! Thank you Amazon!

review_title: Same great shoe, but the size chart has changed
review_text: When I first bought these Crocs years ago, I sized up a full size. I bought another pair a few weeks ago, and they fit the same.But these most recent black Crocs seem to fit differently. An 8 seems to be a true 8.

Omg I was so scared to Oder these because I hate ordering shoes online but after reading a few reviews I went ahead & ordered & im so glad I did. I wear a size 7boys 9women & that‚Äôs the size I ordered & they fit just right! Will be ordering more!

review_title: My girlfriend hates them. They're amazing.
review_text: Got these for my girlfriend a while back. she looked at me and said "I'm never going to put those on, they're not allowed in my house." But guess what...they're in her house, and she has at lest 30 minutes of time in them over the last 6 months.

I love this color of crocs! I‚Äôm a 7 1/2-8 in other shoes, but in crocs I always go with a women‚Äôs 7. My toe‚Äôs are at the top but not in an uncomfortable way. The 8‚Äôs are just too roomy and wide for me to walk around in.Also getting this color for less than 30 bucks is a STEAL!!
We love Crocs and having a black pair just makes life easier. They are comfortable to knock around it and the fact that you can wipe them off is the best.

I had purchased this in black first when that color was on sale. When i saw the blue marked down, I had to get another pair. I wear them in the house and out. Light weight, airy and comfortable. Very good  product

review_title: They are comfortably roomy but stay on my feet fine
review_text: I had tried 2 other plastic type clogs and they didn't work well for me at all.  These Crocs do.  They don't push down on the tops of my feet.  They are comfortably roomy but stay on my feet fine.  And they provide some cushioning and support for soles of feet, which I need.  I am very happy with them and will order more when these start to wear out.

You really need to try some of these on at a store initially,  to get a sense of what your shoe size will be. Authentic Crocs are great, comfortable and durable. Buying them through this vendor cost about half what we paid for our initial pair at a "shoe boutique". I'd recommend the Crocs and this vendor as a great combination of dependability and quality product.

My husband loves how easy and comfortable his crocs are!  What I love even better is that they don't stink - EVER.  He's on his second pair in 4 years and they just don't ever smell.  I used to have to make him throw his summer sandels away regularly especially if he got them wet putting our boat in the lake.  Lake water just does something to sandels and flip flops - they would stink so bad I could smell them from across the room.  Not his Crocs though!  Every weekend in and out of the lake water, worn while mowing the lawn, going for a walk, whatever - and they just don't stink.  These are worth every penny!

Love these crocs, I got the lavender color and there beautiful and they fit perfect. I wear them everywhere I go. Very comfortable, waterproof, and breathable. I would totally buy another if I needed too.

These crocs are the bomb dot com. I wear them to work everyday(I'm a vet tech) and they are amazing. If I get something gross on them, no worries! I just run them under the faucet. They're nice and squishy and my feet feel amazing at the end of the day. They're also damn sexy. Crocs for life baby!
OK, I am an old guy, and could care less that these shoes are not stylish. But--the slide on easily; stay put; slip off smoothly, and are waterproof. No laces. No hassle.
Size should be determined by the measurements of your foot NOT your shoe size. Typically a 9.5 men‚Äôs shoe, but based on the size chart a size 9 Croc & fits perfectly.

My daughter is a Croc fanatic.  The classic croc is still her favorite.  Lost track of how many different styles and colors she has.  The next color on her list was the orange.  Color is nice and vibrant and the shoe fits just as we expected..PERFECT!

I absolutely love the classic crocs. They are so comfortable to wear, I have owned many pair over the years. Most recently my teenagers have been begging me for a pair. I ordered them each a pair in white. They love them because they are so convenient to wear to swim practice and swim meets. Easy to slip on before going outside to run around. They are easy to wash. They are comfy. I seriously love crocs and so does the rest of my family.

I guess Crocs has sized down. I usually wear an 8 in Crocs. Put these size 8‚Äôs I ordered against my old size 8‚Äôs, and they‚Äôre much smaller. Had to send back. The size 9‚Äôs weren‚Äôt available unless a shipping charge, so had to buy from a local store.

Never thought I‚Äôd like crocs and then I bought this pair for a mudding event to use as a cheap pair of footwear that washes easy and would stay on nicer than flip flops, turns out I like them for every day use.. They were so great i had to get insulated crocs and they are life!! 2 wheel drive or 4 wheel drive, they are still comfortable

review_title: Go down one size to fit correctly
review_text: I love the shoes but however they are a little bit too big.... I would say if you like your shoes to fit properly go down a size these shoes run a bit big.... However they are very comfortable and look cute.

This is worth the price - this is my second pair of Crocs, and I've had two other pairs of the "off" brands to compair to.  My first pair of Crocs lasted 2 years of wearing them EVERYWHERE!!  The Brand X last 6 months for one pair and 9 months for another.  These are well worth the price.  Now, the comfort.  My first pair took me a bit to get used to the 'nubs' on the bottom...I had to wear socks for the first couple of months but with socks or without socks, they were the most comfortable - I took a trip with a Youth Group Geo-caching in San Francisco and if you've ever been geo-caching, you know that you walk and walk and walk - I must have logged over 6 miles in the 3 hours, up hills and down and my feet felt wonderful.  These are great!

review_title: Thy shoe is bred for greatness
review_text: I use these for work. They are comfortable and water proof. Well not completely but just enough. Surprisingly slip resistant. I love these things. The best shoe I have owned in a while. Since I put them on I haven‚Äôt stopped picking them even when I‚Äôm not working

Not the first pair of crocs I've had, so this was exactly what was expected. Just be certain you're ordering the correct pair. This particular pair has the holes around the toes whereas some are completely enclosed. Make sure to order what you prefer.

review_title: Great buy if you‚Äôre into crocs
review_text: Bought this for my daughter. I don‚Äôt get the croc fashion personally. I have a pair of blue crocs that I use for yard work, but would never wear outside the house. They look well made and she loves them! So to each their own I guess.

review_title: and I've heard croc's are bad for people with high arches but these shoes are ...
review_text: I've got a high arch, and I've heard croc's are bad for people with high arches but these shoes are incredibly comfortable. Most of the pressure on my feet are the heels and the very end up of my foot, and with these shoes my feet feel great all day. I understand where people are coming from now when they say how comfortable they are. Other than that don't expect a fashion statement these shoes are fugly and are specifically comfort and convenience. (Looks good with scrubs, you might want to buy the crocs with a flat top though since most Hospitals won't let you have shoes with holes in them).

review_title: Likable tho the sizing is tricky 1/2 Size Feet
review_text: Softer than all the other crocs are the classic crocs. For someone who is a 9 and a half. The 9 was too small and the 10 just a bit too roomy. Go with the size up you in my opinion. The citrus color is a nice yellow tinted slightly green. So like a light chartreuse.
I have wide feet and these are awesome! I feel like these are the only shoes I can walk around in all day and not give pain! They fit great and give a bunch of arch support!
My daughter loves them! I got them for her she wants the colors she loves it and they‚Äôre really easy to clean when they get dirty. She‚Äôs obsessed and the quality is really nice.
This is my second pair of Crocs and I love the comfort and easy-to-slip on feature. They also provide good arch support  for me, as I have fairly flat arches.
These shoes are just as comfortable as my Birkenstocks. My foot measures 10 inches (from the tip of my big toe to the back of my heel) and size 9 Women‚Äôs fits perfect.

OK. I'm 61 years old and thought to myself, I'll never wear a pair of those goofy looking shoes. Looks like something an old Hippie would wear. But after seeing so many people over the years wearing them, and not hippies, mind you, I thought, maybe there's something to these things, so I bought a pair. The classics in khaki.Well it seems you can teach an old dog new tricks. I wear them everywhere. These are the most comfortable shoes I believe I've ever owned. So easy to slip on and kick off. And they stay on when your walking.Now I have this sudden urge to go listen to my "The Momma's and Pappa's" LP's.
Same good quality as the last pair I had.  Still have the last pair but wore down all the tread on the bottom and the nubs inside the shoe.  Time for a new pair.

I ordered a size 13 in the slate grey color. (I wear a 12.5) the shoes were a loose fit. In my city there is a physical crocs store and was able to exchange the shoes for a 13 in a different color and they fit perfect. Not sure if the sizing issue was due to the slate grey color or due to an issue elsewhere. The quality of the show I received was great.

review_title: these crocs are perfect, like no shoes on at all
review_text: My old crocs have lasted about 7 years and were starting to look a little ratty, so I decided to get a new pair, exactly the same but a different color.  I just wish there had been more color options available in my size, but that's ok.  For an old hippie who would prefer to go barefoot, these crocs are perfect, like no shoes on at all.  My old ones are still in good shape, so now they are just for around the house, my new ones are my "dress crocs" for going to town!

Who knew I‚Äôd ever buy another pair of crocs!! Love these! I am typically a solid 6.5, 7 in tennis shoes so I ordered a 6 after my roommate said they run big. Only thing I would change is posting where they were made as some soles are softer than others depending on if made in China or Vietnam.

review_title: They're super comfortable. They're the perfect shoes to wear to ...
review_text: I bought these shoes for my daughter to wear to the beach and pool!  She loves her Crocs!  The color, size, everything.  They're super comfortable. They're the perfect shoes to wear to an amusement park or water park.  Truthfully, they're not very stylish, but they are very comfortable.  I'm at the point in my life where I choose practicality over style sometimes!  As ugly as these shoes are, I think I'm going to myself a pair for the beach too.
Comfy! My sister loved them! She is a 6 size, ordered 6 and fits perfectly! They do not slip on wet floor. They are wide fit but you do not feel like your feet is unsecure.

review_title: Run large and no half sizes
review_text: These run a little large, and they don't make 1/2 sizes, that being said they are gardening shoes, or lounge shoes, so having them a little loose isn't a big deal.  They are surprisingly comfortable and I the color was vibrant.

review_title: If you are a half size, order the next size down. I am 6.5. I ordered a 6 for a perfect fit.
review_text: I can't believe I actually have a pair of these odd looking shoes. Trust me. If you garden these are fabulous! I love them.So easy to slide on and off when you are in and out of the house. I think they the most comfortable shoes I have ever put on my feet. I am so glad I bought the "real thing" and did not opt for a less expensive version. Once you put them on you will agree they are worth the extra pennies.I have the white pair. Rather chic I think!
I purchased these crocs for my mom who is 72 and has been diagnosed with MS since 1972. SHE LOVES them!  She can slip them on herself and she says they feel wonderful on her feet.
Crocs have been in my shoe collection for years.  This pair was bought for my husband and he has hardly worn any other shoe since he received these.  Loves them.

My better half has a foot/calf issue.  He needed the support as his old crocs were worn down.  I was afraid these were some knock off.  They aren't-they are real deal he wears them 24/7.  Good buy, thank you.

I love the comfort of crocs. And can tell the difference when I spend the day on my feet in those vs sneakers. As for the fit, I have narrow feet and crocs run wide on me. I also have to order a size UP from what I usually wear (size 8) because of the way the toe box angles towards the pinky toe. I think it might be because my middle toe is longest and my third is the same length as my first. But knowing that I order correctly and have multiple pairs. My family owns at least 10 pair of crocs!

review_title: Runs a little shorter than most
review_text: I am a perfect size 8 in most Crocs, but these are a little short and tight in the toes on my left foot, which is actually my shorter foot by almost 1/2 inch. Otherwise, good Croc quality.

My teen for some reason loves these shoes so I bought her a second pair. Her original pair are actually from The Croc Store so they are a bit over sized. When I bought this pair from Amazon they were true to size so they fit perfectly with no extra foot room although they were the same size as her first pair.  My daughter absolutely loves them and has no issues with them.

They're Crocs doing what Crocs do best. Light, comfy, sqishy. They're my go to for keeping in the car and changing out of boots or for running outside for a chore. They're so comfy I forget to change into my boots.

Even though i loathe these shoes, my boyfriend however, doesn't. He is a 10-10 1/2 and after reading reviews decided to size up, which was a mistake. The 11's were way too large, so we returned at a Crocs store for a 10 which was perfect. I guess depending on your size and width depends on which size to order.

I never thought I'd buy Crocs. They're ugly. But they were recommended by a friend and I love them. I have Plantar Fasciitis and I needed a pair of shoes I could wear everyday without pain. I would recommend Crocs for anyone with Plantar Fasciitis who wants relief from the condition who can't get into the doctor for some reason or another. They provide relief and my feet are not sore by the end of the day.For sizing, the reviews said they run large. I wear a women's size 9 and these size 9 Crocs fit perfectly. Slightly big, but not too big where my foot is sliding around, not tight at all. I wear them all day, and I want another pair just to change up the color.

Hemmm....this pair of Crocks are a little heavier than what I do have ... because,this is "made in China " and the lighter ones are "made in Mexico "...but please, overall this product is superb ...color , elegance and comfort are high standards... including the best price of the market ,retail and online....Thank you !!!Salute -Dante

Love my Crocs.  I wear them everywhere now.  Bought them for wear in the boat and around the landing but they are so comfortable.  Make sure to replace them when the bottom wears as they are very slick and you WILL slip on wet surfaces once they wear off the bottom ridges.
Good fit, nice look, very lightweight, waterproof but will not keep your feet dry. I appreciate how they protect my toes from bumps. Don't leave them in the bright warm sun - they can shrink!

perfect shoes, exactly what i wanted. rubber is extremely soft and comfy which is surprising because typically rubber hurts my skin. very breathable as well. order your normal size! I normally wear a 9 and their 9 fits me perfectly. i wore them outside and accidentally stepped on a large thorn, the shoes completely protected my feet and i didn't feel a thing. super strong and durable, would highly recommend :)

I‚Äôm a size 9.5 and they fit me pretty big. I went with 9 in mens but I probably could have went 8. I must say the strap definitely makes it have a snug fit. But there just more loose than I expected. I will most likely keep them, they look nice and are wearable.

review_title: Pay attention to the sizing, otherwise great
review_text: Bought a pair of these from another source and sized up to the nearest whole size since I wear a 9 1/2. Wrong move! Fortunately, another family member could use them. Amazon to the rescue again! Ordered the size 9 I needed and got them very quickly. Very happy with the fit and comfort of the correctly sized Crocs. They are now going to put a lot of miles on in my garden.

As someone who wears Crocs primarily, you cannot beat the Classic.  I love the vibrant color and the way they feel.  No problems cleaning.  Great for wearing in the yard or going to the grocery store.

Granddaughter is a CNA and on her feet 8 hours a day, she was getting blisters around her toes and her feet were killing her, so she decided to try these shoes, best thing she did, no more blisters and she says they are comfortable and her feet does not hurt anymore

LOVE MY CROCS!! I never liked crocs but they‚Äôre becoming so popular recently and I thought I‚Äôd try them out. I can‚Äôt believe I went years not wearing them lol. These are cheaper than what you can get in the store and they came super quick. Love them
I always wore my husband's (size 12) taking the dogs out and tried my nieces (size 8) on once and I was sold! Comfortable and size accurate
We get a bigger size every year since he was 3.  It's his 'go to' shoe...

review_title: I used to hate one Crocs....
review_text: But then I gave them a try and I am planning on purchasing more soon! Love these! They fit perfectly. Are super comfortable and breathable. Just TRY taking these off of my feet. I am in love!

Love these!!!! I swear by them. Nurse approved! I got the light blue. I‚Äôm in love. They‚Äôre so comfy and light. I garden in them. Hike in them. Clean. Go to work.  Everything this is my fourth pair
My wife wears size 6 or 6-1/2 shoe and the 4 men's - 6 women's fit her fine.  The quality is good, but for such a simple shoe it is expensive and thus the 4 star rating.
This is my second pair of crocs. The first pair lasted 9 years until the treads on the bottom of the shoe were worn away. I will definitely be buying more colors. Comfortable with great air vents.
Fits comfortable.  I wear them to work the yard, shopping, and preforming tasking around the house.  Perfect for end of day work shoe replacement.Nothing beats CROCs

If you have classic crocs that you bought 5 years ago you'll find these running smaller than those did. That is, big for shoes, small for crocs. They are a little shorter, a little narrower and especially not as high in the toe box (i.e. lower profile). I wear 8 1/2 wide in standard women's shoes, and 8W, 6M in crocs was always perfect for me before. Now I think I would order a size up next time, even on what Croc bills as a "roomy" fit. Apart from fit they are the crocs we know and love (or hate as the case seems to be), nice bouncy feel, easy to clean, durable and perfect for everything but ballroom dancing.

review_title: Fun story: took the Crocs to a sandal maker ...
review_text: Went through Europe and the Holy Land on a pair of these.  Only problems experienced were losing the plastic "rivet" the backstrap pivots on and eventually the bottoms become slick and provide no stopping on slick surfaces. Fun story: took the Crocs to a sandal maker inside the Old City of Jerusalem. He studied the broken Croc, surveyed his available repair materials then using a metal rivet provided the needed repair.  He guaranteed another 1,000 miles.  Almost got it,too!Shalomrhp
I purchased these because they were basically the cheapest of all options available. They're crocs, they fit like Crocs. Super comfy shoes.

review_title: Great for Walking Outside on a Dewy Morning
review_text: I got the Crocs to use for morning outings with our dog.  Perfect for wet grass.  They are comfortable and they are bright as can be!!  I know they will be with me for a long, long time!!

I have never wore crocs before and my daughter wanted a pair which I bought, and after wearing hers for a bit I purchased my own....absolutely love!!  Comfortable, easy slip on/off and it has turned into my go to.

review_title: Every one should own a pair
review_text: First ever, owned pair. I love it. It works with the pain in my feet. My nerves in my feet are gone. So i pretty much can not go anywhere without these crocks.
I see why everyone loves these ugly shoes. They are super comfortable, especially for walking around the house. They are great for wide feet as well.

review_title: Very comfortable... one size smaller next time.
review_text: I really didn't think I'd ever own a pair of Crocs let alone write a positive review about them! I bought a pair at my wife's urging because I have some foot problems...achy feet, plantar fasciitis, etc. The Crocs are incredibly comfortable to wear and bring immediate comfort and relief when I wear them. I have them next to my bed and slip them on first thing in the morning. I normally wear a size 13...when I get another pair I will be getting them in a size 12. The 13's are a little long and wide...not a problem, but I think I'll go one size smaller next time (and there WILL be a next time!)
Granddaughters second pair... loves these shoes...but the strap broke after just one wearing so I returned and will purchase locally in case I have an issue with another pair‚òπÔ∏è

I wear these when I'm working. I am on my feet 8-10 hrs a day and these are perfect. My feet don't hurt as much as they would if I was wearing sneakers. Also lets my feet breathe, so my feet don't get sweaty as long as I'm wearing socks.

review_title: Perfect for the fire station while not on calls.
review_text: With the recent covid pandemic in full swing, my job (career ff) was taking steps towards keeping shoes/ boots that we use on calls separate from our day room and common areas. This was my solution to wearing daily at the station while not on calls. Other choose tennis shoes, or some short of sandal or shoe.

The color (khaki) is not great, but that was what was available when I ordered. These are for in the house, so who cares? These are replacements for some Crocs I have had over five years. Hard to tell when they wear out, but these new ones support my feet much better. On the arch support question - better than bedroom slippers, less than good athletic shoes. NOTE: Occasionally I will see an adult were Crocs in public - please don't! These are house shoes only!

review_title: The shoes are fine and I should be able to wear them for ...
review_text: I was used to purchasing Crocs in the "from-to" size range ( 9-10, etc.) so the size setup on these was a bit strange for me. The shoes are fine and I should be able to wear them for quite some time with no problem, but they are a wee bit narrower than my other crocs and since my feet tend to swell a bit in hot weather the narrower width might be a problem. Don't know yet. Otherwise the shoes are great--lovely color (Khaki) is a perfect neutral.

Perfect fit. My feet are exactly 11‚Äù long and I ordered size 11 (men). Idk if these are worth $20 more than the Walmart brand, but I‚Äôm happy with my purchase, they‚Äôre quite comfortable and sturdy.

review_title: Five stars for comfort but not quality
review_text: Just wanted to write a review on this particular pair of crocs. I gave it five stars because they are so comfortable, but I ordered a pair for my son at the end of August, he has wore them to school many days and the strap already broke and we are only into December right now. By the school rules, he is not allowed to wear them at school unless they have a strap on them. Very disappointed as our return window has passed. Normally I feel like crocs last forever but not this pair.

author_name: Hard working mom, not alot of time!
review_text: Good shoe overall, however my daughter stated these were snugger than a pair we just bought 2 months ago. They do have a lil stretch over time so they may resolve it.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video.  ¬†LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these crocs! I ordered my usual size and they came slightly bigger than I was expecting them to, so I threw them in the dryer with a wet towel for about 4min. and they came out perfect! I've never had crocs before and it's my understanding that they're supposed to be larger shoes, but I prefer having a tighter fit. Overall, super comfy, easy to pair with outfits and perfect for a trip to the grocery store, walking the dogs, or going shopping with friends!

I love the Tropical Teal color of my replacement Crocs - very dramatic. I wear a size 8 and the Crocs size M6/W8 fits perfectly. I can wear with or w/o socks (which I'll wear with my Crocs around the house when the weather gets cold). I have both Achilles' and plantar facia pain and the Crocs give my sore feet a break. They last a long time, too - years.

Great classic Croc! It was very large though, so I had to return twice. Ended up with two full sizes below what I wear everyday. I‚Äôd suggest ordering a size or two down. Other than that, great classic Croc!

My girls have been raised in Crocs, So this pair was for my 12 year old Middle Schooler !For myself, I have a seriously bad back, bad knee and heal pain, Crocs really help with this.... I know when they need replaced as my feet flair up! I‚Äôve seriously worn Crocs and I remain true to this company!

review_title: Great shoes for post op recovery!
review_text: My first ever pair of Crocs - life saver for a rough post op recovery after bunion surgery. Must have!The fit - I am 8-8.5 with narrow to medium feet. Ordered these in 9 women - they are too big, but this is perfect for my left foot as i have had substantial swelling after surgery. Feet feel comfy and stable in them. I wear one pair in the shower and the other around the house .

I have to admit I really find the classic Croc unattractive, but incredibly practical under the right circumstances.  I dislike it for an everyday, all day shoe, but great for the beach or gardening.  Of course, my kids love them.  I have slipped on my son's from time to time (we wear the same size) and they are comfortable to walk in, but slippery if the inside gets wet.  The back strap doesn't really hold the heel the way I think a back strap should.Turns out my son wanted a bright color and was not excited about the khaki color, but he wears a lot of khaki shorts and I think it looks great.  He's 9, so for him bright and bold would be better!  The price I got on Amazon was better than at my local Croc store.
Only shoes I can wear...I have neuropathy pretty bad and with these Crocs I can at least function. Wish they weren't so pricey. I usually buy one pair a year.
I bought my reg size and it was perfect. They are roomy which is they way they are suppose to be. If your expected them to fit like a reg clog they will not. I will be purchasing another color too.

review_title: but they're very comfortable and excellent to wear around the house
review_text: I can never say crocs are "beautiful shoes", but they're very comfortable and excellent to wear around the house. I buy a pair and wear them for many years until the bottoms are completely worn out. I've never had a complaint about my crocs. I do suffer from plantar fasciitis so I put inserts in them for additional arch support. It would be awesome to see a pair developed that would make the additional insole support unnecessary.

So my 15 year old has been wanting crocs since school started in July.  Dropping hints left and right and constantly talking about all her team mates and friends that have them. We just ignored her and wrapped these up in a cereal box for Christmas. She was beyond excited and loved the surprise. Parenting win!
a bit wider than expected, but length is good, granddaughter has a narrow foot, THEY'REWHITE !  so expect them to get dirty at every wearing, fortunately they're washable :)

First pair of Crocs ever and I can definitely say they‚Äôre comfortable to wear. True to size , although they did seem to fit wide but it may just be that my foot is thin. Overall a pretty color and I‚Äôm excited to finally match charms with my son

Order a size up. I ordered size 6 and they were too small I ordered size 7 next and they fit perfect. They are VERY comfortable and perfect lazy day shoes. They are good for the beach or lake because you can dunk your feet in the water. Great buy over all.

I measured my feet and followed the size chart for Crocs. They fit well. I just bought them for around the house, but they are cute. I would wear them out. I was surprised that I liked the color as well - pink.
Don‚Äôt hesitate to get crocs! The most comfortable pair of shoes I‚Äôve ever worn. My feet don‚Äôt get tired. They are just so easy and comfortable!

As expected but has an oily residue coating it Inside that even washing it hasn‚Äôt made it go away. I guess continued use will help. Wrong time of year to wear these very often though. Will see when spring comes around if it wears off.

Got these for my teenage niece (14) and she LOVES them! Apparently they are back in style big time! Thank goodness because I‚Äôm getting myself a pair with the lining in them:) I use to wear them all the time as a hairdresser and loved them, so happy they are back in style again!!!!

These Crocs purchased Oct 2020 are made of different material than the previous 3 pair I‚Äôve worn. Instead of soft foam material they are made of a harder plastic. This new pair isn‚Äôt breathable and makes my feet sweat. The tight fit in toe and firm plastic have given my toes blisters just being worn around the house.

These fit feet widened after having children. I use them as house shoes as it is no longer comfortable for me to walk barefoot. I love that my toes are not cramped as the toe box is roomy. These are more comfortable than most of my street shoes.
These were a gift for my brother who is normally a size 10. They were too loose so we returned them and got a size smaller. Much better!

Excellent for anyone on their feet all day. I bought them as a gift for a favorite waiter who goes the extra mile for us and needed a new work shoe. He's in them every time we see him. Says they make his feet feel like he's walking on clouds!

Just kidding - they're Crocs. If you can get past your friends ridiculing you regularly, and neighbors laughing from a distance when you're walking the dog in these things, then you'll be happy! They're the most functional pair of footwear out there.

review_title: Fits small. Order a size up.
review_text: These have a  cushiony sole and are well made. I got them to wear while I work in the yard and they are perfect for this because I can just rinse them off with the hose when I'm done. I ordered the Women's size 9. I usually wear an 8.5 but I listened to the reviews that said they ran small and boy am I glad I did! My toes just touch the end of the shoe. I would say they are about a 1/2 size too small. If I had to wear them for long periods while standing, they would be uncomfortable pretty quickly. So keep that in mind, if you're going to wear them for 8 hours at work. Overall I'm very happy with them.

Crocs may be absolutely hideous but I wanted to see if they‚Äôd make a good house shoe. These are pretty comfy, I‚Äôm excited to feel them when they break in a bit. These are supposed to fit a bit loose but seem to stay on pretty well despite that.
I was deciding on getting the ballerina pink or the lavender and I'm glad I got the lavender!! It's super pretty and I'll definitely get good use out of them!!

review_title: Standard Wear For Sea Kayak Trips--And More!
review_text: I love Keens for whitewater, but a kayak trip in Baja on the Vermilion Sea convinced me that these are the best choice for that kind of trip--ALL the guides and staff wore them.I like the heel strap--which can be used to make the Croc more secure, or flipped up to make the Croc function more as a clog.They are versitile--good for getting the morning paper on the wet grass without ruining those sheepskin slippers, great poolside sandals, and of course perfect beach wear.They do run wide, but I have a wide foot.This is my second pair--as we have another kayak trip in Baja coming up!

review_title: Something easy to slide on & off.
review_text: Like my Crocs...wanted something easy to slide on & off...wanted something to wear around camp that I could also wear while standing in the shower at the campground.

Perfect width and arch support. Very light. My mom is diabetic and has neuropathy. She felt blessed finding about these. Strong grip. Prevents falls. Very important! And stylish too. Who would've thought it.

Very large. Seemed like men‚Äôs sizes (or maybe it was just because of the width.) In any case, my daughter didn‚Äôt mind that they were loose.The color is bright yellow. Show dirt easily. But as always, great for comfort, and easy on/easy off.
The color is like a teal and i expected more of a baby blue. The color is my only complaint but i still love them and will wear them often

I love Crocs they always feel comfy. This clog is no exception but indeed a example of the rule. I wear these more often than I wear any other shoe. Makes my flat feet feel happy. That should tell you something. Get it now!

i love crocs when i have to stand for any length of time cooking, etc. When I come home from work i change into them right away in order to relax and get into my evening routine.  I would wear them all the time if I could.  They're wonderful!
i love them. got them for my son as well. one piece, versatile. i wish the strap was reinforced more. i fear for it to break one day. even then the crocs will still be used if a strap goes.

These are great shoes......I wore my previous pair for about 15 years...They finally got ragged and i had to purchase another pair. They fit just right, but being new, the little bumps inside were a bit irritating. To solve this problem, i took a drill and used a wire brush attachment to grind them down a little. That made them better. I'm sure in no time they will be just as comfortable as my old ones!

Crocs are Crocs, and they will be my favorite beach or adventure shoes always. Unfortunately I lost one of my husband crocs and have to give him a new pair but that is not a problem because have the satisfaction that you paid for what you get which is a WONDERFUL shoe. I bought the Geometric model and it's more gorgeous in person

review_title: I have a great amount of difficulty finding comfortable shoes being one of ...
review_text: I have a great amount of difficulty finding comfortable shoes being one of my ankles is fused with pins & screws holding things together so not only is that foot a bit oddly shaped but because of all the trauma to my right leg, I am subject to profound swelling issues.  I am actually not sure about the arch support, but I also can't claim there isn't any, but since there was no option to be non-committal, I opted for the yes.  I do have a brace to wear on that leg with sneakers, but it becomes uncomfortable after a few hours and the clogs are light weight enough for me to use as an alternative both for several hours but also as a quick way to slip on to go outside to get the mail etc as I am mostly barefooted while at home.

My wife & I both got a pair of these crocs.  They are really good around the motorhome.  Easy to slip on and off as we go in & out of the motorhome.  Especially useful when it is wet & messy outside on a grass campsite.

I was concerned about these being too big with no socks or thin socks but they actually fit perfect. My daughter has a wide foot and has touble typically with shoes but she does not complain about these. They are in style and Crocs is the best brand. The white are easier to clean than I expected also.
A lot of comments about sizing.  After reading most, I simply took and measured my foot heel to toe and ordered off of the chart accordingly.  Fit was perfect!

review_title: This is my second pair. My first pair is ...
review_text: This is my second pair. My first pair is maybe 8 or 9 years old. I'm not replacing pair #1 I just got tired of having to come in after working in the yard all day and having to wash the dirt off of them before I went somewhere. Now I just change into my new pair. At the rate pair #1 is going I should not have to buy a new pair for maybe 10 more years. F I live that long!
Love my Crocs. They're very comfortable to wear with or without a sock/stocking. Choose the color of your choice. Use the strap to secure on the ankle if you choose.
Love my crocks , this Is probably my 5 th pair of crocks over the years . I wear crocks inside because of planters fasciitis I can no longer walk on the bare floors .

Theyre bigger than other other clogs of the same size , the little dots on the sole on the inside of the shoe are spiky and uncomfortable, not like any other shoes of the same style and brand that I have .i can only tolerate them if I‚Äôm wearing thick socks üòï
Yes they are ugly but they are very comfortable and easy to slide on and off.  Much better than your average sandal because of the top support.

My teenage daughter had to have these! She usually wears a 7. I got size 8 (because 7 was not available) and they fit! They are a little wide but the length is just right-she didn't even realize I size up when she tried them on. Very comfortable and a pretty lavender color.

This is a very comfortable pair of shoes!! I want to wear them all the time!! They've helped my feet heal from wearing high heels for work. I've been wearing this pair of shoes during this covid situation and working from home.

They are comfortable. They fit my wide feet well. Overall a solid product. 4 stars because these are over hyped and over priced. Not as comfortable as people would make you think but much better than memory foam products.
got these for my boyfriend for his birthday and he loves them! he‚Äôs had them about 2 years now and wears them very often and they still look new.

I wanted a pair of comfortable shoes for around the house and swimming. Very squishy yet supportive, and I love the color on my skin (baby blue in person). Material is smooth and the package wasn‚Äôt damaged (no box just a plastic package).

I have hesitated to buy a pair of Crocs in the past, but these are the best home lounging shoes there is!  I love these and wear them all the time.  I pretty much wear a size 12 in every shoe and these fit perfect in a 12.

I slide these shoes on to grab the mail, walk the dog, do yard work, attend to the pool, walk back and forth from the house to the pool. They are so comfortable, and so easy to slide on and off. I can stand in them for hours. In fact, I wear them at my stand up desk sometimes too. They are easy to clean up; the dirt just rinses off them.
My mom wanted me so bad so I bought them for her from Mother's Day She absolutely loves them wears them all the time fits great and very comfy! She got the tangerine orange ones!!
LIVING for the croc life, socks and crocs, bare crocs, doesn‚Äôt matter. THESE crocs are incredible! Got them before they were a meme and definitely best shoe for everything highly recommend!! üôÇ
I just love crocs. These are no exception. Very nice bright red. Little bumps on inside massage feet. A great Arch support for all day wear. Holes give them air circulation.

I am such a lover of crocs now that I made the purchase of these ones! I got them for Christmas and they are my new favorite shoes. The light pink color is so cute and I also love the comfort of these!

I always buy my crocs off amazon because they‚Äôre cheaper than buying in store. Recommend if you‚Äôre into comfort and convenience. Perfect slip on shoe for when I‚Äôm running to the store. Also very easy to clean!
Perfect shoe for going out in the backyard with the dogs, taking out trash, gardening, etc. we leave our crocs at the back door and use them everyday.

review_title: Everybody needs a pair of crocs
review_text: color is great and they are super comfy. Highly recommend for house shoes. I live in an apartment with my dog and I have loved being able to throw these on to let my dog out too

I purchased these for my daughter because she wanted to add a little flair to them. I think she did a wonderful job!  These crocs are very comfortable. She wears them often and also purchased a purple and pink pair.

review_title: Geez, ugly as can be but comfortable!
review_text: Love these things.  I wear them on my hardwood floor to cushion my feet.  Pretty much have them on all the time when I'm inside.

Love these!!! I have always made fun of people who wear Crocs and I owe them all a apology. These are so comfy and you can wear them anywhere! My niece says they are very popular with the kids these days!

review_title: I purchased a pair of crocs as a GIFT. ...
review_text: I purchased a pair of crocs  as a GIFT.  I just found out that they don't fit.  bought them according to chart.  went online to EXCHANGE THEM.  only to find out too late to return.  So there they set unworn.  All I saw when I ordered was they could be returned  no  time frame.  She likes the way they look but that isn't anygood if they don't fit !!  All I WANT TO DO IS  EXCHANGE  TH.EM FOR THE CORRECT SIZE.  Not a RefundIf you can help me with this problem it would be appreciated.  Thank youMy suggestion to anyone  When you are buying for a GIFT  don't buy till last minute if it concerns  the SIZE.

review_title: If your old Crocs are sized ‚Äú8-9, 9-10,‚Äù etc. order news ones in the larger size shown
review_text: I bought these a replacement for my old worn out classic Crocs, which were getting slippery on wet surfaces due to the worn out tread. The old sizing was ‚ÄúW10-11 M8-9‚Äù while new Crocs have whole sizing. If you‚Äôre looking for the same size in a new classic Croc go for the larger number (in this case W11 M9) to get the same size as your originals.

Love the Crocs.  They are very comfortable and wear out slooooowly.  :)  I noted my orthopedic surgeon wears them, and also my Internist.  If they are good enough for doctors.... they are good enough for me.

I bought these crocs to replace my house slippers. They are light and comfortable. I used to love to be barefoot every chance that I got, until I developed plantar fascitis. My cure has involved wearing supportive shoes and never being barefoot. These crocs are great for wearing around the house. They are extremely lightweight and provide excellent cushioning for my feet.

Pretty color, quite popular.  Crocs fit loose and these classic clogs are no exception.I only buy Croc brand because the cheaper knock offs quickly end up with a broken strap and worn bottoms that become quite slippery.My daughter is quite happy with her crocs

My husband bought these for me after I have been stealing his to wear in our basement.  These are so comfortable to wear for hours every day and are even better on my feet that they are actually the right size!  Part of our basement is unfinished and where our washer/dryer is and also our woodstove so we head to the basement quite frequently every day.  It is great to have a pair of shoes that you can slip on pretty quickly and go.  My feet are ALWAYS sore at the end of the night as well and these seem to have good enough support that my feet aren't as bad by the time I go to bed. Very happy with this purchase!
Perfect fit and great color. Great packaging and on time.

review_title: Great for puppy potty runs in the backyard
review_text: When Crocs first were introduced back when I was a kid, my mom and I would constantly call these "the ugliest garden shoes we'd ever seen." However, fast forward to when we got our first puppy who has to make countless potty runs at all hours of the night, and these are the most appreciated shoes! They slip on and off without having to lift a finger, and they are incredibly light weight. They are the perfect shoe for roaming around the yard, where no one can see your silly "garden shoes"! But really, in all honesty, we love our Crocs for making puppy potty runs!

Great Croc! Yup the real makoy! This being said, perfect for around the garden as slip ons! But for heaven's sake people, stop wearing these out in public! They are ugly! As designed! Maybe for young children? Adult's around the house only! Your slippers too!

I‚Äôve been wearing crocs for 15-20yrs probably. The wife and kids have always hated them but they‚Äôre too comfortable. It‚Äôs funny that they‚Äôre now considered ‚Äòstylish‚Äô. The wife still hates them though

review_title: I love these CROCS which I bought for myself!!!
review_text: This is a roomy, comfortable shoe that I'm proud of so I gave it a 5-star rating. It's also easy to slip them on and off. I liked the price and free shipping which allowed me to save without waiting too long for them to arrive. These CROCS were made in Mexico and are a good fit as I expected. I recommend these to anyone who likes comfort and good fit.  My granddaughter works in an electrical plant which requires her to wear these shoes, so I recommend them to anyone who is required to wear them for work also. BTW, I don't believe these shoes are good for working outdoors doing yardwork as the soles are not intended for that purpose.
Perfect. Just as described. I‚Äôve never seen a teen smile so big, And for those of us with teen kids we know that is a great accomplishment

review_title: ... they must have been too big because I didn't enjoy them as much
review_text: I had crocs a long time ago and they must have been too big because I didn't enjoy them as much. Maybe the sizing has changed because I absolutely love them. Definitely size your feet as i did and they fit perfectly. I wanted something I could quickly slip on around the campsite getting in and out of my tent. It's cold out so I am actually using them around the house and they are so comfy!

review_title: A summmer must for active kids.
review_text: They're cool comfortable and last longer than expected for families with active kids. They fit as expected. So be sure you measure your child's foot to get the right size.

These are the absolute most comfortable shoes. I‚Äôm on my feet all day on tile floors and these are the only shoes that don‚Äôt kill my feet. They are so easy to clean too. A tip for scuffs... magic eraser!

I put these on my feet and they worked immediately right out of the package!!!Crocs are great. Very comfy and easy to slip on and off quickly.  Excellent for when your working with a garden hose when your feet may get soaked, or going to the beach etc.  Just use caution when the bottoms do get wet as they may slip on certain surfaces.

Love these for around the house, yard/garden, camping and kayaking.  So convenient to slip on and off but also VERY comfortable.  Little nubs on the soles give my feet a nice massage.  I was worried they would be clumsy and not stay on my feet without the straps but it's just the opposite.  So happy I bought these.

review_title: The best ugly shoes I‚Äôve ever bought!
review_text: These are my go to garden shoes. My first pair of crocs and now I‚Äôm not sure if I could live without them. Can‚Äôt believe I caved and bought them. But I‚Äôm very glad I did.

I honestly wanted to know what all the hype was about. As a new mom and a fitness instructor, I a on my feet all day. I wanted a pair of slip ons that are comfy and withstand all the chaos my daily routine around the house brings. These did not disappoint. So comfy, I forgot I am wearing them. My feet feel great and I am a hooked crocs lover.

I use Crocks as my house shoes with socks. Always comfortable and I don‚Äôt have to feel like my feet are boxed up in shoes.I have a high arch and feel like these support my feet without after complications.
I normally buy Croc Specialist shoes to work, but since the pandemic has halted my work, I needed a pair that was comfortable for my home. These are so very comfortable and lightweight.

Love them.  Because of a botched surgery, my foot is deformed and I cannot wear normal shoes. I lived in Crocs for a long time.  I've been unable to walk without assistance for a long time, and it occurred to me that I needed to replace them, but the pair I had was purple, and it matched a lot of things in my world, clothes, my car! So I just knew that I had to replace them. I couldn't even read the size on the bottom they were so worn.  I couldn't find them in the size I needed due to swelling in my feet so I had to order a larger size.  Luckily they were available in my second favorite color.  I'm walking so much better!  Happy Mother's Day to me!

My foot lays in a position where it feels like the croc may slip off, unless I use the heel strap. Super comfortable, I actually wore them to Rolling Loud a couple weeks ago. I was standing for around 8-9 hours, and I typically do for work as well, but was given the same level of comfort as my work shoes. Very nice.

review_title: Arrived ahead of schedule, good price $20.00
review_text: I wear a 7 1/2 M, i ordered a size 7.  Crocks still a tad large, but durable.  Mine were made in Vietnam, NOT Mexico, NOT Colorado, WILL DO THE JOB FOR WORK I HAVE PLANNED FOR THEM.  Arrived ahead of scheduled.  My 3rd pair of crocks in 10 years.
Sizing runs a tad small in the length and width both compared to my other crocs. My regular crocs day made in China whereas these say made is Mexico. Overall still good for the price of $13 on sale.

review_title: Beautiful color. Nice comfort. Good toe protection.
review_text: Sadley Crocs only makes this Classic style in the really cool colors.  For me, the classic is not a proper duty shoe.  Its great for me to do food shopping in. Quick errands. Not for seven or eight hours on my feet. They make great house shoes because it offers support and protection of toes when walking in the dark.

Advertised as a casual water shoe, these slip-ons are versatile in their use; as house shoes, garden shoes, beach shoes, and yes, as water shoes. The only time I don't wear them...or at least haven't tried to yet, is when I wear a tux :-). Very comfortable!

I love these!! they‚Äôre super comfortable and feel great to walk in. love that I can wear them camping, to the river, beach, etc and just rinse them off if they get dirty. they‚Äôre comfortable with the band forward or around the back of your foot, I haven‚Äôt had any ‚Äúbreaking them in‚Äù kinda issues like blisters or anything so that‚Äôs been cool. The Lavender color is SO SO gorgeous and I‚Äôm obsessed. I highly recommend, even if you think they‚Äôre ugly lol.

review_title: Where have they been all my life ?!
review_text: I teased my husband for years because of his crocs. I said I would never ever get a pair. Welp.... I caved. And I freaking love them. And now I have to live with my husband saying I told you so

review_title: If the shoe fits - and it does...
review_text: This is not a color I would normally have selected, but it was half the price of the other available colors. As this was my first pair of Crocs I figured I had nothing to lose at such a bargain price. What I didn't realize is how much I had to gain! I really, really like them!Crocs advises that half-sizes order the whole size down: I wear a US 9.5 shoe and ordered these in US 9: They are easily the equivalent of a US 10. Be aware that other styles vary in size: The Baya style, for example, offers a much closer fit - both in width and length.

These are perfect when going outside to just slip on, or in the house. They are comfy and practical. They were only offered in full sizes. I am a true 7 1/2. I went with the 7, and they are a perfect fit! Very happy with my purchase

These yellow Crocs are awesome! They are comfortable and I would say they are stylish, haha. I love coming home after a long day of work and slipping into my Crocs. My feet feel so relieved. U truly like them!
I think my husband's dignity flew out the window when he put them on, but they look and function exactly as described. Which any time a company fulfills its products claims, is a five star.

I got these for my boyfriend and he told me he wore a size 14 so I purchased them and when I got them I was like WOAH these are huge (mind you I‚Äôm a size 4 in men) anyways, he said they fit great. crocs are also super comfy and sports mode works great.

I like this product, I use them as shower shoes, because my toes don‚Äôt grip well but I would still recommend getting a shower/bath mat especially if you have limited physical strength in your legs and feet to not slide.

Bought these for my hubby to wear as shower shoes while deployed. He said they are actually comfortable and likes that the soles are thick when he has to walk to the showers or while in the showers. He wears a 10.5-11 and said they have a little room but he like that it does.

These are Real Crocs. It came in the original Croc bag and they feel great. We have worn crocs for years and for this price you can‚Äôt beat it. True to size EXTREMELY COMFY I bought these for my daughter, I am ordering more today and I will follow up with a pic and the package. It‚Äôs a great deal guys. Get them while you can. They are actually becoming popular again so the price will go up. You guys be safe. Peace and love to my Amazon Family!!!

I wear these clogs to work, at home, to the store, etc.  They are comfortable and lightweight. They survive weekly washing in hot water and color has not faded. I bought these in several different colors. My only complaint (really not a complaint), is that the shoe has several openings, so if I go outside to sweep my porch the dust will get into the shoe and under my feet. For this reason I also wear a lightweight pair of socks.
Finally decided to buy a pair. They‚Äôre so comfy. I wear a size 10 in women‚Äôs and they didn‚Äôt appear to look like ‚Äúboats‚Äù when I wear them.

I where these every single day to school, these are literally the most comfortable shoes I have EVER owned. I bought a pair for my brother too, and  he loves them, he also wears them everyday to college. And if you wanna be cool, go with the white crocs. They honestly look fantastic and are comfortable. I will definitely buy these again in the future. Like seriously, BUY WHITE CROCS. I promise you, you will love them. Just don't get the wrong size like I did (I sold them to my brother so it's all good, he liked them that much). I tell everyone to buy them, including my math teacher.
Bought for my daughter who was away at a residential program.  They were her footwear of choice, did everything in them.  They fit as expected, wearing well.  A product that is well made.
I usually don't like croc but once I was activated to help in the Pandemic, I needed shoes i could essentially sterilize very time I wore them!
I am so happy I finally found ballerina pink colored crocs! They seem to be sold out everywhere else. They fit as expected and are so comfy! I love them.

My sister worked in a pair of crocs..and she stated how comfortable they were.  I thought they were to ugly to wear.  One day I snuck them on when no one was looking and I could not  believe how wonderful these shoes are. I now wear mine every day.Wish I would have know earlier.  The order was perfect in size and arrival.

These Crocs are true to size. I had a pair years ago and I forgot how comfortable they are. They are super comfortable and I wear them around the house all the time now. Most of the guys at the fire station are wearing them also since we aren‚Äôt allowed to wear our boots in the station now.  I highly recommend them!

review_title: They run somewhat bigger than normal shoes. I‚Äôm a size 8 in sneakers and a 7 in crocs
review_text: I absolutely LOVE my crocs, I almost have every color. They are the best shoe for me cause I have a neuroma I‚Äôm my foot and love the room it gives me.
Love crocs! So comfortable and very supportive. They are lightweight and super easy to clean. Best prices on Amazon too. Highly recommend!

I have worn Crocs for years.  Most comfortable thing I have ever had on my feet!  This is just another fine pair of crocs.  Can be worn outside or as an inside slipper.  I wear mine outside mostly walking.  I usually walk over 5 miles a day.  Have bought expensive walking shoes over the years.  Anything I buy usually needs replacement after 2 to 3 months.  I am very hard on shoes.  These Crocs last just as long, yet only 1/3 to 1/4 the cost.  I can stand for hours in these too, without legs, hips, or feet aching.I also wear Mammoths when it is cold.  I do have to admit that I wear a hunting boot while hunting or serious woodland hiking and a snow boot in deep snow:^)  But other than those, Crocs are the only other footwear I own.
So happy with this purchase! I'm usually a size 7 1/2 8 but with a wider shoe I can fit in a 7 so since there wasn't any half sizes I went with a 7 to see. It fits perfect! And I'll be ordering more!

review_title: Ugly but the most comfortable shoes I have EVER had!
review_text: They are very roomy! Much bigger then I thought but extremely comfortable! I live in my crocks. They will work great with socks this winter!
This is soooo comfortable! I wear a 7.5 and went with an 8. The shoe fits a little on the loose side but not so much that it affects walking. Definitely recommend.

review_title: Good to youe feet, and cute too
review_text: These are the cutest  crocs yet. So nice on my feet. People stop me and ask about the crocs. They don't look like your regular croc, The design and color's in the shoe make them unique. I have problem feet and I can ware these all day. For me that's a blessing. More designs please.
I ordered a size up just in case but it fits a wee bit snug still, but I'd rather that than them being way too big. They are so cute and comfy I will be wearing them a lot this summer!
I have wide feet and thought they would fit better but I have to share so if your feet are fat or wide they will hurt after awhile

Pros:Color is true to the picture; a very pretty khaki.Fit is very comfortable for those of us with wider feet.Cushioning to keep your feet from tiring.Last for months even with heavy use (such as walking dogs on asphalt for 1-2 hours per day).Con:The sizing is different every time I order these, even though they are all made in Mexico (same factory?). I normally wear a 6.5 US (wider) shoe and usually get a size 6 in Crocs, but had to get a 7 this time. In comparing the 6 I already had to the 7 I just ordered the 6 is a tad larger!

I ordered crocs for my entire family and we ALL love them.  Besides being super cute, they‚Äôre really, really comfortable with the ridges insole.We like the fact they‚Äôre breathable, can get wet, areeasy to slip on and off, and casual enough to look good with shorts or jeans.
A little too big but great house shoes

I love how comfy these shoes are but sad I ended up getting the size bigger as to what some of these reviews say to do. DO NOT go up in size these are plenty big and I really wished I would have gone with my normal size.

I got these for my husband so he could be a "real" dad. I actually purchased a 1/2 size bigger than he normally wears (bc this product doesn't have 1/2 sizes) and it fit him exactly right.I'd recommend them out. Good price, good value, comfortable.
easy to get on an off love that they are like walking on cloud as its nice and soft under foot would buy again for sure

I was having problems with left ankle pain - to the point that the burning would keep me awake at night. All those years of commuting by bus and train took its toll. My podiatrist recommended I get some Crocs to wear around the house. I am now pain free. I had the tendency to go barefoot when I got home, liking the freedom of "free feet". With Crocs, my freedom is not inhibited and I don't know what I would do without them. Immediately on taking off my street shoes and stockings, I slip into my Crocs and don't mind them at all. Thank you, Dr. Daley and the Crocs people. I am now OTC pain killer free.

review_title: Took these on vacation and I love it
review_text: I love these so much best water shoes and vacation shoes ever !!!
I got this as an xmas gift for my sister who wears a 7.5 in womens. I got them for xmas so I hope they fit. Update after xmas.
I've always liked crocs but couldnt afford them when I was younger but now it's a free for all and I can buy as many as I want lol I love them they are comfy and cute
My daughter loves them

Crocs are awesome. Super comfy. I stand all day at work and they keep my feet from feeling as horrible as they do otherwise. I didnt realize they had different fits for looser or more fitted so mine are a little bigger than I would have liked but that's my fault. I still love them though and will buy again.
My son ordered these for his girlfriend and she loves them. They fit as expected and the color was the same as the picture.

review_title: Good product. I deploy to bases with "public use" ...
review_text: Good product. I deploy to bases with "public use" showers that everyone uses and this keeps your feet off the ground and clear of the mildew and other unmentionables on the shower floor. They turn white after a while a crack with constant hydration and dehydration of actually taking them into the shower but after 4-6 months of use, I would probably throw them away in that environment anyway no matter how they looked. Very comfortable to wear and just the thing for deployments. Sandals flop around too much.
Used to be a hater, but I've been converted!  I love Crocs!  Super comfie to wear in warm weather, but just add socks and you have great slippers!  Very versatile with movable heel strap as well.

I love my crocs! They are super easy to clean, slide on and off the feet easily, and provide extra roominess for additional socks. They are a great around the house and yard shoe. Super comfy and I love the bright colors. Always cheer me up.

review_title: Dont leave them in the car!
review_text: Great grab and go shoe, very comfy..DONT leave these shoes in the car on a hot day! it was maybe mid 90's and the shoe was left in the trunk of my car. It actually shrunk about a size and a half!
I use these for around the house. Making runs to trash or watering the garden.I got them on sale, so it was a great value. I don't think I would pay full price.

I was never a fan of crocs until one day I wore my daughter‚Äôs. These are incredibly comfortable, which is a must for me because I sometimes have significant swelling in my legs and feet. They have become my go to shoes and my girls and I had so much fun decorating them with the cute little shoe charms (purchased separately). Great buy!

I've been thinking about getting crocs for a while but have been procrastinating. But after a day of swimming with my friend they all slipped on their crocs and it took me a whole 5 minutes to get my socks and shoes on, I said "no more" and order a pair that are my school colors, pepper, right when I got home. I am usually a 9.5 and I did as suggested by going down half a size but they are actually a bit big; however, with the sport strap, they fit perfectly! I really like them but I have high arches and the arch support is not the best.

review_title: Bouncy Comfort and A Fun Look
review_text: These are far more comfortable than I had expected. I am typically a size 9.5 so I ordered the 9 and the 10 to feel what worked better. The 10 were huge and the 9 fit just right. Not much wiggle room, although I‚Äôve found them to be more comfortable the more I wear them.
Plain and simple, when you wear shoes like this out, everyone will instantly recognize you for what you are - an unapologetic man of leisure.

review_title: üî¥ Fits According to Size - 1 for Summer & 1 for Winter
review_text: I only bought a pair to use a a house shoe in warmer weather but wow I am really happy with this purchase.I normally wear size 12.5 and was concerned about the peculiar sizing ‚ÄúWomen‚Äôs 15/Men‚Äôs 13‚Äù and was concerned these would fit properly.Well my concern was for naught because these fit perfectly and I couldn‚Äôt be happier, in fact now that I know the fit is accurate I am going to order another pair one size larger to wear with thick socks for cold weather hose shoes.

review_title: Women - Order a size smaller.  I'm an 8 and they felt like a 9.  My foot floated all around!
review_text: Order a size smaller, please trust me.  Just got mine today and I'm an 8.  My foot floated around it.  Sending back for a sz. smaller.

I was a little skeptical about crocs and all the hype but i'm so happy with them and I'm in love with all the shoe charm possibilities, I want everyone around me to get some. If you're thinking about it I think you should just go for it! this is a sign do it it'll make you happy.
These are some of the best shoes to walk around in. They're soft and seem to have some shock absorbing capabilities. This purple color is perfect for me!!!
I wear these in the kitchen and around the house while I do chores. It makes standing at the sink for dishes or moving around to cook easier on my feet and back. They're comfortable and seem durable.

Got these for casual & beach wear.  Thick sole gives a little with each step, supremely comfortable!  And, the back-strap actually keeps them on your feet far better than other sandals.  Even to the point of necessitating you to push down on it a little to get `em off.  They've been around for a few years but this is my first pair.  Love `em. :-) Mar`18
I actually bought it for my 12 years old son as it was cheaper than the man/big boy version. No complain except that crocs are still the ugliest shoes around

review_title: Best house slippers for pet owners
review_text: Perfectly fine house shoes.  I use these instead of slippers.  A good pair of socks in the winter, and I'm good to go.  As a cat caregiver I appreciate how easy they are to clean.

I have a love-hate relationship with these Crocs. I hate the way they look but I love how they feel on my feet. I bought them specifically to use as camp shoes while hiking. I ended up wearing them a lot around the house and in the yard.
Smitten with these shoes ! I usually wear a woman‚Äôs size 11 & ordered a 8. Which fit perfect ! I added the charms To show case my personality & love them even more !

I LOVE THESE!!!!! best purchase and cheaper than the actual website, i bought mine in april for 30$ best perchasen ever made! i wear these day and night. my feet literally never hurt or get tired. i can stand in these all day! and there in very good condition since being bought in april.

review_title: Order up run small great Croc
review_text: The new Crocs tend to run a little small. Make sure to order a full size up. I wear an 8 and ordered a 9 it fits perfect.
My favourite colour with one of my favourite shoe company. Best if two worlds!! The shipping and handling was amazing.

review_title: Cant Go Wrong With Crocs:) True to Size and Purpose:)
review_text: I was looking for an all around slip on and go pair of comfortable shoes that would give my feet plenty of air to breath when on my time. Meaning when I‚Äôm not at the Dealership I work for wearing mostly Spider Back Australian slip on boots for support and traction. These Crocs are perfect for what I wanted and needed them for:) So I Am Very Pleased with them:)

This is my second pair of Crocs (the first ones wore out).  I wear these shoes on the weekends (around the house/yard and to the store).  The size was a little larger than expected, but not unreasonable.  I'm actually glad they are a little larger in hopes that the added size will help improve airflow.  I've owned this pair for about a month and they seem to be holding up ok.  I was much happier to pay the Amazon price as opposed to what the store was asking.  I just hope it's the same quality; only time will tell.
After a foot injury, needed something that was comfortable and gave stability. These Crocs were everything needed and exceeded expectations. LOVE them!

I got these because I needed closed toes shoes for field activities at my job with kids. They are super comfortable and as a bonus, the teens think I am super cool because Crocs have made a comeback with the VSCO trend.
My girls love crocs.  I got a really good price on Amazon.  I bought the light blue color and my daughter loves them.

My daughter wanted crocs for Christmas so I came to amazon and was pleasantly surprised to find authentic Crocs in every color imaginable ü§£ I‚Äôm very happy with my purchase and will come back for more!

review_title: I'm very pleased with these Crocs
review_text: I'm very pleased with these Crocs. Never had Crocs before, and I was hesitant about looking goofy, but these are the best knock-arounds I've had in years. I struggle finding slides that will stay on my feet, but these are great‚Äîthey have the strap thingy in the back that also rotates to the front if you don't need it. Even without the strap, these stay on my feet better than any other slides I've owned. And the support is terrific‚Äîthe first time I wore them I took a 2.5 mile walk and they were extremely comfortable. They run a little large. I usually wear a men's 10.5, but they don't have half sizes, so I got 10s. They fit great, and if anything might be a bit large. Inexpensive, durable, easy to clean, great for doing yard work, shopping, or whatever.

Crocs really are the coolest. Not only was I able to score a pair for a mere $23.00, but they are true to size and are the best shoes for those of us who enjoy the ability of slipping shows on and off. Just be forewarned, when you first get them they will have a weird ‚Äúwet‚Äù feeling. It will go away really Quickly though, in about a day or less.
