All in all, this was a great purchase and I would definitely buy them again in another color if I wasn‚Äôt so ‚Äúthrifty-nifty.‚Äù :)
Bought these for my husband to use as shower shoes & when he‚Äôs workin our in the field (he‚Äôs military). Personally, I‚Äòm not a croc fan at all...but I must say they‚Äôve been great for him.
My daughter bought these for herself, she said she likes them.

review_title: Good for fast trips into yard.
review_text: I had to buy a second pair because first pair was too large.  These fit correctly, are comfortable and convenient to use.

I bought these because I am a recent Crocs wearer and my favorite color is red. I do not like the nubs inside the footbed because they are too sharp and hurt your feet. I guess I'll have to wear socks with them all the time but that's not what I want to do in the summer.
Love me some crocs. Can't wear anything else.
On my feet all day at work and i have finally found my perfect work shoe! Not the cutest shoes ever but i need comfort over style at this point lol
I recently stubbed a toe while at home (very painful), so I ordered these for walking around the house. I love them, feel great and enough support.
Fits great!!! So comfortable. I be on my feet all day and I have no pain at all any more when I get off work from walking on concrete all day. Love these!!!
So glad I received my crocs today. I'm getting surgery because I have bone spur smack dab on my Achilles tendon. So painful however I get major relief with these babies on. üòé
I liked the fact that the crocs had tiny points inside that made the bottoms of my feet like they were getting a massage. Maybe that was designed to keep your feet from sliding around.
I like these very much and was surprised at the support and massage feature in the inner sole.  I have had other similar to the real things and these are higher quality.
I love Crocs - they are so comfortable and never wear out.  It is great to be able to wear them outdoors without worrying about ruining them.

Pure comfort for my feet! I wear these year round in the house! More comfortable than barefoot. During warm weather I wear them almost everywhere I go. Not so good here in New England during winter. üò¨
My daughter loves these. We just ordered her to more Paris. Much less expensive than buying through the store. Very happy with my purchase

Crocs are my favorite go to slides. Super easy to put on and pretty comfortable to walk around or wear when you go to the store to do some shopping. I usually go a size down so they fit a bit snug so they don‚Äôt slip or are loose but other than that it‚Äôs a very good show to chill around in!
These shoes are so comfortable and they fit perfectly because I listened to another review that said buy a size smaller.  I wear a size 9 and I bought a size 8.

review_title: So much better than the knockoffs!
review_text: I wish they made 1/2 sizes, but the size 11 works fine.  I really like how thick the sole is compared to the knockoffs I had before.  Night and day.  We recently hiked 32 miles in three days with backpacks on the AT (Appellation Trail) in the smokey mountains.  One of my friends wore Crocs the whole way.  I couldn't believe it.  I thought he was "the man".  Finally we traded, and I understood.  His sole was easily 3 times thicker than mine.  Until then, I couldn't understand how he could walk over all those rocks with just Crocs.  Now I understand!

review_title: Most Comfortable Shoe In The World
review_text: How come if I were no socks and leather sandals then I am a great guy "showing off" my humility etc. But if I wear the most comfortable shoes in my 70 years then I am a creep?  Well, it's said clothes make the man, so I it must be me that is creepy, no?Good price and long lasting too.
I wear anywhere from a 9.5 to a 10.5 because I have wide feet. I got the women's 11 and it's a little loose but I think a 10 would have been too small.

I ordered size 9 /10 and they fit loose as I expected due to being a size 9.  These were purchase to guard against plantar fasciitis.  These shoe are great absorbing the impact when walking on tile floors.  The lavender color is absolutely beautiful.
Perfect!!! I suffered with hella foot pain and ive have barely felt my feet since i skipped these on! Im usually a 8 in womens so thats what i bought and its perfect!

Great for nurses. This is what we all wear. 12-16 hour shifts I needed a new pair. Very happy. They were a bit harder than my older pair but after wearing them around the house a few days they softened up.
Got them at a great sales price on tax free weekend. Replaced a pair I have had forever. Not glamorous but really comfortable. True to size.
Love them they are so comfortable to work in if you‚Äôre standing for 10 plus hours but the color is not the same as in photo. It‚Äôs more pink in person

review_title: Good to throw on and run outside
review_text: They‚Äôre not the cutest, but they are very comfortable, easy to put on, and versatile. I use them to run out to my car, get the mail, etc. They‚Äôre also great for camping‚Äîthey‚Äôre very light weight (I clip them to the front of my pack) and can be hosed off. They are a bit roomy, but I expected as much. The bergundy color is as pictured. I recommend them and will be buying another pair when these wear out.

I was a little bit unsure about purchasing these because of some of the negative reviews.  I normally wear a women's 9 - 9.5 & although instructions for sizing said to go a size down on half sizes, I decided to go up.  (Personal preference - I just prefer a roomier fit.)  Very comfortable and not too roomie.  So glad I decided to go up on sizing instead of down.I have owned a lot of the knock-off brands in the past and I can honestly say that comfort-wise, they do not hold a candle to real Crocs.  Spend a little bit more for the real thing.  So worth it!!!

Absolutely love these! Got them for 25 dollars to try and it was totally worth it . I got the white. You can also throw them in the washing machine on the delicate cycle and air dry them! Best buy ever! Very comfortable
Bought these for my husbands birthday! These will be his second pair. He wouldn‚Äôt wear his black ones to mow the law with so I was thinking army green he would? Hope he likes them!

Great comfort in these Crocs!  I don't wear them a lot because I have custom orthotics but when I do (evening for about 15 minutes) I'm in heaven.  I ordered a size 8 and have a wide foot. These shoes let my foot spread out comfortably even more than my shoes with orthotics.  Since I have foot issues, I checked these out on lots of shoe review pages and Web MD as well.  They are highly rated for comfort and fit although I think I would need more support for a 2 mile walk.
Love the Crocs, I have worn them for years and personally think they are very comfortable.  These were just as expected and shipped quickly !
Was a xmas gift taken to the Caribbean and was a hit because of the colors! They fit perfect! Bought two pair.

I wear these Crocs  year around , with being a diabetic and having nerve damage on the bottom of my feet it's hard to wear shoes that don't make my feet hurt even more at times, theses Crocs are easy to put on and make my feet feel cooler, very happy with my choice of this purchase ...BUT on 10/17/2019 I reordered again and for some unknown reason AMAZON said they were being retuned back to seller so never got them .
Very comfortable and have replaced my tennis shoes as my summer shoe. I will still wear them in the house come winter time.

What can you say about Crocs that haven't already been said?  Other than I bought these for our daughter for her upcoming wedding to wear at the reception so she can feel comfortable.  I hope they go well with her $3,000 dress.  :-)
Hands down the most comfortable shoes I own. I love to use for gardening as they are super easy to clean. I can‚Äôt believe I was a croc hater for so long lol

Love my crocs. They fit great. I use these as house shoes. One thing, among a few, that I love about these crocs is that you can totally scrub them clean and they will dry out within the hour. Great for house shoes or even garden shoes (if all your doing is weeding and not shoveling or digging, lol). I love my crocs and will always have a few pairs.
My daughter had these shoes so I decided to buy them. Best purchase ever especially for summer. They are comfortable, easy to slip on and off and easy to clean. Love them!

These crocs were recommended by a friend. I didn't think I needed a pair but for a fair price, I bought them. I'm glad I did. I use them in place of flip flop outside when I need to have my toes covered. They're very durable and fit well.
BOUGHT THESE FOR A FRIEND.  SHE HAD ALWAYS WANTED A PAIR AND I DECIDED SHE NEEDED TO TRY TRHM. SHE LOVES THEM!
Love these. Pretty color. Just purchased 5 pairs for the majority of the house. Everyone loves them and the kids love putting them in "sport mode".

These are for my kid.  It's sad to see that someone so young has given up on life.  This footwear is the obvious pairing with a nice pair of sweatpants to let all your friends know you have little intrest in thriving.  Give up and watch tv, play on your phone, whatever.

review_title: I used to be such a hater but man these comfy
review_text: I gottta say after wearing them for about a week now my feet are very happy! I mostly wear them around the house/yard and they're like walking on air - which is a nice feeling after being on my feet for 12hrs in a busy hospital. They're a simple slide on shoe as I leave work but the magic is in the performance racing strap - they don't annoyingly wiggle off your foot.No but really, super comfy and would recommend to a friend

review_title: Love kicking around the house and garden in these
review_text: I've been looking for something easy to wear around the house and patio garden for quite some time and have always ended up settling for flip-flops which provide zero support. I've wondered about Crocs but have never tried them before. A friend mentioned she used them to garden in and I decided to order a pair. I'm very satisfied. They're comfortable, easy to slog on and off, and because of all the holes, my feet remain cool. The 9M is on the roomy side, but my feet are more wide than narrow. Still, they stay on my feet without use of the back strap. Good purchase!

I know some people think they have arch support, but I don't feel any.  Then again, I need a really high arch in my shoes.  So take that for what it's worth.  I usually wear Birks, but I like to wear crocs around the house so I don't have to switch shoes if I'm gardening or washing dogs outside.  And when I bruised the bottom of my feet I needed to wear softer shoes for several weeks and crocs fit the bill.

review_title: Great comfort for my flat wide feet.
review_text: I love these. My feet are very wide and very flat but I can wear these with great comfort all day. I take long walks in them and work out in them, too. I always laughed at the aesthetics of the these things but once I tried them I don't care how odd they look. My biggest fear is that they will change them or stop making them.

Order your size, they are plenty wide (if 1/2 size, I order down.  I have wide foot, but plenty wide)  In ‚Äúbanded‚Äù Crocs I‚Äôve learn to order up to next size. (ie: I wear a 8 1/2 w so I ordered an 8 in these)Service was fast.  Product as pictured.

Everything was perfect! Exactly what you want out of your croc lol. My only complaint is how the shoe was packed. My left one came completely warped. Hoping it will straighten out over time. Its been a few days and its still all funky looking but we will see. Luckily its just a gardening shoe for me. Either than that cute color & good price.

I wear an 11 1/2 or 12 in shoes normally, but she had size Women's 11 / Men's 9 and they didn't seem too bad on my feet so I ordered the Women's 12 / Men's 10 size thinking they'd be one size bigger and be perfect.  They weren't, they were too small.  Thankfully it was no problem to return them and order one size bigger.  I picked the tan/khaki color and haven't regretted it for a second.  We even use them for stream-crossings while we're backpacking, and they were fantastic!

review_title: I was pleased to find that the sizes are for either men ...
review_text: Actually, I bought these for my husband who needed a pair for a vacation where he'll be at the sea.  We could not find a pair of men's that fit him because they were all too big. When they arrived, he immediately tried them on and found that they fit perfectly and felt good.  Amazon, thank you.

review_title: Same quality, just cheaper on amazon !
review_text: Bought for my mom. I personally am an avid croc wearer and I decided to give my mom the wonderful gift of crocs since she loves mine. They fit just like normal (we wear the same size, I tried them).

I was reluctant to try out these ugly clogs, but finally decided to see what the fuss was all about and took them on a trek in the Panama rain forest and wore them as a camp shoe for a week. Even though the Caymen is supposed to be a closer fit than the Beach, they still feel very loose, as if they're going to fall off, at first. But after getting used to them and forgetting I had them on, I realize that this contributes to the comfort. Unlike my usual sandals, these dry by simply wiping them off which is a huge benefit in wet environments. I still think they're fugly but they're extremely comfortable for wear around the house or camp, and light enough to always take with you on your travels.
Been wearing these for years.  They last forever and I have solid black, brown and multicolor so have what I need and never have had to replace yet

review_title: Best shoe to wear if you have a bad back
review_text: I have a bad back and my doctor told me to wear Crocs well over 10 years ago so they are my everyday shoe. No other shoe feels right to me now. I highly recommend them.
These are comfy and keep my feet at agreat temperature. I dislike slippers or shoes that are restrictive or make my feet hot. These have been great at keeping my feet comfortable.

Crocs are awesome, and these are genuine, nothing more to sayCons -- Don't leave them in heat !!  I left mine on the porch in the sun for a day and they shrank literally a full size ( at least ).  I've been squeezing my feet into them because I'm stubborn and actually they are stretching back out to original size slowly but surely.  Just don't be stupid and always bring them in from outside, don't leave in your car in the sun, etc.
Just what I was looking for.  Only waited too long to search for this product.  I'm wearing these every day.  Sooo very comfortable.

review_title: You made me love you. I didn't want to do it. I REALLY didn't want to do it!
review_text: Okay, so, let me get this review started off by saying I hate the way the original crocs look. I know, I know, so do a lot of people, but I really hate the way they look. I have always had large feet for a woman (10/10.5), so I really don‚Äôt like shoes that emphasize the fact that I am walking around with feet that could double as water skis at a moment‚Äôs notice.  As many of you have observed, these shoes are not very good at minimizing the appearance of the size of feet they are on.Okay, so now that I have my fussing out of the way, I love my crocs. To the point where if my house was on fire and I could save one pair of shoes, I would save my crocs.I was first introduced to crocs when I was 20 after I developed an almost crippling case of plantar fasciitis due to working a retail job where I wore heels on hard tiled floor for 10+ hours, 5-6 days a week. I could barely walk without being in excruciating pain. Not fun. I went to see a podiatrist who didn‚Äôt do any of the useful things most would have done like offering the night splints or anything like that. He said that I could do a series of injections in my feet, which sounded oh-so appealing, or I could do some stretches, stay off my feet as much as possible, and try wearing crocs whenever I could. I took option b.  I started wearing my crocs from the moment that I got up, until I had to go to work, where I now had a doctor‚Äôs note saying that I had to have comfortable, flat shoes.  I didn‚Äôt wear the crocs to work, that would have been pushing it, but I did wear the most comfortable shoes I could without making my department manager‚Äôs eye twitch when she looked at them. Then, as soon as I got home, I would take them off, and put my crocs back on. The pain lessened almost immediately, and while it was a combination of keeping off my feet, the stretches, and the crocs, the shoes were definitely the most important factor. They helped so much that I wore them outside of the house while running errands. Within a month, the pain had gone from an all-day, all-consuming factor, to something bothered me for only one hour after waking. After two months, I didn‚Äôt even need to wear them anymore, so I stopped.Fast-forward five and a half years and I am pregnant with my first child and the crocs came out yet again. They were my best friends during the second and third trimester and I haven‚Äôt put them up since. For some reason, probably partially due to the way I sleep, which allows my muscles in my calves and ankles to tense up really well, I have had a mild problem ever since having my daughter. It isn‚Äôt debilitating like the first time, it only hurts for about 10 minutes when I first get up in the morning and I am stretching my muscles out, but I wear my crocs at all times when I am in the house.  My husband, whom I met after my first experience with crocs teased me about them quite a lot. He is European and thinks that crocs are some bizarre American fashion statement and had an excellent time laughing at them. But he also has a job where he is on his feet all day, and a month ago he started showing symptoms of plantar fasciitis. I gave him my crocs to wear around the house, remember, I have giant feet, and they went up a size due to my pregnancy to boot (11) , and he has wears a 10.5 in men‚Äôs shoes, so while mine were a little tight, they were comfortable enough. He stopped giving me any grief after he spent a few days clomping around the house in my bright purple crocs. After I peeled myself off the floor after a very satisfying guffaw I got him to admit that they were really helping and that he didn‚Äôt want to walk around without them anymore. Victory is mine! So, because I wanted me crocs back, guess what he got for Christmas? A lovely pair of plain, black crocs all his own.Now, I‚Äôm not a doctor or nurse of any kind, but I can tell that these have really helped my husband and I ease the pain from, and in my earlier case eliminate, a painful condition. Are they pretty? No. Have they worked for us? Yes.I have a pair of size Women's 11 crocs right now and they are perfect for walking around the house, but they are a bit loose, I wouldn't want to try to sprint in them. I have wide feet, and they are perfectly roomy, not tight at all.I bought my husband a Men's size 10, he usually wears a 10.5, and they are a little roomy for him as well, but not to the point where it is an issue. So, judging from my experience, these run a little large and wider than average.

review_title: Excellent shoe for pain in your foot!
review_text: I bought these for my grandma after she hurt her foot. She didn‚Äôt want to wear that big boot so these were her second options. Very comfortable and loose for those who are suffering from plantar. It‚Äôs low and you can wear it with anything.
These crocs were purchased for my Grandson who absolutely loves them. Fit perfectly wears them all the time.

review_title: Buy them, you won‚Äôt regret it
review_text: I‚Äôve had these crocs for 3 years. They‚Äôre definitely a must have! After a while they start to fade a little and get scratched but they are still in great condition for the amount of times that I‚Äôve worn them. The crocs gift tighter when the back strap is down so keep that in mind when picking your size

review_text: These clogs breathe well and have a nice texture inside . Great for in and around the house. I bought these for a halloween costume and didn't think I would like them, but I will be wearing them often.

Arch support is decent and the comfort & convenience factors easily outweigh the fashion scorn I receive ;D

I use to rag on my husband for wearing crocs until I became pregnant again and got some. They are so freaking comfortable. Even when my feet would swell, they provided good support and comfort. Probably my favorite shoe.
Great house shoes

The adjustable strap was a  godsend. After heel spur and an Achilles‚Äô tendon repair this shoes are the only ones that fit with my ankle brace and don‚Äôt rub my healing incisions.

My whole family loves these shoes!  They are light and very comfortable.  I received another pair for christmas that have a cozy insert and I love them.  Great shoe for the money.

As other purchasers have noted, the sizing of Croc brand clogs is off. I would guess that these and the pair of Croc Sport clogs are a full size larger than the number sizing would indicated. Because these are clingy to the foot, they don't shift around despite the sizing so we chose not to exchange for a smaller size. Previous non-Croc branded clogs we've owned shrank over time, especially when exposed to a lot of sun so it is possible that Croc brands do the same and account for the generous sizing. Overall, the build quality is quite good and these Crocs are comfortable.

i have very bad Neuropathy my feet burn as if they are on fire some days and no way i can wear a shoe to go out so i just stopped going now with these crocks i can go back out again really feel good wearing inside or out

I was kind of skeptical looking at all the reviews to order a size larger. I am in between 7-7.5 and these corcs fit perfectly. They are lightweight and feel comfortable. I am glad I bought the right size.

I got these in white and i absolutely love them! I ordered a size women‚Äôs 11/men‚Äôs 9(i think my actual size is a 10/10.5) and they fit more like an 11.5 but it‚Äôs perfect for me! Not only are they super good quality, they‚Äôre SUPER comfy as well!I have skinny feet so they‚Äôre a little wide, but it‚Äôs super nice that my feet have some wiggle room. If you‚Äôd like to purchase these, and want them to seriously fit your feet, I suggest buying your actual size. If you‚Äôd like room i‚Äôd order a half size or a size up from what you already wear!
I did not expect to like these but my wife insisted I try them. They're great! I wear them all the time now. Perfect for hot weather.
The color isn't as blue as I thought from the photos, it is more purple. But sure my daughter will love them!

This is my second pair of crocs. Quality is still pretty good but the heel strap is a bit loose and mis-shapen. The bottom says 'made in Vietnam' as to previous pairs being from Italy. Slight downgrade in my opinion. Overall still happy!

I love my purple crocs !!! I added hello kitty charms. There super comfy, I wish I had gotten 2pairs one for the house and one to wear to work.  My mom said their ugly and yes they are, but so are Uggs but the comfortability  is worth itüòÜ
Men's size 13 is exactly as expected.This is my first pair of Crocs and they are sturdy and comfortable for walking indoors and outdoors.

I see what all the hype is about. I Live my crocs just got them yesterday wore them to run some errands. Got ready for work today and decided to wear these instead of my sneakers and they are so comfortable I have no complaints

What can I say, they are Crocs. They are comfortable. They are not the most stylish shoes but the fact that they can be worn everywhere in Orlando makes up for that. They are fine to get wet at the beach or pool, fine to get sand all over, fine to wear in the mud (as long as you don't mind your feet getting muddy too) because you just have to hose them off. I was just happy to finally find a pair in mens size 13 for my husband. He has wanted them for a couple of years now and we could never find his size. I never thought to look online until a few days ago. I'm glad I did.
Love my home slippers. My first pair lasted about 7 years. The trad had worn so much that often times I would slip on my ceramic tile. Until now I forgot about just how comfortable a new pair feel!

review_title: house slipper work for plantar fasciitis
review_text: i dont like to go without shoes on my feet evn n house  they  r comfortable enough to  wear around house all day  help w support

This is the third pair of Crocs I've owned over the years and they have consistently fit the same.  Durability is excellent as I still have the other 2 pairs even though the soles are thinning (using them to garden in muddy conditions.). I wear them, with the exception of long walks, spring, summer and fall.

review_title: Good shoe from a good company
review_text: Got these for my dad who is 89 and cannot wear regular shoes because of swelling in his feet. He loves them. Good and sturdy. Bought a smaller size and had to return the first pair. No problems.

Honestly, I was confused about the sizing. I have bought many of these shoes over the years for my son but always found that the ones marked from Mexico to be far too small. So I naturally bought them bigger thinking that the same issues in the past would still be true. I was wrong. My bad.
They are super easy to clean, and we're around grease and diesel and dirt a lot. Comfortable and light, good for warm weather
I wish they were a little more supportive in the arch, I have high arches. They are comfy, fit true to width and stay on my feet well.

review_title: Otherwise it is a comfortable shoe and seems good quality
review_text: I wish they were a half size longer. I wear 9.5 and this is 9. Half sizes are not available. Otherwise it is a comfortable shoe and seems good quality. I bough a cheap Chinese-made pair in a different color, much cheaper - but not comfortable.  You can tell the difference.  This is a good pair.
Shoes are a bit shorter by size than the ones I bought a couple of years ago.Satisfied with order. Will order again.

My teenage daughter loves them she bought to Wear with her scrubs  for when she had to wear professional clothing for her biomedicine course but has been using them to wear comfortable shoes after long days of sports practice or games .. they fit her to size and says they are the most comfortable shoes she owns
Other than being a little too big they are comfortable and perfect for the beach. Love the color and the construction is sturdy.
Really nice, I had had a pair years ago and forgot how comfortable they were.  They're great.  Just about the only shoe, I've been wearing.  Perfect for staying home and around in the days of COVID.

I have wide feet and these are medium width, so they are a tad snug width-wise. But for me it's not uncomfortable. I've had many pairs of Crocs over the years and know the feel. These are typical. I wear Crocs until the treads are worn off then get a replacement pair (worn down Crocs are dangerously slippery on wet surfaces).

review_title: Best thing ever invented for feet
review_text: CROCS ARE LIFEEEE !! What are shoes ? Shoes are what ??????? The color is so smooth and vibrant. Fit like a glove.
Love the shoe, hands down the most comfortable shoe in its class I've ever worn.  The run about a half a size big, still wearable because of the heel strap.  Great gardening shoes.
Perfect crocs, except my dog chewed them now. But they arrived perfect, definitely order a size up. I‚Äôm normally 7.5 and I ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly.

I love everything about my new crocs. They fit perfectly. They‚Äôre true to size also. I get lots of comments on these. I normally wear 9.5 in sneakers do I ordered a w12/m10 and they‚Äôre perfect. You can wear them all day.
I liked my Crocs. Extra happy that I got them with discount. They are comfortable and easy to clean.
They seem to conform to feet eventually. My go to shoes in summer and spring. Comfy and easy.
Perfect for those with wide feet! I can even wear heavy socks comfortably with them. I love even more than expected.
fits well, easy to slide on/off. very comfortable shoe to wear around the house. the little balls on the inner sole do take some time to get used to.
The size was a little bit smaller than expected, but arch support is nice. Looks like I found new change for my classical summer shoes.
I got them for a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. It‚Äôs the size she told me she wears. So I‚Äôm sure they will fit. I thought they would be a bit redder though.

Purchased for my grandma who has an assortment of foot problems/pain. Surprisingly this is her first pair of crocs and she absolutely loves them. Not only does it help her with her foot troubles but it also helped her with a mild case of sciatica that comes and goes.
I've got several pairs of crocks. Some with leather for "Dress". Some kick-around, and even Crocks slippers. Its my favorite shoe.
I bought these for my mom for her birthday. She has arthritis in her feet really bad. She said that they were very comfortable & were helping the pain in her feet.

Love these.  Awesome  for arthritis and bunions. I wear Brooks running shoes most of the time but wanted these foe easy things and home wear. I wear a 7 and buy 7 1/2 in Brooks and bought  an 8 in these. Tried a 7 on inthe store and much too small with Socks.

review_title: Great design on these shoes.  Fit me perfectly.  I would recommend this product. ($19.53)
review_text: I normally wear 8-8 1/2 shoe size.  I tried some clogs size 8 on and they fit my feet perfectly.  My feet are a little wide so these may be a little wide for some people.  They provide great support for my feet and I love how light they are.  I am glad there are holes in the uppers of these shoes.  Without them they would be to hot to wear.  I am completely unfashionable since I always wear socks with mine.  I don't care if people cringe when they see me in them.  That is better and less disgusting than letting my feet sweat all over in these things.

review_title: Crocs are great but need a different size.
review_text: Ordered crocs to work in. Bought a size 7 women's but should have went with a 7.5. I just would prefer a tad bit extra room.

review_title: Never thought I would want a pair until now
review_text: I am a size 8.5 and I ordered size 8 my feet are not too narrow or wide fits perfect and feel so comfy for a house shoe indoor and outdoors and  protects  my pedicure  :) my first pair and loving them, even ordered my mom a pair
Ordered for my husband. I ordered a size too big üò¨ he‚Äôs a 10 I ordered 11 so I hope it fits

review_title: Took backpacking as a way to rest my feet. Loved it
review_text: Bought this for backpacking. Never ever ever thought I would buy a pair of Crocs. These things saved my feet during my recent backpacking trip!! Light enough to justify carrying them outside my pack. They saved my feet every night at camp. Will never go backpacking without them again!

I was so relieved when my Crocs arrived. I have such big problematic feet that I was worried that M might mean they wouldn't fit. I am using them for my wedding shoe. Going to bling them up but rest assured, I will be comfortable! This is my second time around and as a bride who has been there done that....comfort is the only way to go! :)
This was a last minute Christmas gift.  Package delivered when it was promised and the receiver loved it!!!  Perfect fit and a very happy young lady!  Thank you for making her day special.
Enjoy this show very much, although a little more ‚Äúroom‚Äù than I thought. Will accept sizing for my overall enjoyment wearing them!
I wear a size 8 in all types of shoes. They were much too large. A 7 womens fit perfectly. I suggest sizing down. Like walking on marshmallows.

review_title: Best of the crocs. Go classic.
review_text: The classics are the best. They have the heel cushioning that lets me work a 12 hr shift without sore heels. The ventilation means my feet aren‚Äôt soggy and stank. I have a high instep and these don‚Äôt rub or make my feet go numb. I can‚Äôt say the same about all crocs.

I am positively SOLD on these! I had tried another style of Crocs, and even though they fit well and were comfortable, (I'm keeping them btw!) the Crocs Classic is now my go-to shoe. I have "special needs" feet and the wide, roomy foot-bed of these are so stable and SO comfortable....right out of the box!I will be ordering more of these. I don't want to risk not being able to find my new favorite shoe at GREAT prices!‚ô°
Good quality
My Husband used to tease me about wearing Crocs but he kept borrowing them! So I bought him a pair of his own. He wears them all the time! Very comfortable and east to put off and on.
My niece wanted these for Christmas she loves them. She‚Äôs happy. I‚Äôm happy we‚Äôre all happy.
These are great shoes, but if you are a half size, then size up.  I usually wear an 8-8.5 but bought a 9 and they just fit.
My hubby LOVES wearing these!! The navy blue is so much better than the lime green ones he used to have - haha! Thanks again, Crocs!

I am a little puzzled by the sizing.  I had previously ordered a pair in 9W/7M.  They were way too big for me so gave them to my son.  He wears a 9 1/2 men's but they fit him fine!!  So this time I ordered a 8W/6M and they fit me fine!  This is my 3rd pair of Croc's - I love wearing them in Spring and Summer - so light, cool and easy to wear!

Got here earlier than expected. The sizing is alittle smaller than at the actual Crocs store but by like half a size. I usually wear an 8 1/2And I sized up to a 9 bc the 8 is alittle too snug but these fit PERFECT these are now my 6th pair of Crocs and I loveee them especially since the quarantine I have no need to wear regular shoes and these are great for everything

review_title: Crocs Classic Clog|Comfortable Slip-on Casual Water Shoe
review_text: My sister is a fast food worker. She is on her feet all day long so these Crocs Classic Clog|Comfortable Slip-on Casual Water Shoe have been a great help on feet.

review_title: I have not stopped wearing them .
review_text: My feet sweat a lot . So i was looking for some kind of footwear that would keep them cool but also more protected then sandals . These have been great . They fit nice and loose and offer good support . Im really glad i bought them .

It makes a great house shoe, for example for taking out the dogs, lawn work (easy to clean), etc. I don't have much use for the strap, so I just move it forward and forget about it. Sometimes I forget I have them on, then find myself at Lowe's wearing bright blue Crocs. Pretty embarrassing!

review_title: So happy Crocs are back in style!!
review_text: As a child, I wore crocs 24/7! I‚Äôm so glad they are back in style! They are so convenient & comfortable. I can wear them to work with my scrubs, out in the yard, to the grocery  store, etc! I am very happy with my purchase. They fit great & are the perfect shade of Gray!

review_title: My second pair of these Crocs and they're fantastic
review_text: The fit is perfect, and they are very comfortable to wear. My first pair lasted me at least 5 years. I use them mainly i the garden.
For some reason not as cushiony as my other three pairs of crocs. Love the color and fit but the inside has some kind of texture that makes it uncomfortable.
Purchased these for my mother and she loves them. They are true to color! Also they are real crocs not a fake pair. As expected and comfy.
I like crocs, they are great for walking on hard surfaces like concrete.  My fret protest if I‚Äôm barefoot and crocs stop that for me.  This is my fourth pair, and I recommend them highly.
Love it! First time croc buyer. Didn‚Äôt understand the hype (all my friends had them). But now I get it. Perfect for all summer time activities. Love that they are rubber and very protective.
So I thought a size 8 would fit because I don‚Äôt like my shoes tight they are big shoes but turns out I was a size 7 üòÄsuper comfy and super cute I love them

review_title: My go to walk around the condo complex clogs.
review_text: This is my second pair of Crocs (my parrots are chomping bits off of my first pair) and I still love them. Easy to slide into and walk around my condo complex. Also love wearing on my balcony when washing it down! Priced just right and love the color.

review_title: Great shoes with a cool pattern!
review_text: I am a fan of Crocs. They fit perfectly and can be worn all day. The only complaint I have is that in the newer models,  they have little "nubs" on the inside of the soles that sometimes hurt the feet until they are worn down. Crocs could just eliminate the "nubs" altogether like the older styles!
THEY'RE CROCS! I like having shoes I can slip in and go! I wear W9 M6, my friend bought me W9 M7. They fit nicely not to big, I have a little room when I don't wear the strap on the back.

The white color is an eye sore and will take on the color of whatever ground you're standing on... That being said I love them. Extremely comfortable and light. Great for a campsite shoe. You can just clip them to your bag which is huge for saving pack space. I personally enjoyed cracking jokes about my white crocs, so a fun shoe for that.
I work in the medical field and these are sooo comfortable! Looks super cute with scrubs too. I even had a patient tell me that I made crocs look cute lol

For going outside and I don‚Äôt want to put shoes on but flip flops are just not good enough.  Spray them with a hose when they‚Äôre dirty.  These are so easy and convenient.  I probably wear them more often than I should

review_title: Versatile shoes - great for hard floors or outdoors.
review_text: These were my first pair of Croc shoes and I‚Äôm sold for life. I have plantar fasciitis and these really help when walking around on hard floors. I use them for indoor shoes. But they‚Äôd be great for outdoor/gardening or camping. They are light and easy to clean.
Crocs are a must for anyone who does yard work or gardens.  They are so easy to slip on and quite comfortable for this type of shoe.
These are the ugliest shoes ever! But, they really serve a purpose. Light, comfortable and inexpensive for what they are.

They're classic crocs: they're huge and they're comfy.I was a little effy at the beginning w the texture of the sole, but as I wore them I forgot about it and the feeling of tiny prickly things went away and now I don't feel them anymore.They're pretty good.
I brought these becuz ive seen family members wearing them and they were definitely worth the buy.
So I‚Äôm a half size and these don‚Äôt come in half sizes so I went with and 8 and I probably should have went with a 7 so make sure you get the right size
It says to order up if you wear a half size, I always a 7 or 7 1/2 but decided to order up because that is what it recommended & the 8‚Äôs fit perfect not big at all

I thought she was joking when she came up to me and asked me for these.  I laughed in her 14 year old face when she uttered the words, "lemon yellow crocs", I mean, surely this was a joke.....It wasn't.  She loves them, so I love them.  They are comfortable, I'll give them that, but I only kept it on long enough to make sure no one got any photo evidence that I was ever spotted in them.
I'm wearing them right now I just love them . Very light to walk in. As soon as I can get other colors I'm going to buy more

They‚Äôre extremely comfortable and the color is nice. Definitely worth the money. You can just slip them on to wear errands, etc. I will definitely buy other colors (I added charms to mine meaning they‚Äôre not included.)
Perfect croc expected quality. Fits as expected as well and color is same as in photo. Got navy blue. No defects.

review_title: I always made fun of crocs
review_text: I always made fun of crocs. Well now I'm eating my words because they are amazing!!! I bought them just for gardening but now I wear them for all things around the house/yard. I haven't tried running errands in them but I imagine they'd be fine because they are surprisingly comfortable. I am a size 8 1/2 & bought a 9 which is perfect. I couldn't wear smaller. My feet are very narrow yet somehow, the wideness of the crocs is not an issue. I will definitely buy them again in other colors.
Bought for my husband just to wear outside or around house and he loves them.  Actually wore them fishing now all his fishing buddies want them

I ordered these for my husband to wear outside while doing light gardening. He is very picky about his shoes and they actually fit and he really likes them. He even wore them on a walk! Now he has stopped wearing his favorite slippers outside to water. I ordered size 7 mens and he usually wears a 7 1/2 mens. Added bonus that they come in a size that will fit his foot.
I love the ease and comfort of wearing crocs. They have been perfect for these work from home days.

I love my crocs! They were my first pair actually and now I can‚Äôt seem to know what I ever did before them lol they honestly feel like clouds on your feet. I use them for work since they are so light and comfortable. I love them!
I bought these as a gift but I have the same pair and they are very comfortable with light arch support
I have been wearing Crocs for 20 yeari. I like them and I like this pair. They suit my lifestyle. You can wear them in water, wash them in the dishwasher, just like brand new.

review_title: WISH THEY WERE AVAILABLE WHEN I WAS A KID!
review_text: Clogs beat slippers hands down! I wear them with socks most of the time I'm lounging around the house in winter and know I can wear them outside for brief errands and not have to change footwear. With the socks they're warm in winter; without socks in summer, just right. I even wear them boating and swimming! They float in the water if they come off. Great for when the water's bottom is slimy, pebbly or mucky. Virtually no maintenance and wear like steel.

When I received my crops they came in a clear packaging. The shoes really do fit true to size. At first they may fit a little snug at the tip of your toes but the first time you wear them they will adjust to your feet. I ordered the color ‚ÄúBlossom‚Äù. Real cute on my feet and super comfy. It‚Äôs like I‚Äôm walking on foam.

I wear these crocs around the house.....I have a foot issue so need to insert my orthotics inside.  But I love them.  I never wear them outdoors so they will stay clean and not dirty up my abode.  I know they're great for outdoor use also but I don't have a yard anymore so for me it's not necessary.

Crocs are about the only shoes I wear due to my wide foot and particularly high arch. My last pair of crocs were a different style and they were considerably narrower. I was delighted that these were the comfortable width I was used to with previous pairs. I held back one star because the footbed feels thinner than it used to be... walking on a gravel path these feel more like a year old pair than brand new. Still, very happy.

There was a time when I might have been embarrassed to be seen wearing such a gawky shoe but having achieved the ripe old age of 66 those times are past. These shoes are very very comfortable, with great support for the entire foot. They do run a bit large so I think I could have gone down a half size. Since they are a clog, however, with the grippy bottom, I have not felt like they would slip off. A bonus that they can get soaking wet with no problem. Wish I had discovered them sooner
I pretty much live in my crocs. Only thing that healed plantar for me. This was a good deal, about $10.00 less than Crocs website.

Not sure why it took me so long to buy a pair of Crocs. They're awesome. I bought these specifically to take the dog out, since I'm not about to walk around in wet grass in any of my other shoes. But I'm finding these are just great house shoes in general.

These crocs are very comfortable. the inner sole had little texture which makes wearing them without socks uncomfortable. they are very durable and the price is very reasonable. do yourself a favor and buy these nice shoes. also to get cheap figets just order fake ones off of amazon
My daughter really wanted these and she can't take them off her feet. Fit well, soft, stylish. Must have!

Received 2 pairs. 1st pair size 13 too large although my regular shoe size. 2nd pair size 12 fit perfect. Love these. I use at gym from locker room into shower. I am diabetic  with sensitive feet.Just what doctor ordered.
Crocs are back, people! I bought these for my niece and she loves them. The color is vibrant and lovely. They fit true to size and she wears the most every day

I love the Crocs, I have been wearing them for years for sore feet. I first saw them being worn by a chef on TV and thought they were rather unattractive but decided to try a pair anyway. Boy am I glad I did, they're super comfortable and with the fur lined ones I'm able to wear them year around. They are especially light weight and they do have arch support. In the summer I wear ones with vents in the top and sides, they're as light as flip-flops but offer protection for my feet.
Awesome crocs. Will buy again...son loved them to this day still wears them. Definitely will buy again and again!! Seller sent fast and did good job!! Thanks

Just use these to go to the beach and they work fine. I finally had to replace my original crocs as they wore out. These are a tad shorter than my original pair, but they are still ok as I‚Äôm not walking a lot

I love my crocs! I never thought I would buy these because I never thought I would have any use for them, but I sure was wrong. I needed a pair of shoes to just throw on an wear them around my dorm. My friend convinced me that crocs were the perfect solution. I ordered them and they came on time for a pretty reasonable price. I also got some jibbitz to accessorize them and make them unique to myself. The jibbitz also help me to know which ones are mine when distinguishing them from other pairs of crocs. I now have power ranger jibbitz and a really cool alligator jibbit that looks like it is swimming. The purchase of crocs was one of my best decisions and I get a lot of compliments on them. The other day I saw someone with hot pink ones and I think that might be my next purchase.

I love crocs.  I have problems with bunions and arch support.  These crocs are perfect for allowing enough room for my toes and the molded arch gives me great support.  Sometimes I wear the strap in front and they are more of a flip flop.

Love them! They‚Äôre a little big but that‚Äôs my fault for ordering a size too large. Im an 8‚Äô1/2 but they don‚Äôt go between sizes. The little loop makes it so the croc doesn‚Äôt come off my foot which is great. Great shoes for hot days.
Got these for my husband who will have back surgery soon and I wanted him to have slip ons as we have all tile in the house. He likes them with socks or without.

I have a similar pair in silver the same size. However my silver ones fit me just a tad bit larger and a tad bit wider making it more comfortable while I have the black ones I just bought I can feel the inside of the croc like it‚Äôs rubbing against the bottom of my feet. No pain just different from my other crocs. but all in all they are comfortable
I can't rate these shoes because they are my husband's. I can only say that he is very pleased with the fit and feel of his crocs and would certainly buy them again.

review_title: I don't care how many times i've been told how ugly these are. They are comfy!
review_text: The first pair I had were a knock off brand and I got these hoping they would last longer. It's been at least a year and they have. I mainly wear these around the house and the patio. I have bad knees and the cushion in these really help. They are really light weight also. Barely seems like you are wearing anything. I like wearing them while I'm cooking (careful of hot liquid, won't protect from burns) or doing dishes. Also good when you have to be on your feet a long time cleaning and vacuuming. Not good on hot days. Wear with socks if you plan to wear them all day. The grip on the sole is much better than the off brand ones. Still won't wear them on wet ground after slipping badly with my old ones. I do use them as pool shoes though. Buy them a little bigger than you would think because if they are too tight and you wear them without socks you can get blisters easily. My friends kid wears these all the time and he gets blisters because he runs in them. The off brand ones I originally bought i told myself they were for gardening. After slipping a few too many times and being freaked out by bugs crawling in the little holes and I don't use them for that anymore. I have been told many times how ugly these are and i tell the people to try mine on and see how comfy they are. They agree and then say not to wear them in public ha ha.
We love our Crocs, only thing is that you have to ORDER 1 SIZE DOWN. So if you're an 8, go with a 7. They run large it seems. We ended up exchanging them and it was fairly easy!

Good buy. Shipped promptly. Thanks. In general (for me) most Crocs tend to be a bit small and/or snug if your feet or ankles swell at all. So personal preference I usually do size up one unless an extra wide fitting style.I am a  5 1/2 - 7 in W shoes, narrow feet but prefer wide width for bit extra room and comfort.
My daughter said these are so comfortable. They look great also, I just love the mustard color. (Definitely the authentic Crocs)
thanks

I like crocs for work.  I am on my feet all day.  These don't have any cushion, so they aren't going to be the most comfortable shoes ever, but after a day on my feet...they don't hurt.  I have been wearing crocks for 5 years now.  I used to have plantar faciitis, really bad....I haven't since wearing crocs.  I have tried to go to a more attractive, cushioned shoe, but within two days of wearing them....my plantar faciitis returns, not bad, because I immediately start to wear my crocks and it goes away.  So I have given up and am only going to wear these to work.

review_title: ... sizing is the same as another pair that I love - there really is no problem in wearing jthem
review_text: I rated these 'somewhat large' but the sizing is the same as another pair that I love - there really is no problem in wearing jthem.  This contrasts with other brands where  an 8M ( my regular shoe size)  was a full 1 1/2 in too small.  The strap iin back keeps them anchored with no problem (a real consideration since I'm just recovering from a broken ankle).  I love crocs and wear them througout the summer with no socks.

review_title: Appear to be good quality for a much better price
review_text: I love crocs and wear them at work. Prices have gone up while quality is not as food since mfr moved to China. So, I struggle with finding something that feels sturdy and wears well. I just got these today, and they fit great. So far so good!
I freaking enjoy these. They are my first cross ever so I love them. And they comfy and the purple is sooooo nice ü•∞üíúü•∞üíúü•∞üíúü•∞üíú

Difficult time getting to these crocs without going through Amazon Fashion but I eventually found them.  Also no wide widths only normal and medium.  That is why they only get 4 stars.  Wore them yesterday and my feet felt good.  Extra size bigger to get a wider shoe.

Bought these to walk the dogs throughout the day (usually for 20 minutes). Also use them when watering plants/shrubs outside, getting mail, or throwing out trash.  More comfortable than flip-flops as they provide no arch support and you can't really walk fast in them.  Have not worn them longer than one hour.  They fit as expected b/c the description does say they run a little large.  I normally wear a 6.5 so I purchased the Women's 6 US.  You have to get used to the cushioning/padding inside.  They're textured with little plastic nubs that massage your soles as you walk. B/c I don't wear socks, when I take them off and walk on the carpet, there's a strange sensation on the soles of my feet. Not really a complaint, but I can see why it might not be ideal for all-day wear.

review_title: My husband had a pair and loved them so much
review_text: My husband had a pair and loved them so much , we bought for my father-in-law. He wears them all the time because of the comfort and ease of putting them on. They can be dressed up or just for going in the garden around the house. I would recommend these shoes for anyone looking for comfort.
Bought for my son who is in culinary class at school. He loves these.. slip resistant and comfortable

review_title: Love the color, not supportive but did not expect it to be
review_text: Color is a perfect blue! Very comfortable. However I did buy them for a nursing shoe and it is not supportive enough to wear for 12hrs if standing. But I now wear them for many other things!

review_title: Shipped faster than I could have imagined!!!

review_text: Bought a pair for my husband and daughter per their request. They have worn off brand from Walmart and didn‚Äôt like them. They said it rubbed their ankle area. After wearing these Crocs, we won‚Äôt be buying anything different again. They both love them and wear them alot. My daughter has issues with ingrown toenails and these are comfortable for her...also suggested by her dr. Love these!

review_title: Very comfy cross and nice color

review_text: Very comfortable, especially if your knee hurts a bit. The design is not flattering, looks a bit quaint but I love it for comfort strong cushion for my knees.

review_title: If you ain‚Äôt Crocin, we ain‚Äôt talkin!
review_text: Had my first pair last me for a year in the Middle East desert while deployed. They were essential for walking over dirt and gravel to the showers/latrine. Just bought another pair to replace them. People will give you heck for their ‚Äústyle‚Äù, but they‚Äôre comfortable and effective!

Great shoe, feels nice, but definitely recommend going down one shoe size. I'm normally a 10 but I think a 9 would've been a much better fit. Still, the strap on the back of the shoe prevents it from falling off and I only use these indoors so not going to make a big deal out of it.
My size is 6.5 so I ordered 7. They were very large on my feet so I will return them and request an exchange to size 6.

I love them. They make my feet feel great.  I wear them around the house and my feet don't get tired, and if my feet do feel tired i put them on and they feel better in a short period of time. They are amazing!

review_title: All the cool dads have them.
review_text: I steal these from my boyfriend constantly to wear in/out of the house or around the yard. So ugly but so perfect for quick trips where you just need something on your feet.
They‚Äôre comfortable and true to size. For half sizes got to the next full size so your heel doesn‚Äôt hit the back uncomfortably.
Favorite house shoe! I wear these constantly and I love them! So much better than slippers. Offers such great support for my flat feet.
Typical Croc shoe, great for yard work, taking trash out, etc. I do think they run a bit big though. I would size down.

For years I made fun of people that wore Crocs... I tried them on and now I won't take them off. They are fantastic. I do everything in these. My wife won't take me anywhere because they are hideous but at the end of the day my feet are comfortable so I don't care.

review_title: He LOVED them and wore them till they fell apart
review_text: I had bought another pair of crocs before for my husband to work out in the garden. He LOVED them and wore them till they fell apart. These are a new, different color but same style as before. They are amazing! We have tried other brands before as well, but crocs are great, non slip when pavement is wet, comfortable, wearable inside and out... GREAT! Love these and will continue to buy them each time they wear out.
I bought these primarily for in-home use and they work just fine.  You can wear them outside also, but I rarely do that.  They are comfortable and stylish.  Recommended.
I put a sole liner in them for more arch support and increased comfort from texture of the foot bed. Like them very much

I love these comfy crocs! They are BRIGHT & LOUD! If you like bright colors, you will love them. I live in Florida & wear a lot of bright colors and vineyard vines so they work well for me. And I love them for the beach.

review_title: Grandson is happy with his new crocs!
review_text: You can't go wrong with Crocs. A must have for summer. Grandson loves them and this was the best price I found. Yay for Nana!
Love Crocs! These are great. They arrived in great condition and the color is really pretty. Brand new and fit great.

review_title: Super comfortable for an over sized old ladyü•¥
review_text: I love these so much that I ordered a second pair.. I am severely over weight and I have to work in a wearhouse.. perfect comfort all day long
I was so hesitant.. but i love them! Crocs to work crocs to shop crocs for the house, they‚Äôre AMAZING lol
I like everything about this shoe, it's the closest to being barefoot. This is the only kind of shoes that I wear, they're so comfortable, I actually wear them all year!

My package came pretty beat up so I was a little nervous, but they were just what I had expect and more! I had no idea crocs were so comfortable! I will definitely be buying another pair once I wear through these ones!
Wonderful shoes for my big hubby with foot problems.  Recommended by my foot Specialist.  Highly recommended.

review_title: A classic that has not changed.
review_text: I prefer to wear shoes around the house; but I have "outside" and "inside" shoes.  These fit the bill for "inside" shoes.  I can wear them with socks (winter) or with out (summer).  They are great for using in the kitchen.  I  cook a lot and it's not out of the norm to get something on them.  A quick scrub in the utility sink and they are good to go.  I usually get a new pair every other year (they do get worn out).  Love the Garnet color!

I bought these for my granddaughter and she loved them. I thought the price was too high for rubber shoes but I guess these are coming back in style for teenagers. As long as she was happy with them I guess that‚Äôs all that matters.
I bought these over two years ago and they‚Äôre still working well after Daily use.

The basic Crocs design, which this model represents, is classic. I use it exclusively as my indoors 'shoe'--when I enter the house, my outside (dirty) shoes come off and the Crocs go on. They're also waterproof, so you can use them in the shower, or at the pool or beach, if you wish. I bought my first pair 5 years ago, and it's indestructible; I only bought this second pair because I needed it to use on vacation. The shoe sizes are generous--I'm a size 12 but wear a size 11 Crocs--so it might pay to try on a few sizes in a store before purchasing it.

review_title: Had to send back for next bigger size.
review_text: Nice but too small in length.  I sent them back and bought the next size up and that worked out great.

review_title: My friends make fun of me, but I‚Äôm too comfy to care
review_text: I bought these as house shoes, yknow the ones you throw on to check the mail or take the dogs out. The house shoes you put on after a long day and you just wanna lounge about.What started as a pair of at home shoes only, turned into out and about errand shoes. I love these things, and though they are absolutely ugly, I love them the way people love pugs for their ugliness. 10/10 comfort.
This is my first pair of crocs I‚Äôve owned and I love them! They are quick to put on and they are comfortable too. Would definitely buy again.
I think that crocs are a wonderful house slipper, but sometimes I wear them outside.  Every once in awhile I even wear them to church or to work when I need to relax my tired feet:)
My boyfriend is a 14M and I finally found them here. Got some jibbitz online and now we have matching crocs!
A little big but not overly big. Love the massaging ridges inside. I wear a 9-9.5 and size 10 was good.

I gave these as a gift and they loved. I didn‚Äôt realize how small they would look I got a size 6 in women‚Äôs and they look like a kids shoe(sooo cute lol) I would definitely order again but this time more so for me next time

This is my fourth set of Crocs clogs, and apparently they're running a little smaller than they used to. That, or my feet got longer. I wish Crocs came in half sizes, but oh well.Comfortable & convenient, but don't wear these if you're doing any real walking. Blister city on the top of a foot sans socks. If anything, the worst thing I can say about these plastic shoes is they wear out faster than most other shoes. At least they're priced cheap enough I don't mind having to replace them every year (or less).

Ridiculous, right? That‚Äôs the point. They make me smile while gardening or doing other light yard work. I don‚Äôt wear them off my property because I look like a duck. When they get too dirty to bring inside I hose them off first. Gotta keep them offensively-bright yellow!
Love my crocs. They got like a glove and are my ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù shoes, especially now throughout my pregnancy.

Bought these as my first pair of Crocs, absolutely love them. They're exactly what you'd expect with a pair of Crocs. They fit my true size perfectly, so if you're in between sizes, probably go a size up.

My sister got me these for my birthday! I never considered buying Crocs and I always made fun of my family wearing them. They‚Äôre light weight, comfortable and I like the blue color. Not a big fan of how they look but will keep wearing them stout the house.

This is the first pair of crocs that I purchased because I don't care for the style. I purchased them for around camp when backpacking and now I wear them around the house daily. We have hardwood floors and they are super comfy and keep my feet from hurting. I take a size 8 and they were true to size. They are made to be roomy but I would not down size because they are made to fit loose and I wear them with and without socks.

I was on the fence about the sizing since I kept reading to size up if you‚Äôre a half size (women‚Äôs 9.5) & I ordered a 10. Definitely size up! It feels true to size for sure. I ordered these for my pregnancy & they definitely feel great!

I wear a size 8 and the Crocs fit perfectly. The strap keeps the shoe securely on my feet. The plastic is comfortable and soft. I can wear them with socks or barefoot.I'm recuperating from a broken ankle and my left foot swells a bit. I needed a shoe that accommodates that swelling.These crocs are perfect during the day and they remain perfect in the evening when they accommodate my swollen foot and my regular foot.

review_title: Good Value, Good Quality, Nice Shoes
review_text: My daughter has two pair of Crocs that she loves. One from the Crocs website and one from Amazon. There's no difference in quality and they shipped quickly. She loves them! Very comfortable and the color selection is fun!
I got the size 5 women (hard to find) and it fit perfectly. I work at a vet office and I‚Äôm usually standing 9-11 hours a day, so paired with compression socks my feet and legs feel great all day.
This is my 4th pair of Crocs.  These ones were a little bigger then all my last pairs.  But regardless of that they do the job! Bad arthritis in my feet. These things are a blessing!
Daughter loves them. Comfortable and well made. Good price. Fast shipping. Highly recommend

I got a gel shoe pad and everything is good again. I wear them everywhere. They can be worn as a dress up or dress down. Will buy another color soon.
My husband wears Crocs all year now.  Lined ones in the winter.  He hates flip flops and loves that you can just slip them on and off!

I needed new garden shoes, and so I tried a new pair of crocs.  My old pair never fit correctly.  As a 7.5, l‚Äôd followed their recommendations and ordered a 7.  This time I bought an 8.  They are very comfortable, water proof, and perfect for the yard.

I bought these to be my backyard gardening shoes. They are fantastic! I was worried because I‚Äôm a normally 9.5 shoe size in women‚Äôs, and the Crocs only come in full sizes. I sizes up, and they fit great. They don‚Äôt fall off when walking around. I‚Äôve warn them all day with great comfort.

A buddy said to go one size up if i had a wide foot so I didIm usually a 13 wide but the 13 felt really tight so I went up one size and its a bit bit big on the length but just perfect on the with. if they had a 13.5 it would be perfect

I usually wear a size 7 shoe. I had a pair of crocs that I got 8 years ago that literally stood the test of time! I bought a size 6 womans and they fit perfectly. I love these shoes! They are super durable and perfect for the Florida lifestyle with the rain, beach, heat, etc. They shipped super fast and I was happy see the they were minimally wrapped bc Amazon LOVES to be wasteful with its packaging.

This was wayy better than I expected, it fits well, confortable, looks good and the delivery was very quick. I would rate these more than five stars if i could. What I payed  for was more than worth it.

review_title: These fits as expected & seem comfortable. This is my first time buying Crocs because ...
review_text: These fits as expected & seem comfortable. This is my first time buying Crocs because I was looking for a new type of shoe to wear around the house rather, than flip flops or western boots, so Im trying these. The sole has a bumpy texture, which im not used to, but if I can get used to that I think these will work great. The plastic on the outside seems decently solid while the inside is semi spongy & comfortable. Since im rough on my foot wear this is a bonus. Hopefully these will last a little while!

This shoe is lightweight, comfortable, and very squishy. However, my dad thinks this shoe is rather fancy and too fashionable for his taste lol. He prefers the simpleness of Crocs Classic Flip-Flop or Classic Slide. Although the color looks a little different compared to the one shown in photo (the one my dad received has a greener tone to it), but it is still acceptable. Crocs shoes are divided into three types: roomy fit, relaxed fit, standard fit. This shoe has a roomy fit and it fits my dad as expected. On top of that, I got it on sale, so yay for me!

I love looking at people's reactions when I step out of my 2001 chevy malibu in style. Dare to clunk around in these comfortable crocs that honestly look like you've shoved your feet into two fish's mouths! Love these things. They make me smile.

review_title: Really different type slip on-first pair-love them
review_text: +I like the insole which are textured and feel simulating against your feet. Fits loosely and comfortable.

review_title: I love it. Wife is ashamed.
review_text: My wife hates them so I promised her i will not wear them outside our 20acre property. Aside from that.... i love Crocs. This is the first pair i ever bought (Nov2018) since it was on special for black friday. Probably my last pair too haha

Just a note on sizing:Men‚Äôs Nike size 10 ~ Men‚Äôs Crocs size 11I wear a Nike 10.5 and ordered both sizes 11 and 12. I like the 12 better. My toes touched the end of the 11. I have a bit of room in the 12.

Is Crocs, son!  You either love em or hate em.  Obviously my 5 stars means I love them.  I wear the slate grey for an understated, refined look, and the grass green for funking around!  I'm nuts and like to nut so what can I say, Crocs all day!
