review_title: They fit and color is a right.
review_text: Although these took about a month to get to me, they are just what my son wanted. Right color, right size. He is very happy with these crocs.
Seriously the best! Love the purple color. Got all my girls a pair as well! Plan on buying more colors.
My daughter loves these! Easy to clean and easy on/off. Price was better than I could find anywhere else.
First pair of crocs and I am not disappointed! I wear a 7 1/2 got the 7 and they fit perfect! Super comfy
just needed slip on garden shoes; these do the job!  easy to clean if tromping about in mud. plastic so can leave outside in rain, etc.
Me encanta el color, muy linda!! Y tambien son muy comodosüòÑI love the color, very pretty!! And they are also very comfortable.

review_title: the rest of the shoe is in great shape. While they are not the most attractive ...
review_text: I bought my first pair of Crocs around 2007.  I still have them even if the tread has mostly worn away with use, the rest of the shoe is in great shape.  While they are not the most attractive looking footwear (I think a comedian made a joke about people wearing Crocs having given up on life) they are sturdy, protect your toes, stay on very well, float and dry/ clean up a lot easier than sandals with nylon straps.
My boyfriend loved these! He‚Äôs obsessed with crocs and wanted the red ones so i bought his this as a gift and i highly recommend.
I love it

review_title: A standard footware item in my closet
review_text: Classic Crocs still get the job done. Lightweight, water tolerant, easy to put on yet stays on your foot. My feet a wide and I appreciate the roominess of Crocs. The strap can be flipped up to make backless sandals or flipped down when you need them to be securely on your feet.

I have been wearing Crocs for years and recently had to replace the ones I have (even though they are pretty much indestructible!) Their comfort and waterproof/mud proof nature makes them perfect for working in the garden and can be easily hosed off to wear again. When purchasing, I would recommend buying them in your exact size, and if a half size: size down. I am a women‚Äôs size 7.5 and the size 7 fit perfectly.
I ordered a size 14 for my 15 year old son. Yes, he has giant Flintstone feet, but these fit great. Slightly big, but he's still growing so they are perfect.

My favorite summer and lake shoes. Very lightweight and comfortable. Easy on and off and no problem if they get wet. Very quick drying and don't carry dirt in the treads. Easy to clean and rinse off. Great for keeping by the door to go in and out of the garage as well. My wife wishes they got way less use then they do!
I loved the croc but I didn‚Äôt realize they were wide fit and I don‚Äôt have wide feet so I returned them!
With shoe stores closed I had to order on line. These look great, but the fit was a little tighter than my old ones I bought in the store.
By far the most comfortable work shoe I have ever worn! I am extremely happy and highly recommend these for those of us on our feet for hours !

review_title: Liked very much but not a good fit for me
review_text: Nice looking shoe however they were not good fit for me.  They really hurt my feet.  May need a break in  period.  I do have feet issues so perhaps that is why they were so painful. Sadly, I had to return.

review_title: Runs a little big, but very comfortable!
review_text: Got a size 13, runs a little big for barefeet but with socks it's a much better fit. Very comfortable, walked around Disney World for a week and a half with these on and never had foot pain once! Would highly recommend!

Good pair or real crocs I ordered off Amazon because they were the lowest price I could find . Be carful leaving these in ur car in the Texas heat for weeks because the sun will cause them to shrink this is my second pair of crocs super comfy house shoes , lounge shoes with socks or without  regardless very comfortable !

review_title: They look dumb as hell but my nephew wanted them.
review_text: He is trendy, he has small feet, they fit his small feet, he is much swag now. 5/5

Extremely comfortable. Perfect for gardening, washes off and dries easily. I have flat feet and often have issues with footwear offering too much arch support but these are perfect or me. They are quickly becoming my ‚Äúdo it all‚Äù shoes!

review_title: One of my favorite pairs of summer shoes
review_text: These Classic Clogs are a staple for summertime, and I was able to purchase these for 1/2 price from Amazon! As usual, they fit true to size yet are roomy enough for my feet to breathe. The cutouts provide plenty of avenues for airflow. They are comfortable enough for me to walk in them all day long. They're not as cute or stylish as some of the other Crocs styles, but I can slip them on easily for quick errands or outside work so they're very practical. I just replaced my first pair, which were almost 10 years old, so they are durable as well.
I wanted some house shoes that I could clean in and these work great! I can wear them with socks or no socks and then clean them easily too.
Product adequately packaged. Fits ok, very light on my feet. Trying to get used to wearing it as it a little wide for my feet. Also the inside of the sole (pimples) takes some getting used to
I wanted a pair and I got em!!!But not much shock  support and that's what I need. My legs felt tired after one shift in these crocs.

review_title: Crocs for Men are THE WAY TO GO
review_text: You just can't beat crocs for ease, comfort, waterproof, etc.  They are worth every penny!
Bought for a friend, they fit true to size for the roomy crocs, which I guess means they fit a little big. Either way if you like roomy/comfy order your size.

These Crocs are very practical. I keep them by the back door to slip on whenever I go outside when the ground is wet and for washing the car. These replace a pair that I wore for over 10 years and they still were not worn out, so I am impressed with the durability of Crocs. Comfort is another issue - for all Crocs I have tried. I find them uncomfortable when worn without socks. With socks, they are OK, but without socks they rub my toes.

review_title: Love me some Crocs! Fit comfy and as expected.
review_text: Love these! I wear them as slippers around the house. They are very comfortable and fit exactly as expected. I wear between an 8 1/2 and a 9 in women‚Äôs and the 9s fit me great as long as I wear socks with them. They are a bit loose without socks.

I've worn Crocs for basically my entire life except last year. I was really missing having these obnoxious, rubber slabs on my feet, so I decided to order some. I don't think I've ever felt this happy before. THEY FRACKING ROCK!!!! I got the bright red ones in men's size 11, and while they were a bit large, they were perfect in every other aspect. Yes, they did change the sizing a bit, so they're very roomy, but I don't care. I love them! 10/10 would recommend.

Love slipping these things on for walking around the house or running outside quick to take out the trash or walk to the corner store.  Check the price for different colors when you order, some colors are cheaper than others.

review_title: Half size or wide foot, SIZE UP
review_text: If you‚Äôre a half size or wide foot, size up to the next available size. Crocs so of course good quality. Usually wear 9.5 W or 10, ordered a 10. Have enough room to wear thin sock also if needed. Love them!

Love crocs. I have wide feet and these fit perfectly. Super super comfortable. Sure their not the most aesthetically pleasing but I‚Äôll take comfort over appearance in my day to day life. If I wanted to be dressy, I have shoes for that.

review_title: love them, had to buy another pair
review_text: Bought for husband and son took tried and loved them, great for wearing to hot tub thru grass.

review_title: How to ship back and get another pair a size smaller
review_text: The shoe is way too big for my foot length wise. I would like to exchange for a size smaller and see if that is right. There is at least a 1/4 inch too big lengthwise and across the toe box!

I freaking love these crocs. They're so comfortable and cute! I wear them to teach and they have the perfect amount of arch support for my needs. Only downside is when you wear them with the ankle strap down, they can be snug.

review_title: The fit is true to size.
review_text: Super comfortable, fit absolutely perfectly and the color is vibrant. Crocs have always been my favorites. Could wear them all day every day.

Loved the crocs, fit perfect had to do some homework to figure out her size. She wears them all the time. We purchased the white many of her friends wear them also. They were perfect. Good fit, she wears them with nike socks and they are cute. Her boyfriend bought the camo and he loves them as well

review_title: Still great after all these years!
review_text: Replaced a similar pair from 10 years earlier.  Fit is a little different, but still can wear the same size without going up or down (but still over-sized compared to my usual street shoe size).  Now has more  vent holes at the very front of toe, which unfortunately lets in water when walking through dewey grass or shallow snow.  I may tape one or 2 of those vents closed.
Not the newest crocs they are more like the first ones that was first put on the market

These fit as expected, but the color was off. I was hoping for a true white, but these are more cream white.  They don‚Äôt really work for what I need them for, but I already threw away the tags, so I‚Äôm stuck with them.

review_title: Now I get it, these are awesome feeling
review_text: I have made fun of these clogs forever but needed something to quckily slip on to keep in the garage. They feel AMAZING on, I take back everything I used to make fun of them for. I now get it, years late. Will always have a pair moving forward
It is my 1st ever pair of crocks. It‚Äôs like walking on clouds. I recommend them especially if you work on your feet all day.

My husband had a pair of these and he particularly liked them for feeding the cows and cleaning their stall because he could just rinse them off.  When we lost our home in a fire last year, we didn't grab his Crocs, so I just reordered the same style (thank you, Amazon, for making the reorder process so easy!  Looked up my order history and clicked "order again" and I was done).  My husband likes them!
Did it go back to popular shoes line to the teenagers? Now it's November and I still see some middle school students wearing it. These classic shoes are always there.
its my favorite Sandler.  To bad I couldn't  find them  in the store.  Its a bit high  for a peice of foam but I love them.
Not my first pair, and I‚Äôm a huge fan of crocs. Big on comfort as a new mom. However it felt a little looser than my other crocs. Love the color!
Bought these for my Husband and he loves them!  Great shoe ~ Fast shipping ~ Highly recommend!
As expected,  good quality,  non slip. If u will wear socks order one size up.Recommended

These shoes are extremely comfortable like clouds, and give great support. The price on Amazon definitely cant be beat for authentic Crocs! $25 is the best price I've seen after searching locally they are at least $39/$40+. The size is right on, so if you want a little more room order 1 size up. You will not be disappointed when you order!

review_title: Most fashionable? Not really. Comfortable, practical, and durable? Definitely.
review_text: Awesome shoes. Adjust the swiveling back securing foot strap and you can wear it all day like any other sandal. I've tried very hard to make them slip off and I couldn't get them to slip off accidentally. Leave the swiveling back securing foot strap towards the front of the shoe and you have a quick and easy slip op show or sandal. The shoe's design is very airy. Obviously you feet will get cold on a cold day, but it's refreshing. I would buy it again, but it's unlikely that'll i'll have to buy another because the Crocs feel solidly built and durable.Note that the shoe is typically larger that average shoe sizes, but frankly it's not a big deal. Mine was a bit larger than my actual foot, but the loose feel is very nice. The shoes don't come off even though they are a tad big.

review_title: I‚Äôm so very happy that I finally purchased these Crocs
review_text: I‚Äôm so very happy that I finally purchased these Crocs! I‚Äôve heard so much about them through the years. Amazon was fantastic as always. My shoes fit wonderfully. They are extremely comfortable. And they were delivered right on time. Thank you Amazon! I look forward to purchasing More of the shoes in different colors. ‚ù§Ô∏èüíúüß°üñ§üíõüíöüíô
I normally wear size 6 or 6w or sometimes 7. I ordered size 6 and it fits perfect! I'd get another pair soon.
Could be greater, but the size seems small for the size I ordered.  (Then again, I did place insoles in them.  Maybe that's some of the feel-small problem.)Love the color.Comfortable.Just Great.
I love Crocs. They are comfortable and keep my feet warm and protect my toes from getting stubbed on whatever, lol.
Got the Navy blue, they are so cute...the first day I wore them I got a compliment!  Crocs are my favorite shoe, for older people that have sore feet, these work great!
As a family we wear crocs all of the time. They are easy and comfortable to just slip on and go. Would buy many times again. They last along time I‚Äôve had one pair for 10 years.

What's not too like about crocs? They last forever.  Sizing has changed since I bought my last pair as they used to be mens 10-11 now it is size 10 or 11. I think I read somewhere on crocs website if you wear a half size to order a size down.  The size 10 fit well.  My suggestion would be to try them on at a store and then order them on amazon as the price is better.  This way there should be no sizing issues. I think I paid $23.75 for my current pair and the prime shipping is always nice.

review_title: Great product! Better color! Just be aware of the support!
review_text: I love how it fits! My normal sneaker size in a 9/12 but I ordered a ten. The colors are vibrant and don‚Äôt fade (also they are veeeeery easy to clean!) Not much arch support but I knew that because I‚Äôm a repeated buyer. I highly recommend!

This is probably my 5th pair of Crocs; I wear them just about all day every day.  I love them because they are comfortable, lightweight, and easy to clean.  Eventually the bottoms of the soles wear out for me on the ball of the left foot (what's that about?).  And this happens less quickly if I'm careful to avoid surfaces with sharp rocks.This is my first pair in navy and I find they go with everything.  In the past, my go-to color was black.I find Amazon's price to be competitive with other sellers.

Love these and fit great

they fit just like i wanted them to do get your reg. size and they have lasted me about 8 months now! they are still in good condition and i use them to go to the beach all summer and in the garden and taking care of the chickens since they are easy to wash! i also like just wearing them to go outside. very comfortable!

This footwear fit my needs perfectly.  I was looking for all-weather, all-terrain footgear that is quick to put on and quick to take off.  Slip-on's were a must.  I use them for walking around outside my house, which means I'm walking in dirt, grass, on cement, on a wooden deck, and so forth.  I also use them for boating on a pontoon boat and for general, quick around-town use.  These clogs fit the bill perfectly.  They are durable, don't get dirty easily, are very easy to clean, and provide the foot with protection without stifling the foot.  I'm very satisfied with this product.  One caveat only - they wear a bit small in size for me, so I had to order a half-size larger than shoe size.  I'm a 10 1/2 in shoe size, and a size-11 croc fit perfectly.

review_title: Will continue to buy wish they lasted longer

review_title: Fortunately the size imprint was still on the sole
review_text: I purchased these to replace a pair of these I got about 8 years ago. Obviously, these things last forever. These cost 4 times as much as they did back then, but who could complain about that when you figure the lifespan. I, finally wore the bottoms completely smooth, which becomes hazardous on wet cement. I don't remember the insides being this bumpy as the new ones, maybe I wore those off too. Fortunately the size imprint was still on the sole, making ordering new ones simple. Size 10 is still size 10.
Very durable, comfortable, great for outside wear, easy slip-on, and off.  Ordered multiple pairs for family members.

I began wearing Crocs when I had my first bout with plantar fasciitis several years ago.  I don't know the hows or whys, but the Croc stabilizes my foot and gives support to help my feet not hurt.  I wear them around the house and occasionally when I go shopping.  But for every day wearing around the house shoe, there is nothing better for support and comfort.  My neighbor even thought my yellow ones were cool.  I like different colors and there are so many to chose from. My mom and dad began wearing Crocs also when they helped my feet.  They wear them every where.  Great shoe!

Size & width are half size to full size larger & wider than usual.I'm 99% satisfied with these crocs. I've heard for years how out of this world comfy they. Finally got a pair. They are plenty comfortable. And so far the best little all around shoe ever had. Feet stay cool. As long as you're not doing any serious hiking or trying to use them for  water shoes. They get real slippery. All in all I'd recommend them.

review_title: Something east to slip on and off.
review_text: Not a custom fit...might order the next size down...but really like the easy on & off for appeal.

I live in Crocs, as almost all other shoes hurt some part of my feet.  I liked the shine of these, rather than the dull finish I am used to.  My friend had crippling arthritis in both feet.  She had to give up all walking.  Her podiatrist told her she could not wear any shoes, ever, other than Crocs.  After she did that, she was able to resume her very long walks.  With that as an example, I wondered if Crocs would work for me - and find that they do.

The only downside I find with these shoes is that as they age and the little nubs on the bottom wear off they become very slippery on certain surfaces.  Other than that, they're the perfect shoe for someone on their feet a lot.

review_title: If you have peripheral neuropathy--these shoes are for you!
review_text: The peripheral neuropathy in my feet has become progressively worse--to the point where I was no longer able to wear stylish shoes. A friend recommended I try these, and after buying several pairs of "therapeutic" shoes for close to $100 each, I decided it was worth a try. What could I lose at this price? Thank goodness for her recommendation. These are the only shoes my feet can bear. I wear them to work every day (black and brown go with most clothes). I know this sounds melodramatic, but these shoes are the answer to my prayers!
Was worried as I have trouble with wide-widths but these were perfect.

review_title: Ugliest yet most comfortable house shoe ever
review_text: They are extremely comfortable house shoes.  Lightweight and easy to clean -- I can just throw them in the washing machine.
Got these for my teen for christmas. She's had them for 7months now. Still holding up great! She really loves them. Nice thing about them is you can get them wet and wash them by hand.

I'm not sure how I feel about these. A buddy said they were good for wet wading while fly fishing. Turns out he was right... But also found them to be quite comfy. I've lost all dignity and have going joy wearing them with socks. Lord forgive me.

these crocs feel like air-condition shoes I am very please how they have a therapeutic insole.

I got a pair of clone Crocs many years ago, but the soles were worn to the point of being unsafe on wet surfaces.  I received these as a Christmas gift.  They fit and work well.  I use them almost exclusively as house shoes.

Anyone who has ever bought crocs knows what to expect. Those who have never owned a pair will be impressed. Easy to clean and feel like feathers on your feet. I wear them to work at the hospital and they normally last a year and a half to two years. When the shine starts to fade just slap some liquid car wax on them and they look brand new again. Great for boating or any other outdoor activities as well. The only bad thing is they can be slippery on certain surfaces. Overall a great product.

review_text: Look I‚Äôm a 6.5 in everything, every brand, every shoe style. With that being said I did NOT size up like most posts suggest ! They fit me fine, I wear socks w/ my crocs bcuz it‚Äôs more comfortable that way. Whatever size you get in regular slides, pick that size :)

Unfortunately I didn't return them in time so it looks like I'll end up donating them. Otherwise they're comfortable enough - just wish I'd ordered down.

review_title: They ended up being one of my favorite trip items
review_text: On a whim I decided to pack my new Crocs for a trip to Africa. They ended up being one of my favorite trip items. Easy on/off on airplane and comfortable on safari. Back home they double as I my slippers and provide a lot of firm cushioning for my feet that suffer from second toe capsulitis and bunions.

Down side:  the little bumps (not sharp ones, they are little raised bumps) inside the foot bed bother him (even with socks) ... not so much that he won't wear them, but enough that I have to hear about it every day - lol ,Overall, would very highly recommend!
I finally gave in and got a pair of crocs.  I love them, they fit perfectly and are super comfy.
Great color and comfort. Only full sizes so size 1/2 size up. I'm 6 1/2 and 7 is perfect.

review_title: Crocs are my go-to summer casual shoe...
review_text: Nothing fancy, just a comfortable, breathable, waterproof shoe.  Great for people with very wide feet, like me.  For the price (less than $30), this shoe is a real bargain.  The only shoes I wear anymore are Crocs and Skechers, and I have about 10 pairs of each.
I wanted white for the Summer time coming up,and decided to order the Multicolored Band..Which Adds to the shoe ...Way to go ...An All Out Great shoe.Would order again Deffinitely~

review_title: Simple and convenient for wearing around the house/yard
review_text: I used to give Crocs a hard time back in the day, but I finally gave them a shot for gardening, taking the trash out, etc., and now I see what I was missing! They're super comfortable and convenient.  I originally ordered them in my normal shoe size, and they were a bit big (mainly just too wide/tall over the top of my foot).  I exchanged them quickly and easily for one size down, and now they're great!

I wear an 8.5 usually, and based on other reviews I purchased a size 9. They turned out to be too big, but I put them in the dryer for 5-6 minutes on low heat, and now they fit perfectly. I love the Neo Mint color! They are so insanely comfortable and make my feet so happy - which is a treat because I deal with a lot of foot pain. I would wear Crocs every day if I could!

I am confused why crocs suddenly made a comeback in the world, but my daughter loves them.  They are easy to slip on, clean when she walks through mud and are comfortable.  I hate the price tag and wish she would be okay with off brand, but what can you do?

Perfect, white crocs. Size fit as expected. They were purchased as a gift. They were the only color/size combo I could find online that was in stock and thank goodness! Made a very happy girl who wanted these.
My first pair.  Thought I would never own a pair. Not the best looking footwear but extremely comfortable and easy to get on and off. Great to wear in lakes with rocky bottoms.

review_title: Cool looking color and Classic Crocs style

Beautiful and looks like the picture. My daughter loved it.
Purchased for my granddaughter for Christmas.  She is thrilled with them.  She loves to wear them to school or to knock around the house.

These new crocks fit like a glove!! So if you've had your crocks for a long time, I suggest they may have expanded, as mine did. review_title: If you already own crocs, mind the shoe size
review_text: My girlfriend had an old pair of crocs, which I coveted.  So I finally decided to buy myself a pair on amazon. I based my size on the pair my GF had... which tended toward the small size.  As in: her lady size 9 fit my lady size 10 foot.  But when my new crocs arrived in the mail they were too small.  Should've ordered at 10. Which is my foot size.  Let this be a cautionary tale for you, weary traveler: Buy the shoe size you are, not the half-forgotten-dream of a shoe size your girlfriend wears.

review_title: Amazing Relaxing Shoes For Hiking and Camping!
review_text: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.  ¬†I never though about getting crocs until a good friend, who hikes days at a time in Yosemite every year takes crocs with him strapped to his trekking backpack. When I went with him this year I soon realized how awesome the crocs where. Whenever we camped or stopped by a river he would switch out his shoes and socks and slip on the crocs and off he went into the stream, river, or lake with no worries of stepping on rough rocks, sticks or whatever was underneath or rocks and boulders that are above the water. I didn't have any crocs at the time so I had to walk with my bare feet if I wanted to go in. They also made great camping shoes when setting up camp and just relaxing. Needless to say I was convinced and bought some for myself and my wife. We used them on a recent overnight hiking trip. Amazing shoes!
They might not be the prettiest but they are sure comfortable:)!
Classic Crocs are the best backpacking camp shoes out there.  I had my last pair for 10 years.  I expect these will last the same.
I LOVE THESE. I wear them all the time, and I would definitely buy again. So comfortable and fun!

review_title: Super comfy shoes, reduce back and foot pain
review_text: Very comfortable. Helped to seriously reduce discomfort & lower back pain from standing and working in my home kitchen for long hours. I love to bake and cook. These shoes helped me to continue to do what I love. Took a couple of days to get used to these shoes. At first seemed slightly big for my feet, even with socks on. Now, I can't live without them. I wear them indoors only. Highly recommend! Will by another pair.
Comfy as always....the color was a little more lilac than ballerina pink but I like them anyway....
I swore I'd never get a pair of Crocs. I am an idiot. I LOVE THESE THINGS!!!!! I got these for puttering in the yard/garden but I am going to definitely getting another pair ASAP!
Very comfortable shoes!  I never thought I'd ever own Crocs, but here I am enjoying them and now I'm a fan.  Super light, flexible, lots of cushion, stylish and comfortable.
I wear a women‚Äôs 11 wide in tennis shoes and the women‚Äôs 11 fit perfect for me with room to spare

review_title: Fits as they always do! They are always true to fit!
review_text: What can you say?? They fit just like they should. No hype, no gimmicks. Crocs might not be the most attractive but they are as comfortable as they get!

review_title: but the width was fine. I reordered 9s in that they don't come ...
review_text: I typically wear a size 8 in a wide width.  When I received the size 8, they was too small in length, but the width was fine.  I reordered 9s in that they don't come in 1/2 sizes. A bit disappointed, though, in that I love the color and they are very comfortable.

review_title: Good  but too big- were sent wrong size

However, I hung in there - and now my leg is straightened back into position and I wear these crocks all the time!! I have 2 pair and switch out. Replace your old crocks and see what a difference it makes to have all the "new" features once again. I didn't realize how worn out my old pair were until the new ones arrived.

So I ordered the same in these Crocs and they are comfortable, lightweight, easy to clean after garden work, and well ventilated for Florida weather. Too bad the public seems to find them hideous to look at, but I purchased them for around the house and garden anyway so I give them 5 stars. I am contemplating a second pair in black.

review_title: Of the recommended shoes, crocs were the cheapest to be honest
review_text: I do have semi wide feet, so these fit well for me, but people with narrow feet may find them too big. Anyhow, I have a sprained ankle and torn ligament in my foot and needed shoes with high support (with a hard, un-bendable foot-bed). Of the recommended shoes, crocs were the cheapest to be honest. They are very comfortable and supportive. They're the only shoes I can wear right now w/o pain (other than my other pair of crocs).
Good price and well made. Real crocs. However , size gown because they run BIGGGG
I ordered these after years of ridiculing co-workers whom wore them. I absolutely love my Crocs. They are extremely comfortable. I order size bigger, which was perfect.

Don't know what I would do without my Crocs. I live in these.  I can walk for miles in them with no foot pain.  My husband has them too and he is diabetic which causes all kinds of foot problems, but he can always where his Crocs.

They're very wide but because of the  mass of tiny protrusions on the insole of the shoe they seem to hang onto the foot well and keep them from feeling too wide.  They also massage the foot which I find comfortable. They are light and wearable but are not perfect.  I give them a 4 rating.

Not the best looking clogs, but dang are they the most comfortable.  If you have lower back pain, this cushioning capabilities of these clogs will soften any impact on your back.  Super comfortable.  The only problem I have with this product is the price is high considering what this shoe is made of.  Other than that, it is really the most comfortable clog and I wear these around the house all the time

review_title: Crocs are just about the only footwear I can wear ...

This type of Crocs is my answer to my foot problem.

review_title: My first pair of Crocs and I love 'em!
review_text: This is my first pair of Crocs and I love them!  I have a wide foot and comfort is key.  Crocs reminded me of the white "earth shoes" I wore back in the 70's & 80's while working in the medical field.  I remembered they weren't the most attractive shoes (looked like I had "duck feet") but they were comfortable.  I have friends that wear Crocs and decided to give them a try.  I usually wear an 8-1/2 or 9 and was torn between sizes.  Crocs recommends you order down to the next whole size if you are in-between sizes.  I ordered Classic Crocs / size W9 and I thought they were slightly longer than I needed so I ordered an 8 to be sure.  The length of the foot bed for the 8 was fine but I found the toe box to be a little snug on my littlest toe.  I kept the 9's and am glad I did.  I work in an office of a manufacturing plant with a casual dress code. Most of the building has concrete floors and the Crocs are just perfect for me.  I have since bought another pair in a different color and a pair of Crocs sandals.  The Classic Crocs clogs have ventilation so my feet don't get too hot like they might have in some of the closed styles.  I know Crocs have been around a long time and I don't know why it took me so long to try a pair.  I'm very happy I did.
Super cute and comfy, honestly I swear by crocs now even though I always use to despise them Byt ever since I got my first pair I love them so much I want them all üôå

Their arch support "for me" is perfect and my foot doc agreed that they are pretty good for that type footwear.  The half price sale amazon had was the perfect time to buy a couple more pairs.
Could it have more of an arch support? Yep, Could they fit a little better? YepBut darn it I enjoy my Crocs and it wont be my last pair.

Crocs are light-weight, comfortable enough to wear around the house or on those extensive window-shopping outings.  They are easy to get on and off (and believe me, with arthritis, that is important).  I wear them with the strap over the top for quick slip-on/off and with the strap down when lots of walking in anticipated. Either way, they are great. And, yes, I will be buying Crocs again.

review_title: Weightless, comfy, but tiny break in period
review_text: Newbies: Wearing Crocs is not like wearing shoes. They weigh next to nothing and are cushiony without feeling spongy. Your feet don't have to 'grab' them to stay on: you walk effortlessly, even with the backstrap worn forward over your arch, like clogs. They are waterproof, so the shoes are great for gardening, and the ventilation holes will help your feet breathe; you don't have to wear socks, but I do to avoid any hint of sweaty feet. That's not a real problem for me, but feet vary.  After a short period of wearing them, they become even less noticeable as they conform to your feet. Two days later, most of you won't remember any problems, if you had them. Note: They will wear out eventually, especially if you wear them frequently on concrete. Replace them when the soles wear down, before they become dangerously slippery.Previous users: Remember that new Crocs won't fit like the old ones. The need time to adapt to your feet, particularly the backstrap, which will feel shorter at first.All: Khaki is a wonderful dust color for summer wear. Chocolate is not exactly milk chocolate or bittersweet. It's got a bit of green tinge, which makes it quite attractive for brown feet.

review_title: Good croc for size 14 foot - Blu is a good color!
review_text: Wishing crocs came in more interesting colors for large feet (size 14+). This Blue is about it. Nice deep blue that goes well with jeans. Black and brown remind me too much of the shoes I have to wear for work! Still, great around the house shoes or run to town shoes. Very useful in summer if you live in a place where it rains. Also, I can wear with or without socks.  Love them.

She is on her feet all day on cement & says it's like walking on a gel mat all day.  Great to find it at such a good price.

review_title: Crocs are now my "go to" shoe
review_text: Have been wearing the Bistro (no holes) model for a year and loving them: light, comfortable, roomy and easy to get on and off--so I thought I would try the perforated model.  I normally take a mens size 10 in other types of shoes, but for both the Bistro and Classic Clog, I got mens size 9 and, for me, they fit perfectly:  Roomy, but stay put on my foot.  Besides the holes, the only other difference between the two models appears to be the tread pattern.  I'm retired and now able to enjoy the opportunity to wear what's comfortable--not what's expected at work.

I'm 7 months pregnant, and in the summer, my feet get very swollen.  I was down to 2 pair shoes that I could wear to work (closed toes shoes) and saw these on sale.  I was looking at Crocs for sometime, but was balking at the $34 price tag.  These were on sale, so I figured I might as well.  Oh, my fat feet are happy.  Good support, and they stretch with my feet throughout the day, so no pinching.  They do seem to shrink overnight, because they don't seem overly large the next day.  Obviously not very fashionable, but I was not looking for fashion, just shoes I could wear in semi-comfort.  I usually wear a 7.5/8 women's, and ordered these in a women's 8, which are fitting well.Additionally, at the end of the day if I need to slip on shoes for whatever reason, these are the only ones which I can stuff my feet into without pain, pinching, or having to try and bend down and adjust straps.  Would highly recommend to people who have swollen feet, looking for comfort and are willing to sacrifice a little fashion for a whole lot of comfort.

review_title: Very comfortable. Great for my intended uses to replace flip ...
review_text: Very comfortable. Great for my intended uses to replace flip flops and to dry my feet out after walking around in boots or being wet all day. I went with a 10, and the back strap barely catches on my heel as I take a step.  Fine for walking around on dry ground, indoors, at the pool etc.  However, it's a bit too large to walk around in muck, submerged water (creeks etc) because it just isn't tight enough.  If I purchased again I would actually go down half a size.

review_title: From a Catholic to a Crocoholic
review_text: Let me start by saying one thing: I never thought I would own crocs.Here is my coming of Croc story.I always thought these shoes were so ugly. I first saw them about 8 years ago and thought "Why would someone ever put something like that on their feet?" and people would always say how comfortable they were. I just thought they were dumb to think wearing this shoe was okay.Well go into the futre to now, I am a graduate nurse whos feet are killing her on 12hr shifts. So I decide to give them a try.Now I am a converted crocoholic. I love these shoes, I even made my other new nurse friends buy them lolThey are honestly so comfortable on my feet, and when unsightly things spill on them, you can just wipe them off.I also love that you may or may not use the strap in the back, sometimes I like to be scandalous and let my heels out and other times I like to wear the straps around my ankles (call me bojangles).But for real, if you have never tried these before, you should. They are worth the one time try- and then you will be addicted.

Bought size 12 for a person who is an 11 1/2 so if you are worrying about no half sizes I would just buy the size up and they should work fine. These are being used as aquatic shoes for activities like kayaking and for the gym for the steam room.

There is a slight difference in size, as these are a tad wider but the material, fit, comfort, and quality are the same.Prosvery comfortable as a clog, tend to be on the wide size for shoes and now even widerno smell with bare feeteasy to clean, just rinse with water over an open spigot with your feet still in themdurable, the sole has worn over 12 years but my old shoe is still usablelightweightresists deterioration with sunlight very well, my old shoe is faded but very intactEasy to done like a slipper yet holds firm with foot strapsConsSlippery in water, it can hydroplane easily. review_title: Comfy sandals, but gets dirty easily
review_text: These are great casual lightweight sandals that are cushy and mold to your feet.  They are also great for wearing in/around water.  I bought a pair for myself and my hubby, who loves his as well.  Our only complaint is that these sandals get dirty easily.  We both got black, so it is always a little dusty on the outside (makes it look like dark grey), and when we wear around the yard or around town, we often get dust, pebbles, and grass in our shoes.  I suppose if you wore them where there was zero debris on the ground, they'd be the perfect shoes!  They are also easy to clean, however - just damp paper towel or cloth wipes it clean.  Fairly good traction below, too.

review_title: They are Crocs...what more needs to be said?
review_text: I have been wearing Crocs for a long time.  This is my first review.  I am a large man with wide feet.  I have a bad knee that makes tying shoes very painful.  Slip-on mules and clogs are the ticket for me, and Crocs are the answer.  Whenever they go on sale, I consider buying another pair.  The only downside is that the sole tread seems to wear out to quickly in my opinion.  I like the quick and free shipping with Amazon Prime.

I've never worn Crocs before this, but I love them! They fit the shape of my foot perfectly-narrow at the heal, wide at the toes. And the sole make these shoes almost soundless on tile or wood floors-helpful when you don't want to wake up people or dogs.

I work in the medical field, and normally wear danskos to work. Wanted to see if I could get something a little less hot for summer, so I gave these a try. I'm so glad I did, they are SOOO comfy! I would not wear them without socks, feel like that would end up pretty smelly after a few times wearing them like that. My favorite part of these are the ventilation holes - the AC in the car can actually cool my feet after a long day! I live in Phoenix, so that is actually a really big deal - I used to take my shoes off for the drive home to keep them from getting so hot, and you really aren't supposed to drive barefoot! The squishy foam is quite comfortable as well. Some flooring materials (laminate specifically) will make these squeak when walking, but not much different from my danskos honestly. They are totally silent on tile and linoleum. Wish I had bought these years ago for summers!

review_title: As comfy as they are ugly !
review_text: I really like my clogs. I just don't like the way they look. And I wouldn't have considered them but I had to travel very light at some point and was jealous of a friend's clogs that served her well. The weight is amazingly low. So I tried them on and they are so comfy. First I didn't buy any because locally they are rather pricey but then I found them on amazon for a very reasonable price. I only wear them at home because I think they are really ugly but at home I wear them all the time. The are great for the garden because you can just hose them off if they get muddy. They are great for inside because they don't slip and the material warms up fast in the winter to keep my feet warm. The are treated with something antibacterial so they don't start to smell in the summer when your feet are sweaty. And they are made in Mexico which I prefer over made in China, for some reason including the short way to transport them. I like the strap in the back too. It is good if you have to walk further with them (which I usually don't but it is good to have options).

Needed something lightweight but sturdy for the summer trips to the beach and as house shoes. These fit the bill very well. Even though they don't give the impression of ruggedness, they are surprisingly strong, so I am very happy with them. The fit is a good match with my regular shoe size, so buying them online is little risk.

When I deployed to Iraq back in 2008, I bought these to use as shower shoes.  They worked very well offering a decent grip on the shower floor.  I used them for an entire year while I was deployed and they held up great.  Not just in the shower trailers, but also when  walking on the desert ground that was super hot.  After using them in Iraq, I decided to just throw them out as I wasn't about to bring them home after using everyday in public showers.  Upon my return I bought another pair that I wear to go outside or down in my basement.  I give 4 stars only because the sizing is a little off.  I am a 9.5 so I ordered size 9 which was too small.  I returned that pair, with ease might I add thanks to Amazon free return, and ordered a size 10.  The size 10 is slightly too big but not to the point where it's annoyingly coming off my foot.  The back strap does the job in keeping them on my feet.I highly recommend these Crocs.  They are a perfect shower shoe due to the almost rubberish material.  They will not deteriorate.  Also great little slip on shoes for camping as well for treks to and from the community shower house.  Enjoy!

I have countless pair to the dismay of those around me... and I LOVE THEM.Since I like them so much here's some Crocs Classic info.They are great just about everywhere. I can accomplish just about every chore I do in them. They are worthless once they get water in them. (two pair and a towel nearby when gardening, really? ...hahah) So, they dry quickly.They aren't for bouldering or climbing trees but they can make it most places on a job site, trail walking, house and yard wearing.Classics are great because of the holes in the front for shaking out constant debris. Classics are affordable, but they all are relatively... these are just the best. More comfortable than the Rx pair, better than the rugged outdoor pair, night and day better than any of the fleece-lined winter ones. Get the Classics and forget the rest. ~ Cheers.

review_title: Comfort needs to be engineered back into the product
review_text: I bought these to replace a pair I bought 18 years ago. As others have noted, the current "Classic" model is made with a stiffer material than the original...this is absolutely correct. I prefer the softer original, but I'm pretty sure the copycats don't make the soft ones anymore, either. These are also slightly narrower, and the raised rubber nubs feel pointier (maybe because of the stiffer rubber?). Otherwise, these are almost identical to the 18 year old model. I usually like to buy products from the innovator, even if they're more expensive than the copycats, so I may buy these again in the future. On the other hand, the most desirable features have been pretty much designed out of the product, so, when it comes time to replace these, I may go with an entirely different product.

review_title: Crocs around the house, with or without socks
review_text: I love Crocs, because they're easy to slip on and off, and because they're washable. I pretty much live in them around the house. Of course, I don't know whether or not they're somehow contributing to my back pain. And I think it probably took a while for me to learn to walk in them without tripping a little now and then -- there is a little extra length in them, but I think they are supposed to fit that way.This might be the most recent pair I bought, and it's almost two years old. I don't remember whether or not it was the case with them, but over the years I remember that on at least a couple of occasions new Crocs smelled when I first received them. Can't remember exactly, but it might be sort of a fruity smell. I don't *think* it washes out, at least not in one wash, but I think it dissipates over time. I think we used to leave them to air out for a while before wearing them. My sense of smell is sometimes annoyingly sensitive, so this might not pose a problem for the average person, especially if you keep your feet away from your (and anyone else's) nose.Roomy enough to wear with socks when my feet are cold, which is another reason to prefer them over my pink fabric slides. (Those are really awkward with socks).

review_title: I like 'em for playing drums (and just about other general purpose use).
review_text: Fit great!  I used my old pair so much for practically everything that they became 'outdoor' Crocs.  I ordered this pair for my 'indoor' Crocs.A few things I really like about them, and a slightly different perspective than the norm: I love them for playing drums!  Sometimes the kick drum beater swings back and hits the top of my foot, which hurts.  The layer of plastic 'armor' that the Crocs provide eliminates that pain.  The sole isn't too grippy and the shoes are very light weight, so switching between the hi-hat and second kick pedal is easy and comfortable, too.  Great for playing drums!

review_title: This is THE most comfortable shoe that you can wear for this long
review_text: I work in medicine and am on my feet 10-12 hours or more daily.  This is THE most comfortable shoe that you can wear for this long.  Athletic shoes have great support, but they strangle your feet and they suffocate.  These are FOAM shoes.  They are roomy and comfy and your feet breatheeeeeeeee. Other options are the Birkenstock clogs, but they are HEAVY as heck.  These are light as a feather.One thing to consider is where they are made.  I have had a few pairs of the same size and they all fit VERY VERY differently.  My previous pair was "made in China" and though they were size 8, they fit like a 9.  Too wide and too long.  I got used to them and used them for years.  These here IIRC are "made in Mexico" and they fit as a size 8 should.  At first I thought they were too small, but I was used to the ones that were too large. I read somewhere that different factories may have different molds for the same shoe.  It feels weird having ones that touch the sides of my feet, but they will break in and comform to my feet.  They are after all, foam.

review_title: Difficulty with Crocs' Online Sizing Tool
review_text: I've enjoyed Crocs for years -- tough, durable, water-proof, comfortable, even stylish. I've always purchased them in a store but ordered online just because I knew exactly what I wanted -- or thought I did until the pair I received through Amazon was a full size too big (even though the size imprinted in the shoe was identical to prior Crocs I've owned that fit well). The second (replacement) pair, sze 9M/11W, fit very well, even though I wear size 10M. As I noted upon returning the first pair, Crocs' sizing tool is not user-friendly and resulted, despite my best effort, in my having to return the first pair. Like most folks, I'm only going to re-order replacement shoes online if they are going to be VERY consistent in their size and width -- otherwise, I'll go to a store for the traditional try-on method of shopping. Since Crocs are not very expensive and available everywhere, I'm actually going to go to a store for try-ons in the future, even though Amazon's system for returns and replacing is excellent. Amazon did a great getting me the right size; my disappointment is with Crocs, who in my view make a great line of products but have a clunky and unreliable sizing system that, for me at least, made ordering online a disappointing experience.
